you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze     full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past  year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement

cotiviti be a vendor humana use for quality and data report to center for medicare and medicaid service  cm   cotiviti provide system that allow humana to contact healthcare provider and request medical record necessary to verify data report to cm  cotiviti utilize a subcontractor  visionary  to review the collect medical record  in the incident describe above  the visionary employee  who be authorize to access and use the data for humana purpose  disclose the information to the unauthorized individual through a personal google drive account  
 
the follow information may have be include a part of the medical record involve in the incident  
 
  name 
  date of birth 
  member identification number 
  date of service 
 
humana be commit to safeguard your personal information  humana have work with cotiviti to ensure it take immediate step to enhance protection and ensure the safety and security of your information now and into the future  to help prevent something like this from happen again  humana have take prompt action to ensure the appropriate physical safeguard be in place at cotiviti and visionary  
 
upon discovery  visionary immediately disable the access of the now former employee for both visionary and cotiviti system  visionary implement a broad containment strategy to prevent any information that be subject to unauthorized disclosure  due to this incident  from further unauthorized disclosure  both visionary and cotiviti launch a comprehensive investigation into the incident and hire cybersecurity firm to assist in the effort  
 
we have partner with equifax to provide it credit watchtm gold with in monitor identity theft protection product to you for two year  there be no cost for the service  a description of this product and instruction about how to enroll be include with the letter you receive  we strongly encourage you to enroll in this no cost service to protect yourself from the potential misuse of your information

  medical record 
  account statement and credit report

notice of data breach 
 
i be write to let you know about a data security incident affect accellion  which be use by the kroger family of company and many other company for secure file transfer  this incident involve your personal information a a result of this incident  nevertheless  we be notify you to explain the circumstance a we understand them  and to make you aware of the step we have take to respond and the resource we be make available to you  
 
what happen  
 
we be recently make aware of a data security incident affect accellion  which be use by the kroger family of company  a well a many other company  for secure file transfer  accellion have confirm that an unauthorized person gain access to certain kroger family of company file by exploit a vulnerability in accellions file transfer service  we learn that the accellion incident impact krogers file on january     take immediate action  and we discontinue use of accellions service and investigate the scope and impact of the incident  
 
the incident be isolate to accellions service  and our own it system have not be affect by this incident  no grocery store data be impact  however  the accellion software be use for the unauthorized person gain access to certain kroger file by exploit a vulnerability in accellions file transfer service on approximately december

dear member  
 
subject  notice of data breach 
 
central california alliance for health  the alliance  have be inform of a data security breach that may have involve unintentional disclosure of our member health information  alliance employee email account be access  but there be no proof to suggest that any member health information be be misuse at this time  the alliance want to ensure that member who may have be affect be notify that their health information may have be disclose  
 
after we finish our initial investigation and notify impact member about what happen  we continue to review the case  during that review  we find more impact people  include you  
 
what happen  
 
on may     the alliance find that many alliance employee email account be access illegally by an unknown person  these account be access for about one hour  the alliance find the issue and immediately shut down the alliance employee email account that be access  
 
what information be involve  
 
after a thorough review  the alliance find that only limit member health information may have be access  although we dont know exactly which email message be open  the member health information that may have be access include  
 
  alliance care management program record 
  claim information 
  date of birth 
  demographic information 
  medi california id number 
  medical information 
  referral information 
 
the alliance employee email account would not have include financial information and social security number  
 
what we be do  
 
the alliance have take step to prevent similar event from occur in the future  the alliance take immediate effort to shut down the alliance employee email account that be involve to make sure the unknown person could not access any more member health information  all alliance employee  even those not involve in the data security breach  
 
what you can do  
 
we suggest that you keep a copy of this notice for your record in case there be any concern with your medical record in the future  no further action be require of you  you have the right to review your alliance bill information at no charge to ensure that your alliance id number have not be misuse  to review your alliance bill information  you can request a copy of your record by submit a record access request form to the alliance  
 
if you would like to request a copy of the record access request form to be mail to you  or would like to request a pre pay envelope  please call the alliance member service department at     monday through friday  from  a m  to   p m  you can also access a copy of the record access request form on the alliance member website at  under the section title  authorization to use or disclose protect health information  
 
if you speak another language  language assistance service be available to you at no charge  we can get an interpreter who speak your language  for the hear or speech assistance line  call     tty  dial      
 
for more information  
 
for more information about medical privacy right  you may visit the website of the california department of justice  privacy enforcement and protection at   
 
alliance contact  
 
we be sorry that this happen and want to assure you that we take our role of protect our member personal information very seriously  if you have any question  please contact me directly by phone at    or by email at listprivacyofficerccah alliance org  
 
the privacy and security of our member information continue to be a priority for the alliance  and we deeply regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may have cause  
 
sincerely  
 
jenifer mandella 
privacy officer the breach information include a member health information  there be no indication that the information be hack or intentionally disclose

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
single bureau credit monitor 
 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit datafor instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  youll have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  
 
to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  
 
additional resource 
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report agency  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
 
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
 
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
free credit report  
 
it be recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  especially activity that may indicate fraud and identity theft  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  
 
to order your annual free credit report please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to  
 
annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  
 
you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  
 
a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past  year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
federal trade commission and state attorney general office  
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your home state  you may also contact these agency for information on how to prevent or minimize the risk of identity theft  
 
you may contact the federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   www ftc gov bcp edu microsites idtheft     idtheft      
 
for maryland resident  you may contact the maryland office of the attorney general  consumer protection division   st  paul place  baltimore  md   www oag state md u       
 
for north carolina resident  you may contact the north carolina office of the attorney general  consumer protection division   mail service center  raleigh  nc    www ncdoj gov       
 
for new york resident  the attorney general may be contact at  office of the attorney general  the capitol  albany  ny           
 
report of identity theft and obtain a police report  
 
for iowa resident  you be advise to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement or to the iowa attorney general  
 
for massachusetts resident  you have the right to obtain a police report if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
for oregon resident  you be advise to report any suspect identity theft to law enforcement  the federal trade commission  and the oregon attorney general  the security industry specialist report that certain system and device be inaccessible and encrypt due to a cyber attack by an external or malware  an independent cyber forensic firm confirm that personal information be contain in some of the file potentially impact by this incident

subject  notice of data breach 
 
dear   first name     last name    
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that may have involve your personal center  ggrc   that be why we be write to inform you about this incident  offer complimentary identity monitor and protection service  and provide you with information relate to step that can be take to help protect the information of individual we serve  
 
what happen  
 
on september     ggrc detect unusual activity in it network environment consistent with a ransomware incident  ransomware incident typically involve an unauthorized actor gain access to an entitys network and deploy malware that encrypt the entitys file  make them inaccessible  the unauthorized actor then commonly demand a ransom payment in exchange for the key to decrypt the entitys file  once ggrc discover this incident  ggrc disable it network  secure it system  immediately begin an investigation  and work to restore operation and data access from backup  ggrc also engage a lead  independent computer forensics firm to determine what happen and whether sensitive information may have be access or acquire by an unknown actor during the incident  on january     ggrc discover your information may have be affect  while we have no evidence that any personal or protect health information belong to the individual we serve have be misuse  out of an abundance of caution  we be inform you of the incident and provide you with access to complimentary identity monitor and protection service from idx  
 
what information be involve  
 
the type of information impact may include your first and or last name  ggrc issue unique client identifier number  service description or code  vendor or service provider name or number  and or cost information relate to the service  
 
what be we do  
 
a soon a ggrc discover the incident  we take the step describe above  we have also take measure to further enhance the security of information in our possession and to prevent similar incident from happen in the future  in addition  we have notify the federal bureau of investigation  fbi  about this incident  and we will work with and provide assistance to law enforcement to hold the perpetrator accountable  
 
to enroll  please call      
or visit    
enrollment code    xxxxxxxxx

suwanee  ga  
 
we be also provide you with information about step that you can take to help protect your personal information  the idx service include  cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage identity theft recovery service  
 
to receive these service by mail instead of online  please call      please note that you must enroll in the service no later than june

for more information  
 
further information about how to protect your personal information appear on the follow page  if you have question concern this incident  please contact      monday through friday    a m  to   p m  pacific time  we take your trust in u and this matter very seriously and we deeply regret any worry or inconvenience that this may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
eric zigman 
executive director 
 
step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant and review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  the ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can also contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
www equifax com

p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com 
 
free annual report 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
    
www annualcreditreport com 
 
fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  
 
federal trade commission 
 pennsylvania ave  nw 
washington  dc  
consumer ftc gov  and www ftc gov idtheft 
    
 
you also have certain right under the fair credit report act  fcra   
 
these right include know what be in your file  dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  and require consumer report agency correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  for more information about the fcra  please visit  the data security incident be a ransomware attack that involve an unauthorized actor gain access to the entitys network and deploy malware that encrypt their file  make them inaccessible

other important information

you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze be also design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any request you make for new loan  credit mortgage  employment  house  or other service  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  to place a credit freeze on your credit report  you must send a write request to each of the three major consumer report agency by regular  certify  or overnight mail at the address below or  if available  comply with the consumer report agency online credit freeze request procedure

what happen  
 
on january     flagstar bank be inform by accellion  a vendor that flagstar use for it file share platform  that the platform have a vulnerability that be exploit by an unauthorized party  flagstar bank immediately discontinue use of this file share platform  unfortunately  we have learn that the unauthorized party be able to access some of flagstar bank information on the accellion platform  and we be one of numerous accellion client who be impact  however  flagstar bank remain fully operational and other part of our it infrastructure outside of the accellion platform be not impact  importantly  the accellion platform be segment from the rest of our network  and our core bank and mortgage system be not affect  
 
what we be do 
 
upon learn of the vulnerability  flagstar bank promptly take the accellion server offline and permanently discontinue use of this file share platform  additionally  we act immediately to contain the threat and engage a team of third party forensic expert to investigate and determine the full scope of this incident  a part of our investigation  we have also notify law enforcement  
 
what information be involve  
 
on march     we determine that one or more of the document remove from the accellion platform contain your   bb text  dataelements

monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau list below directly to request a free copy of your credit report  you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report by one of the three credit bureau every four month  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below

dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
automation personal information  this notice provide information about the incident  our response  and resource available to you to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on november     aps discover suspicious activity impact the operability of certain system  we quickly launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of this incident  work with industry lead computer forensics specialist to determine what happen and what information may have be affect  the investigation identify a limit number of file and folder a potentially access by the unknown actor  we complete a thorough and lengthy review to determine whether sensitive information be present in the impact file and folder  on february     it be confirm that some of your personal information be accessible within the file and just complete that effort  
 
what information be involve

notice of data breach 
 
what happen  
we be write to inform you of a recent security incident that occur at department of state hospital  dsh  atascadero  an employee with access to dsh atascadero data server a part of their information technology job duty improperly access your  and approximately  patient and former patient  and  employee name  covid  test result  and health information necessary for track covid   the breach be identify on february     a part of dshs annual review of employee access right to data folder pursuant to it information and system and access right policy and procedure  at this time  dsh have no evidence that there have be any use or attempt use of the information compromise by this incident  
 
what information be involve  
the confidential information contain your name  the date you receive your covid  test  your covid  test result  along with health information necessary for track covid   the information do not contain other information  such a your social security number  driver license number  or financial account number which could expose you to identity theft  however  the investigation be ongoing  if it be determine that more information be access than what be provide in this notice of data breach letter  another notification will be provide to the affect individual within  business day of the discovery that more information be access  
 
what we be do  
dsh be investigate the breach and have place the principal subject of the investigation on administrative leave pending completion of the investigation  analyze the electronic network to see whether the employee improperly access any other information  and be cooperate with the law enforcement agency in conduct an investigation  
 
dsh have identify  and be notify  all individual whose protect health information  phi  have be compromise  which be why you be receive this letter  in addition  dsh have report this breach to the unite state health and human service  office of civil right  the california office of information security  the california office of health information integrity  the california highway patrol  the california department of public health  and the california attorney general office  
 
what you can do  
keep a copy of this notice  you may request a copy of your medical record from dsh atascadero  in order to request to review your medical record or obtain copy  the request must be in write to the health information management department  department of state hospital atascadero  po box   atascadero  ca   if you be a patient  or former patient  you may use the enclose dsh   and submit the form to dsh for review approval  if you be an employee  you may request a copy of your medical information from your return to work coordinator at     
 
for more information  
if you have additional question about this breachdsh ca gov  please do not include your social security number or medical information in an email to dsh  
 
for information about your medical privacy right  you may visit the website of the california department of justice  privacy enforcement and protection at  dsh patient and former patient may also contact their patient right advocate  lucas campo  at       or his secretary kathy kalem  at       with question relate to patient right  employee may contact the employee assistance program  eap   for support service at www eap calhr ca gov

i be write to inform you of an incident involve your personal information  
 
what happen 
 
on december      a file transfer service use by kroger to transfer large data file associate with it money transfer operation  among other service  be compromise  the file transfer service be provide by krogers vendor  accellion  the compromise result in an unauthorized party steal significant volume of data and record from a large number of accellion customer  include kroger  accord to kroger  it learn of this unauthorizedaccess on january     kroger inform u that the unauthorizedaccess likely occur between december     and december     kroger have assure u that it no longer use the impact service

upon receive the necessary data from kroger  we immediately begin investigate to determine what personal information handle by kroger be affect and which of our value customer be impact due to the compromise of krogers service provider  our investigation determine that some of the affect report include information about you  
 
i want to emphasize that western union information system be not affect by this incident  and we have no evidence that any money transfer be impact  
 
what we be do 
 
we take this matter very seriously and be fully commit to protect the privacy and security of our customer information  a note above  after learn of this incident  we immediately initiate an investigation  we have confirm that kroger stop use the affect file transfer service provide by accellion  although our system be not impact  we will be review krogers security practice and monitor the circumstance surround this event  
 
to help protect your identity  we be offer complimentary access to experian identity workssm for a period of two year

we be write to inform you of a cyber incident that may have expose some of your personal information  please note that no financial data be involve in this breach  we take the protection and proper use of your information very seriously and want to explain what happen and the step you can take to protect yourself against cybercrime  
 
in early last month  we become aware of this data breach  we take immediate action to secure our server and the impact account  we also begin an investigation to understand the scope of the incident  we be able to identify the root cause of the data incident and confirm that other jefit system be unaffected  we also contact law enforcement  
 
at this time  there be no sensitive financial data involve since we never store customer payment information  all payment process be directly handle by google play store  apple app store  or directly process by the payment gateway company if customer purchase product on our website  nevertheless  we be provide this notice out of an abundance of caution because some other part of your private information be access by the perpetrator of the cyber incident  
 
the personal and private information that the perpetrator gain access to include some or possibly all of the follow  jefit account username  email address  associate with the account   encrypt password  hash with unique salt to each account   and ip address when create the account  
 
upon discovery of the cyber attack  we immediately secure and patch the bug  we also conduct a forensic investigation to confirm that no other system be impact  we have take security measure to strengthen our network against similar incident in the future  we have also implement a stronger password policy on our product to further protect user account in the future  
 
we want to make sure you be aware of step you may take to guard against potential phishing email attack or other form of fraud  although all the password have be hash with unique salt  mean password be encrypt  before save to our system  it be still possible for the perpetrator to decrypt some of them if the password be too simple  we encourage you to change your password a soon a you can  
 
we take the privacy and security of your information seriously and sincerely regret any concern or inconvenience that the incident may have cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
ying lin

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we at sunmed group hold  llc  sunmed  value the privacy and security of your personal information  unfortunately  we be write to inform you of a security incident that have occur  we want to provide you with information about the incident  explain the service we be make available to you  and assure you that we be take significant measure to protect your information  
 
what happen  
on sunday  october     a ransomware infection encrypt file store on some of our server  a a result  a hacker be able to gain access to our computer system  likely through one of our employee click on an external link in an email that be not clear through our email scan tool  and lock it up from function  fortunately  our it team discover the situation and be able to restore the system so that we could resume operation on monday morning  we have not receive any further communication from the hacker and have not have any report that anyones personal information from our system have be use or sell by the hacker  
 
what we be do 
upon learn of the issue  we contain the threat and immediately commence a thorough investigation  a part of our investigation  we have be work very closely with external cybersecurity professional experience in handle these type of incident  a well a law enforcement  we continue to fortify our security measure to help prevent future cybersecurity threat  
 
what information be involve  
on february     follow an extensive review and analysis of the data at issue  we determine that the information acquire by the threat actor may have contain some of your personal information  include your insert specific information if available  
 
what you can do 
to date  we be not aware of any report of identity fraud or improper use of your information a a direct result of this incident  nevertheless  we be offer a complimentary one year membership in mytrueidentity provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  for more information on identity theft prevention and mytrueidentity  include instruction on how to activate your one year membership  please see the additional information provide in this letter  
 
this letter also provide other precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your financial account statement and credit report for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
for more information 
we apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have cause  we be commit to maintain the privacy of personal familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday  be to pm est  
 
other important information 
  enroll in complimentary  month credit monitor 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the follow  letter activation code insert code and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address and more  the service also include access to an identity restoration program that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  please call the toll free transunion fraud response service hotline at insert phone number  when prompt  enter the follow  digit telephone pass code insert code to speak to a transunion representative about your identity theft issue

what information be involve

what we be do

what you can do

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  
 
to file a complaint with the ftc  go to www ftc gov idtheft or call   id theft       complaint file with the ftc will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  which be a database make available to law enforcement agency  
 
copy of credit report 
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print a copy of the request form at  or you can elect to purchase a copy of your credit report by contact one of the three national credit report agency  contact information for the three national credit report agency for the purpose of request a copy of your credit report or for general inquiry be provide below  
 
equifax      www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga  
 
experian      www experian com  anton blvd   suite  costa mesa  ca  
 
transunion      www transunion com p o  box  fullerton  ca  
 
fraud alert 
 
you may consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least one year  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze 
 
you may have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate a freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  there shall be no charge for a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  please contact the three major credit report company a specify below to find out more information  
 
equifax  p o  box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
experian  p o  box   allen  tx   www experian com 
 
transunion llc  p o  box   chester  pa     freeze transunion com 
 
you can obtain more information about fraud alert and credit freeze by contact the ftc or one of the national credit report agency list above

dear insert name  
 
at hagerty insurance agency  llc  hagerty  we take data privacy very seriously  it be therefore important that we make you aware of any data privacy issue that may affect you  below you will find information about an incident with our insurance quote feature that may have release your personal information without your authorization  we be actively take step to protect your information a outline below  please note that you may be affect even if you have no relationship with hagerty  
 
hagerty be an insurance agency specialize in provide specialty insurance for collectable vehicle  hagerty maintain a public face website that include an instant quote feature which allow anyone to obtain a tailor insurance quote for their vehicle by enter in basic personal consumer data from an outside provider for verification and to improve the accuracy of the automate quote  
 
what happen 
 
on february   hagertys web team notice an increase in insurance quote request via our instant quote feature  the high level of quote activity be suspicious and initial investigation indicate that automate bot be submit fake quote  hagerty immediately deploy mechanism to detect  prevent  and block bot activity in our quote system  on february   hagerty become aware that this incident be likely part of a widespread cyber fraud scheme target quote system across many different insurer and insurance agency  malicious bot activity be increasingly prevalent and can be use to tap into system to harvest specific online consumer data  base on information know about these widespread attack  hagerty be able to identify that the bot activity be intend to access individual personal information be not visible on the webpage itself  the attacker could search the source code to find it  
 
what information be involve 
 
our record indicate that your name  driver license number  and date of birth may have be access in early february  
 
action weve take to safeguard your information 
 
we take our responsibility to safeguard your personal bot activity

step you may take to protect yourself against potential misuse of information 
 
we recommend that you regularly review statement from your account and periodically obtain your credit report from one or more of the national credit report company  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report online at www annualcreditreport com  by call toll free      or by mail an annual credit report request form  available at www annualcreditreport com  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga     you may also obtain a copy of your credit report by contact one or more of the three national credit report agency list below  
 
equifax  p o  box   atlanta  georgia         www equifax com 
experian  p o  box   allen  tx        www experian com 
transunion  p o  box   chester  pa        www transunion com 
 
when you receive your credit report  review them carefully  look for account or creditor inquiry that you do not initiate or do not recognize  look for information  such a home address and social security number  that be not accurate  if you see anything you do not understand  call the credit report agency at the telephone number on the report  
 
we recommend you remain vigilant with respect to review your account statement and credit report  we also recommend that you promptly report any suspicious activity or suspect identity theft to the proper law enforcement authority  include local law enforcement  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   you may contact the ftc or your state regulatory authority to obtain additional information about avoid identity theft  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft  
 
fraud alert  
 
there be also two type of fraud alert that you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud  an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least  day  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for  year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by call the toll free fraud number of any of the three national credit report agency list below  
 
equifax       www equifax com 
experian       www experian com 
transunion       fraud transunion com 
 
credit freeze  
 
you may have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate a freeze  a credit freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  place  lift  and or remove a credit freeze from your account be completely free and will not affect your credit score  please contact the three national credit report agency a specify below to find out more information  
 
equifax  p o  box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
experian  p o  box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion  p o  box   chester  pa     freeze transunion com

dear owner name  
 
we be write to inform you about a recent information security incident that may have affect certain piece of your personal information  this letter be on behalf of the california state controller office  sco  unclaimed property division  
 
what happen  
 
a sco employee click on a link in an email that appear to come from a trust outside entity and unknowingly provide an unauthorized user with access to their email account  the unauthorized user have access to the account from march     at   p m  to march     at   p m  and send potentially malicious email to some of the sco employee contact  
 
what information be involve  
 
sco have reason to believe that the compromise email account have personal identify information contain in unclaimed property holder report  these report be submit by corporation with whom you have transact business but  after a period of year  have lose contact with you and your property turn over   your property may be search for at www claimit ca gov   that information potentially include your first and last name  address at the time your property be deem lose by the corporation  social security number  birth date  and value of property turn over to sco  
 
what we be do 
 
the improperly access email account be discover promptly and access remove  sco unclaimed property division personal identify information that may have be view  contact of the sco employee be advise to delete suspicious email and not click on any link therein  
 
to assist you in protect yourself against identity theft  we have arrange to make available to you  month of identity theft resolution service provide by experian identityworks sm  at no charge  detail on how to enroll be enclose  please note that you must enroll to take advantage of this free service  and we encourage you to do so  
 
what you can do 
 
a always  we recommend you be on the alert for suspicious activity relate to your financial account and credit report  we encourage you to regularly monitor your statement and record to ensure there be no transaction or other activity that you do not initiate or authorize  
 
for more information 
 
please be assure that we be commit to help you protect your credit and identity and ensure that your information be safe and secure  we regret this incident and apologize for any concern it may have cause you  if you have further question regard this matter  please call      or email ucpreportingsco ca gov

additional action to help reduce your chance of identity theft 
 
place a  day fraud alert on your credit file 
 
an initial  day security alert indicate to anyone request your credit file that you suspect you be a victim of fraud  when you or someone else attempt to open a credit account in your name  increase the credit limit on an exist account  or obtain a new card on an exist account  the lender should take step to verify that you have authorize the request  if the creditor cannot verify this  the request should not be satisfy  you may contact one of the credit report company below for assistance  
 
equifax     www equifax com 
experian     www experian com 
transunion     www transunion com 
 
place a security freeze on your credit file 
 
if you be very concern about become a victim of fraud or identity theft  a security freeze might be right for you  place a freeze on your credit report will prevent lender and others from access your credit report entirely  which will prevent them from extend credit  with a security freeze in place  you will be require to take special step when you wish to apply for any type of credit  this process be also complete through each of the credit report company  the cost of place  temporarily lift  and remove a security freeze vary by state  generally  to  per action at each credit report company  
 
order your free annual credit report 
 
visit www annualcreditreport com or call     once you receive your credit report  review them for discrepancy  identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  verify all information be correct  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report company  
 
manage your personal information 
 
take step such a carry only essential document with you  be aware of whom you be share your personal information with  and shred receipt  statement  and other sensitive information  
 
use tool from credit provider 
 
carefully review your credit report and bank  credit card  and other account statement  be proactive and create alert on credit card and bank account to notify you of activity  if you discover unauthorized or suspicious activity on your credit report or by any other mean  file an identity theft report with your local police and contact a credit report company

nature of the data event 
 
pathway serve a a provider of the program of all inclusive care for the elderly  pace  to iowa resident  peaktpa provide third party pharmacy administration service to pathway program participant  on january     pathway receive notice from peaktpa of a ransomware incident  peaktpa report that on december     it experience a ransomware event that result in the encryption of certain peaktpa system  peaktpa report that law enforcement be notify and that peaktpa work with forensic investigator to determine the nature and scope of the incident  follow it investigation  peaktpa notify it customer that an unknown actor may have access or acquire certain peaktpa customer data  peaktpa report that the data be access or exfiltrated by the threat actor at some point on or about december  and december

step you can take to prevent identity theft and fraud  
 
monitor your account 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a fraud alert or credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax 
experian 
transunion

we represent the national wildlife federation  nwf  locate at  wildlife center drive  reston  va   and be write to notify your office of an incident that may affect the security of some personal jurisdiction  
 
nature of the data event 
 
on or about december     nwf receive notice from it third party it website security vendor of a potential data security incident that may have result in the compromise of payment card use at zoobooks com  upon receive this notice  nwf immediately begin an investigation to determine the nature and scope of this potential incident  nwf also work to determine what happen  what information be involve  and how to secure zoobooks com  through the investigation  nwf determine on january     that malicious code could have facilitate the unauthorized acquisition of customer payment card information enter on zoobooks com between february     and december     nwf work with it third party vendor to immediately remediate this issue  nwf also work to identify those who may have provide payment card information during the window identify and locate their address information  
 
upon completion of these activity  nwf move to notify those whose payment card information may be impact  the information potentially affect include customer order and payment information  such a name  address  payment card number  expiration date  and cvv number  
 
notice to iowa resident 
 
on or about march     nwf provide write notice of this incident to affect individual  which include approximately one thousand seventy six     iowa resident  write notice be be provide in substantially the same form a the letter attach here a exhibit a  
 
other step take and to be take

california health   wellness  chw  recently receive a notice from our vendor  accellion  that it be the victim of a cyberattack  we be write to let you know how this incident may have affect your personal information very seriously and we sincerely regret any concern this incident may cause you  
 
why do accellion have my personal information  
 
chw use accellion to exchange data file with healthcare provider and other vendor that support our operation  
 
what happen  
 
on january     accellion inform u that it file transfer platform be compromise by an unknown malicious party  the compromise allow the malicious party to view or download our data file store on accellions system from january  to january     our investigation determine that your personal information due to this incident  but we be notify you out of an abundance of caution  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information involve in this incident may have include your name and one or more of the follow type of information  
 
  address 
  date of birth 
  insurance id number 
  health information  such a your medical condition s  and treatment information 
 
what we be do 
 
we have take the follow action in response to this incident  
 
  upon learn of this incident  we immediately activate our incident response plan and work with accellion to conduct our investigation  
  we analyze the file involve in the incident so we could distribute notification to affect individual a quickly a possible  
  accellion be coordinate it incident response with law enforcement authority  include the unite state federal bureau of investigation  fbi   
  we stop use accellions service and remove all of our data file from it system  
  we review our other file transfer service process and tool to ensure they be not at risk to a similar attack  
 
what you can do 
 
we have no reason to believe that your information have be use improperly  however  we want to be cautious  please review the step below you can take to protect your information  
 
  we be provide you with one year of free identity protection service through idx  idx will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise  below be instruction on how to enroll in this service and a description of the benefit  
 
  enroll online at

  fully manage identity recovery  idx fully manage recovery service provide restoration for identity theft issue  such a account creation  criminal identity theft  medical identity theft  account takeover  rental application  tax fraud  benefit fraud  and utility creation  
 
  please review the information about identity theft protection reference guide  at the end of this letter  which describe additional step you can take to help protect yourself  include recommendation from the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection and detail about how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file

fraud consultation

identity theft restoration

krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file

la clinica have take  and will continue to take  step to prevent this type of incident from happen again  include enhance our data security  implement additional technology safeguard include enhance intrusion detection and prevention  secure login credential  enhance workforce training  and other cybersecurity risk prevention measure  we have also review our security policy and procedure to ensure that they sufficiently protect against further incident of this type  in addition  we notify federal law enforcement authority about the incident and will continue to cooperate with their investigation

what happen

the investigation determine that an unauthorized party gain access to certain bricker internal system at various time between approximately january    and january     find from the investigation indicate that the party obtain some data from certain bricker system during this period  bricker be able to retrieve the data involve from the unauthorized party and have take step to delete the data  at this time  bricker have no reason to believe this data be further copy or retain by the unauthorized party  bricker conduct a thorough review of the data to identify individual whose personal information may have be involve  
 
what information be involve  
 
the review determine that the data involve contain some of your personal information  which may have include your name  address  variable data field  
 
what we be do 
 
to help prevent a similar type of incident from occur in the future  bricker implement additional security protocol design to enhance the security of brickers network  internal system  and application  bricker will also continue to evaluate additional step that may be take to further increase brickers defense go forward  in addition  bricker be continue to support federal law enforcement investigation

march    
 
we be write to notify you of a security incident affect the security of your manhunt account credential  
 
what happen  
 
on march     manhunt discover that an attacker gain access to a database that store account credential for manhunt user  the attacker download the usernames  email address and password for a subset of our user  we immediately take step to remediate the threat and reset the password of affect user  
 
what information be involve  
 
the data element access by the unauthorized attacker include your manhunt username  password  and email address use to register your account  we have no evidence that user picture  message  or other profile information be acquire by the attacker  a we do not transmit or store any payment card information  no payment card information be expose a a result of this incident  
 
what we be do 
 
manhunt take your privacy and security seriously  when we discover this incident  we immediately take step to contain the intrusion and remediate the threat that lead to the unauthorizedaccess  we also reset the password for affect user account and retain a third party forensics consultant to assist u in investigate what happen and confirm that there be no ongoing unauthorizedaccess to our system  
 
what you can do 
 
we have reset your account password  so  if you havent do so already  you will be prompt to create a new password the next time you log in  we strongly encourage you to select a unique password that you have not use for another website or account  if you use your previous manhunt account password on other site  we urge you to change those password a well  additionally  be vigilant for phishing message purport to be from manhunt or claim to have information about your manhunt account  manhunt will never ask you for your password or other sensitive information via email  you should also never click on link in email from sender you do not know  if you notice any unusual activity on your manhunt account or if you receive any unusual communication purport to be from manhunt  please contact u use the contact information below  
 
for more information 
 
we sincerely regret any inconvenience this incident may have cause  if you have any question regard this incident  please contact manhunt at supportmanhunt net  while we have no reason to think that this incident expose any information that could be use to commit identity theft  certain state law require u to provide you with information about prevent and report identity theft  you can find that information below

step you can take to help protect personal information 
 
monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of payment card fraud or misuse  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  if you see any unauthorized or suspicious activity  promptly contact your bank  credit union  or credit card company  
 
under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
place a security freeze 
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com freeze center html 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
woodlyn  pa  
    
www transunion com credit freeze 
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga   
    
www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
in order to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  provide the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    
  if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
place a fraud alert 
 
a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the agency list below  
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx

p o  box

notice of data breach 
 
we  at active lifestyle product   service  inc   d b a a alp s brand  alp   value and respect the privacy of your information  which be why we be write to inform you of a data security incident that have occur  
 
what happen  
 
on february     alp discover a potential security concern with it website s   include  www alpsbrands com  www alpsmountaineering com  www alpsoutdoorz com  www browningcamping com  www hikerdirect com  and www alpscedarridge com  collectively refer to herein a the website   alp move swiftly to engage a service provider to investigate the issue  the next day  february     the service provider that alp engage to investigate the website confirm that alp system have be unlawfully access by an unknown third party  the affect system be immediately disable while alp and it service provider conduct an investigation of the issue to determine if any customer information have be compromise  our technology system have since be secure and restore to work order  
 
what information be involve  
 
an unknown attacker unlawfully breach card  please be rest assure that alp do not collect through the e commerce portion of the website any social security number or protect health information  and so this information be not collect in the attack  
 
what we be do 
 
alp value your privacy and deeply regret that this incident occur  we be conduct a thorough review of the incident  and will notify you if there be any significant development  we engage a service provider to review and secure the system  and we be implement additional security measure design to prevent a recurrence of such an attack and to protect the privacy of our value customer  we be work with the applicable governmental official to ensure the incident be properly report and address  this notice be not delay a a result of a law enforcement investigation  
 
what you can do 
 
please also review the step you can take to further protect your information attachment for further information on step you can take to protect your information  
 
for more information

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include your state attorney general and the federal trade commission  ftc   to file a complaint with the ftc  go to identitytheft gov or call   id theft       complaint file with the ftc will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  which be a database make available to law enforcement agency  
 
obtain and monitor your credit report 
 
we recommend that you obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can access the request form at  or you can elect to purchase a copy of your credit report by contact one of the three national credit report agency  contact information for the three national credit report agency for the purpose of request a copy of your credit report or for general inquiry be provide below  
 
equifax      www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga

trinity health be recently notify by accellion  a third party vendor  of a security incident  the accellion file transfer appliance be use by trinity health and many other company for large file transfer service  trinity health provide information technology service for it current and some former member hospital and health care provider  include file transfer and email service    please see include information about trinity health and the affect location   
 
this letter provide you with information about the event  our response  and step you may take to better protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it be necessary to do so  while we be unaware of misuse of information  we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  we have establish a call center to answer your question        
 
what happen

what information be involve

what we be do

what we be do

fraud alert

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  address history  state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource

what happen

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
the american society for clinical pathology  ascp  be write to inform you of a recent incident that may have affect a limit number of our customer payment card data use at www ascp org  
 
what happen  
we have recently be inform that our e commerce website be the target of a cybersecurity attack that  for a limit time period  potentially expose payment card data a it be enter on our website  we engage external forensic investigator and data privacy professional and conduct a thorough investigation into the incident  
 
what information be involve  
a a result of our investigation  on march     we determine that you use a payment card on the website between the follow date s   insert date  a a result  some of your payment card information may have potentially be expose  include some or all of the follow  name  credit or debit card number  card expiration date and cvv   or  digit code on front or back of card  for your payment card s  end in insert last  digit of card number  
 
please note  we have no evidence that your payment card information have in fact be misuse  but we want to alert you of this incident so that you can take certain measure if you feel it necessary to protect your information  
 
what we be do  
we greatly value our relationship with you  and want to let you know what we be do to further secure your information  we resolve the issue that lead to the potential exposure on the website  we implement additional security safeguard to protect against future intrusion  we continue ongoing intensive monitor of our website  to ensure that it exceed industry standard to be secure of any malicious activity  in addition  we do not store usable payment card data on the website  which greatly limit the potential risk of exposure  
 
what be your option  
below you will find precautionary measure you can always take to protect your personally  best practice include be vigilant in review your financial account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis and contact your bank or card issuer a soon a you see any suspicious transaction  
 
the policy of the payment card brand such a visa  mastercard  american express and discover provide that you be not liable for any unauthorized charge if you report them in a timely manner  you may also ask your bank or card issuer whether a new card should be issue to you  
 
for more information 
if you have any further question regard your potential exposure during this incident  please feel free to call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line to respond to question at insert phone number  this response line be staff with professional knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday    a m  to   p m  eastern time  
 
your trust be a top priority for ascp and we apologize if this cause you any inconvenience  especially during these unprecedented time  we remain commit to the protection of your information  
 
thank you  
ascp customer service

  consider place a security freeze on your credit file 
if you be very concern about become a victim of fraud or identity theft  you may request a security freeze be place on your credit file  at no charge  a security freeze prohibit  with certain specific exception  the consumer report agency from release your credit report or any information from it without your express authorization  you may place a security freeze on your credit report by contact all three nationwide credit report company at the number below and follow the state direction or by send a request in write  by mail  to all three credit report company
