if your personal information have be use to file a false tax return  to open an account or to attempt to open an account in your name or to commit fraud or other crime against you  you may file a police report in the city in which you currently reside  
 
  obtain a free credit report 
under federal law  you be entitle to one free credit report every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call     or request your free credit report online at www annualcreditreport com  once you receive your credit report  review them for discrepancy  identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  verify all information be correct  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report company  
 
  additional helpful resource 
even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  be sure to obtain a copy of the police report  a many creditor will want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you may also file a complaint with the ftc by contact them on the web at www ftc gov idtheft  by phone at   idtheft        or by mail at federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  in addition  you may obtain information from the ftc about fraud alert and security freeze  the breach result in the potential exposure of customer payment card information  include name  credit or debit card number  card expiration date  and cvv code

on march     we determine that w  and w  form and other tax document which include name and social security number of certain current and former u s  employee and independent contractor of atlantic media  inc  and it current and former subsidiary and affiliate  include the atlantic monthly group llc  government executive media group llc  national journal group llc  and quartz media llc  collectively  atlantic media  be impact

what information be involve  
 
we believe that the internal corporate file impact may have include personal information about current or former employee or independent contractor such a  full name and social security or other tax identification number  
 
what we be do  
 
we be work with lead cybersecurity firm to assist our internal team with it investigation  upon learn of the incident  we take immediate measure that we believe terminate the unauthorized actor access a well a mitigate the risk of further attack on our system  these measure include temporarily disable certain system  limit system access  and deploy additional security software on our system  we also inform law enforcement  we be take this incident very seriously and continue to work with cybersecurity expert to identify any additional opportunity for enhance our overall security  
 
what you can do  
 
while we do not have reason to believe that any personally  and a a precaution  we have arrange for you  at your option  to enroll in a complimentary two year credit monitor service provide by idx  which include credit monitor  dark web monitor  identity restoration service  and up to  million of identity theft insurance

dear name  
 
the american college of emergency physician  acep  be write to inform you of an event that may have affect some of your information  acep provide professional organization service to it own member and also provide management service to other similar professional organization in the industry  include the emergency medicine foundation  emf   the emergency medicine resident association  emra   and the society for emergency medicine physician assistant  sempa   you be receive this notice because you be  or be  a member of  make a purchase from  or donate to one or more of these entity  
 
while acep have no indication that your information have be misuse  acep take this event very seriously and be share detail about the event  our response  and step you can take to better protect your information  should you feel it appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on september     acep discover unusual activity on it system  upon discovery  we commence an investigation to determine the full scope of the activity  during the course of the investigation  it be determine that credential to aceps separate sql database server be store on a server that be compromise by an unauthorized actor  while there be no evidence the sql server be subject to unauthorizedaccess or acquisition  because it cannot be rule out  acep notify it partner in an abundance of caution and be provide this notice to you  the information be at risk between the date of april     and september     
 
what information be involve  
 
a review of our sql database server indicate that your name  notice data element be store on an acep sql server at the time of the incident  again  we have not determine that your information be view or take but be provide this notice out of an abundance of caution because the information be accessible during the time of the incident  
 
what acep be do  
 
acep take the security of member and customer information seriously  upon notice of the potential for unauthorized activity  we commence an investigation  rebuild the impact server  change password  and implement additional technical safeguard  acep have also secure the service of epiq to provide you with credit monitor and identity restoration service for twelve    month  at no cost to you  more information on how to take advantage of these service can be find in the enclose step you can take to protect personal information  
 
what you can do

how to enroll

we be write to inform you that hamilton beach brand  inc  recently discover unauthorized computer code on it ecommerce website  www hamiltonbeach com  on february     we immediately remove the unauthorized code and begin an investigation  a cybersecurity firm be engage to assist with our investigation  the code be capable of obtain information enter by customer during the checkout process and send that information out of our system  on march     the investigation determine that an unauthorized person could have access information enter by some customer during the checkout process for order attempt or place between december     and february     
 
the information that could have be copy include contact information such a first and last name  ship and bill address  email address  and phone number  payment card information such a payment card number  expiration date  and card verification code for the payment card end in   variable data   could also have be access  
 
hamilton beach have notify law enforcement and be cooperate with their investigation  we have also notify the payment card network so that they can inform the bank that issue the card  we work to ensure the unauthorized person be no longer able to collect customer information and be take measure to enhance the security of our site  
 
we encourage you to closely review your payment card statement for any unauthorized charge  you should immediately report unauthorized charge to the bank that issue your card because payment card network rule generally provide that cardholder be not responsible for unauthorized charge that be timely report

additional step you can take  
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  unauthorized computer code be discover on an ecommerce website which be capable of obtain information during the checkout process and send that information out of the system  an unauthorized person could have access information enter by some customer during the checkout process for order attempt or place between december     and february     payment card information could have also be access

fraud alert 
 
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze 
 
you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well   
 
  full name  with middle initial and any suffix 
  social security number 
  date of birth 
  current address and any previous address for the past  year 
  any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle 
 
the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue

re  notice of data breach 
 
dear value blade hq customer  
 
we value your business and respect the privacy of your information  which be why  a a precautionary measure  we be write to let you know about a data security incident on the blade hq website  bladehq com  grindworx com  arcform com  or flytanium com  that may involve your personal information  
 
although we be unaware of any actual misuse of your information  we be provide notice to you and other potentially affect customer about the incident  and about tool you can use to protect yourself against possible fraud  
 
what happen  
 
an unknown  unauthorized intruder or intruder appear to have gain access to our host website server and upload malware to our website www bladehq com  potentially gain the capacity to skim customer transaction data a it be be enter by the customer purchase or attempt to purchase our merchandise  our investigation indicate that the intruder may have have this skim capability from january     through march     and on april     the attacker may have gain access to customer transaction information if the customer enter new or update information at the site during that time  because you enter or change your card information or personal information at bladehq com during the suspect period of intrusion  we be notify you about this security incident  
 
you may wonder why you be hear about the incident now  when we first become aware of potentially unusual activity on our website in late march  we immediately hire cybersecurity expert and forensic investigator to assist in our investigation  applicable legal requirement and best practice require that we conduct a complete investigation and cooperate and follow the require protocol of applicable governmental authority in certain jurisdiction  we be also require by law to ensure that certain additional step be follow before notify customer  now that those step and requirement have be complete and our investigation conclude  we be reach out to you  
 
what information be involve  
 
in the case mention above  information that the intruder may have have access to include your first and last name  address  email address  and any debit or credit card number with expiration date and cvv code that you may have enter on our website  
 
what we be do  
 
blade hq value your privacy and deeply regret that this incident occur  we have retain the service of a qualify cybersecurity forensic investigation firm to contain the breach an attack and to protect the privacy of our value customer  we be also work closely with major credit card supplier and governmental authority to ensure that the incident be properly address  
 
what you can do  
 
please also review the attachment to this letter  step you can take to further protect your information  for further information on step you can take to protect your information  
 
for more information  
 
for further information and assistance  please call our response center at      monday through friday from the hour of   a m  to   p m  central standard time  exclude major u holiday  
 
we sincerely apologize for this inconvenience and be grateful for our relationship with you  thank you for your support of blade hq

mark christensen

please feel free to contact our it support group at supportechogroupinc com or call    for further assistance or if you have any question  we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience  please be assure that we be undertake our best effort to resolve this situation and be determine to provide you with the best information we can about what happen

kris hopkins 
v p  of information technology

dear value blade hq customer  
 
we value your business and respect the privacy of your information  which be why  a a precautionary measure  we be write to let you know about a data security incident on the blade hq website  bladehq com  grindworx com  arcform com  or flytanium com  that may involve your personal information  
 
although we be unaware of any actual misuse of your information  we be provide notice to you and other potentially affect customer about the incident  and about tool you can use to protect yourself against possible fraud  
 
what happen  
 
an unknown  unauthorized intruder or intruder appear to have gain access to our host website server and upload malware to our website www bladehq com  potentially gain the capacity to skim customer transaction data a it be be enter by the customer purchase or attempt to purchase our merchandise  our investigation indicate that the intruder may have have this skim capability from january     through march     and on april     the attacker may have gain access to customer transaction information if the customer enter new or update information at the site during that time  because you enter or change your card information or personal information at bladehq com during the suspect period of intrusion  we be notify you about this security incident  
 
you may wonder why you be hear about the incident now  when we first become aware of potentially unusual activity on our website in late march  we immediately hire cybersecurity expert and forensic investigator to assist in our investigation  applicable legal requirement and best practice require that we conduct a complete investigation and cooperate and follow the require protocol of applicable governmental authority in certain jurisdiction  we be also require by law to ensure that certain additional step be follow before notify customer  now that those step and requirement have be complete and our investigation conclude  we be reach out to you  
 
what information be involve  
 
in the case mention above  information that the intruder may have have access to include your first and last name  address  email address  and any debit or credit card number with expiration date and cvv code that you may have enter on our website  
 
what we be do  
 
blade hq value your privacy and deeply regret that this incident occur  we have retain the service of a qualify cybersecurity forensic investigation firm to contain the breach an attack and to protect the privacy of our value customer  we be also work closely with major credit card supplier and governmental authority to ensure that the incident be properly address  
 
what you can do  
 
please also review the attachment to this letter  step you can take to further protect your information  for further information on step you can take to protect your information  
 
for more information  
 
for further information and assistance  please call our response center at      monday through friday from the hour of   a m  to   p m  central standard time  exclude major u holiday  
 
we sincerely apologize for this inconvenience and be grateful for our relationship with you  thank you for your support of blade hq

re  notice of data breach 
 
dear smith   company client  
 
we be write to inform you about a recent incident that may have involve your personal information on behalf of smith   company cpa  this follow up our email on april     when we first report the incident  
 
what happen  
 
we recently discover that we be target by cybercriminals try to obtain client data through our third party software provider  intuit  
 
on march     intuit inform u that our electronic file id number use for tax file with the internal revenue service  irs  be compromise  we immediately notify the irs directly of the fraudulent activity  cease the transmission of all return potentially impact  and work with intuit fraud department to reapply for a new  secure electronic file id number for all tax file go forward  we be proceed with an abundance of precaution in this unfortunate situation  have notify all of our client already of the potentially fraudulent activity in a prior email  
 
what data be potentially involve  
 
we believe that the client data file impact may have include personal information associate with individual tax return  such a full name  address  date of birth  social security number  bank account deposit number  and other tax identification information  
 
what be we do  
 
we be take this incident very seriously by work with our expert information technology organization  a lead cyber security firm  intuit fraud department  and the irs to swiftly remedy the situation and take important precautionary security measure to proactively protect our firm and our client go forward  these measure include  but be not limit to  upgrade our server  reinforce our firewall  administer vulnerability scan  and strengthen internal security protocol  
 
what can you do  
 
in conjunction with the irs  we recommend the follow  
 
  get an identity protection pin from the irs  start this year  you can opt into use an ip pin with the irs to confirm your identity when file your tax return  here be the link to the irs site to register for the ip pin    
  know the sign of identity theft  the irs have a helpful guide for taxpayer    
  remain vigilant and frequently review all credit card activity and account statement for potentially fraudulent activity  
  request free credit report be send to you  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  we recommend periodically obtain credit report from each nationwide credit report agency  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free      you may also contact the three major credit bureau list below directly to request a free copy of your credit report  when you get your credit report  review it carefully  look for account you do not open  look in the inquiry section for name of creditor from whom you have not request credit  some company bill under name other than their store or commercial name  the credit bureau will be able to tell if this be the case  look in the personal activity  
  place security freeze  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  this will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  a security freeze take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of future request or application you make for a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve credit  by federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a security freeze on your credit report  if you want to place a security freeze  please contact the major consumer report agency list below  
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
    
www experian com freeze center html 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
woodlyn  pa  
    
www transunion com credit freeze 
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga   
    
www equifax com personal credit report service 
 
to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  your full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  if you have move in the past five    year  the address where you have live over the prior five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    
  if you be a victim of identity theft  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  
 
  place an initial or extend fraud alert  a an alternative to a security freeze  you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on your file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on your credit file  when a fraud alert appear on your credit file  a business be require to take step to verify your identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  if you want to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the agency list below  
 
equifax   or     
experian   or     
transunion   or     
 
you can also learn about identity theft prevention  fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take to protect yourself by contact the consumer report agency  the federal trade commission  or your state attorney general

please review the last page of this letter for additional information for certain state  
 
we sincerely regret any inconvenience this incident may cause you  please do not cybercriminals target smith   company cpa through a third party software provider  intuit  result in the compromise of the electronic file id number which be report to the irs  the incident involve external bad actor hack into the system

on april     we receive an email from an individual  unauthorized user  state he access a backup file of one of our database contain profile information of survey participant from august and september of   this database be later discover to have be post online  for purchase by the public  
 
  what data be affect  
 
the data that be accessible may include the follow  contact information from   name  e mail address  home address  phone number  date of birth   password from   and  a applicable  response to various question you may have answer a part of create your profile on our platform which may include  but not be limit to  health condition  political affiliation  and ethnicity  it be important to note that the data that be accessible do not include national insurance number  social security number  id number  credit card number  other financial information  or data collect from specific survey you may have take part in  
 
  what be the potential consequence for you  
 
it cannot be rule out that the data set mention above may be misuse  and you may be contact for purpose such a advertise  further  it cannot be exclude that the accessible information may be use to prepare personal profile  which could possibly be use in a commercial or political context  
 
  what we be do  
 
upon receipt of the information from the unauthorized user  we immediately launch an investigation into the matter  within an hour of receive the email from the unauthorized user  we locate the backup file  secure it  and eliminate any further exposure to the file in the cloud service  we also conduct a comprehensive search of all of our database and file and determine that no other file have be expose  and other file be properly secure  we will continue to take step necessary to minimize any disruption that this compromise may have cause and to prevent such incident in the future  furthermore  clearvoice force a password reset for all personal security measure design to prevent a recurrence of such an incident and to protect the privacy of your data  
 
  what you can do  
 
give the type of information that be accessible a part of this incident  we do not believe that there be a risk of identity theft from this incident  however  we encourage you to take usual prudent precaution with your personal information via email or over the phone to any unverified entity  if you continue to use the same password a in   even for other account or platform  there be a risk that an unauthorizedaccess of your account may occur  and you should change your password setting of those other account respectively  
 
  for more information  
 
we have set up a webpage  to provide information  which will be update  a additional information become available  if you have further question regard this incident  please email steven ray at datainquiriesclearvoiceresearch com  
 
we truly apologize for this incident and regret any inconvenience to our panel participant  
 
sincerely  
 
the clearvoice research executive team the breachase by the public

ohl north america  ohl  be commit to protect the privacy of it employee and their family member  a part of this commitment  we be write to advise you of an incident  the incident  that may involve unauthorizedaccess to some of your personal information  set forth below be information concern the incident along with some resource that can help you protect against the possibility of misuse of your information  if you choose to employ them  
 
what happen  
 
during the week of march     ohl discover that a third party access it system  upon discover the unauthorizedaccess  ohl be able to quickly remove the third party from it environment and secure it system  thereafter  ohl commence an investigation with the assistance of a third party consultant to  among other thing  determine the cause of the incident  confirm the third party be expel from it system and to determine if any file be access and exfiltrated  base on the investigation  the third party consultant believe the data breach     and april     on april     ohl first learn that the third party have access and exfiltrated file  
 
what information be involve  
 
we believe the employee file that be access include payroll record  and information on ohls employee benefit plan  these file include  among other thing  your name  address  phone number  email address  date of birth  part or all of your social security number and certain bank account information  but not any password or access code  ohl have report the incident to law enforcement and it investigation of the incident be on go  ohl will update you if there be any material development for your personal data  
 
what we be do  
 
ohl be review it security measure and work to implement additional safeguard to reduce the risk of similar incident occur in the future  in addition  ohl have arrange and be pay for you to receive a twenty four    month membership of experians identityworkssm credit monitor and identity theft protection  depend on which jurisdiction you live in  the membership may also include  million identity theft insurance  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information please follow the step below  
 
ensure that you enroll by      your code will not work after this date

content of data breach notification letter  ad v  
 
notice of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
what happen  
 
we recently receive notification from our website host company that their network security be compromise  allow malware to be download to the host website  a a result  your personal information may have be inappropriately access by an unknown third party  we take immediate action to stop any further access and investigate the incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
on march     we discover that the third party have access to payment transaction make through the host website between december     and march     this include your name  address  and payment card information  include the payment card number  cvc code  and expiration date for the card you use to make a purchase on the website  paypal transaction be and remain secure  
 
what we be do 
 
we take the security of personal vulnerability scan confirm that the website host company corrective action have remove the vulnerability  this allow u to assure you that your transaction on our website remain secure  
 
what you can do 
 
although we have take step to protect your information from be use inappropriately  we recommend that you review your payment card account statement closely for any unauthorized transaction  if you suspect unauthorized activity on your payment card s   you should report it to the bank that issue your card immediately  you be not responsible for unauthorized charge on your credit card in an amount over  if you report the charge promptly within the adequate timeframe under the fair credit bill act  please also review the enclose additional important information section include with this letter  this section describe additional step you can take to help protect yourself  include recommendation by the federal trade commission  ftc  regard detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file  should you choose to do so  you can also contact the ftc for more information  
 
for more information 
 
if you have additional question or concern regard this incident  please call    between   a m  and   p m  eastern time  monday through friday  
 
we take the security of all information in our system seriously  please know that the protection of your personal information be our utmost priority  and we sincerely regret any inconvenience that this matter may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
mitch nelson 
 
co founder

for resident of all state  it be recommend that you remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review payment card account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  whether or not you suspect any unauthorized activity on your account  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com  or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available at  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga     
 
fraud alert  you can place fraud alert with the three credit bureau by phone and online with equifax   experian   or transunion   a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  initial fraud alert last for one year  victim of identity theft can also get an extend fraud alert for seven year  the phone number for all three credit bureau be at the bottom of this page  
 
monitor  you should always remain vigilant and monitor your account for suspicious or unusual activity  
 
security freeze  you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you need to make a request to each consumer report agency by certify mail  overnight mail  regular stamp mail  or by follow the instruction find at the website list below  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze for yourself or your spouse or a minor under      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year     proof of current address  such a current utility or telephone bill  bank or insurance statement     legible photocopy of government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and    if you be a victim of identity theft  include a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  it be free to place  lift  or remove a security freeze

content of data breach 
 
northern california medical associate inc   ncma  be provide notice of an event that may affect the privacy of certain patient personal step individual can take  should they feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on march     ncma detect unusual activity on it computer system  upon detection of the activity  we shut down portion of our network  reset password  and commence an investigation that include work with computer forensic specialist to determine the nature and scope of the event  during the course of the investigation  we learn that unauthorizedaccess to the ncma network begin on february     and culminate in unauthorized encryption of certain ncma server and workstation on march     on or about march     we confirm that certain data from our system be take in the event  a a result  ncma be provide this notice that information hold by ncma may have be view or take by an unauthorized actor  
 
what information be involve  
 
while we currently have no evidence that any information be use to commit identity theft or fraud  the type of information potentially acquire include  name  contact information  social security number  driver license state identification number  financial account information  medical record number patient identification number  medical information  such a medical history  diagnosis  treatment information  physician information  and or prescription medication information  a well a health insurance information  
 
what we be do  
 
ncma take this incident and the security of personal monitor tool on our network  we also notify law enforcement and be notify regulator where necessary  
 
what you can do  
 
ncma encourage all individual to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review account statement and explanation of benefit  and monitor free credit report for suspicious activity  we also encourage individual to review the below step you can take to protect personal action individual may take to protect their information should they feel it appropriate to do so  
 
for more information  
 
you can contact ncma at      you may write to ncma at  mendocino ave     santa rosa  ca   ncma will be declare chapter  bankruptcy on may     
 
step you can take to protect personal information 
 
monitor your account 
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a fraud alert or credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax 
experian 
transunion

additional information 
 
you may further educate yourself regard identity theft  fraud alert  credit freeze  and the step you can take to protect your personal information by contact the consumer report bureau  the federal trade commission  or your state attorney general  
 
the federal trade commission may be reach at   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc   www identitytheft gov    id theft        and tty       the federal trade commission also encourage those who discover that their information have be misuse to file a complaint with them  you can obtain further information on how to file such a complaint by way of the contact information list above  you have the right to file a police report if you ever experience identity theft or fraud  please note that in order to file a report with law enforcement for identity theft  you will likely need to provide some proof that you have be a victim  instance of know or suspect identity theft should also be report to law enforcement and your state attorney general  this notice have not be delay by law enforcement  
 
for district of columbia resident  the district of columbia attorney general may be contact at   th st  nw washington  d c        and oagdc gov  for maryland resident  the maryland attorney general may be contact at   st  paul place  th floor  baltimore  md       or      and www oag state md u  for north carolina resident  the north carolina attorney general may be contact at   mail service center  raleigh  nc        or      and www ncdoj gov  for rhode island resident  the rhode island attorney general may be reach at   south main street  providence  ri   www riag ri gov  and      under rhode island law  you have the right to obtain any police the incident involve unauthorizedaccess to ncmas network  which result in unauthorized encryption of certain server and workstation  additionally  certain data from their system be take without authorization

dear first name  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent security incident that involve the st century insurance online automobile insurance quote tool  
 
what happen  
 
i be write to let you know that between january     and february     unknown malicious actor target the st century auto quote system to obtain various individual personal information and begin work to identify the potentially affect individual  we be notify you and any consumer who we believe be affect by this incident  however  we believe some people receive this letter may have make valid quote request or have someone in their household make valid quote request on our website during the applicable time period  therefore  if a valid quote request be make on our website during the relevant time period  then it be possible that your information may not have be expose in this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
we believe that the malicious actor have certain personal information seriously and be alert you so you can take step to help protect yourself  to do so  we encourage you to take the step that be outline below  
 
what we be do  
 
cyberscout have be retain to help you with any question or problem you may encounter relate to this matter  include obtain a credit report  credit monitor  and place fraud alert on your behalf  to assist you  we be provide you with access to single bureau credit monitor triple bureau credit report  service at no charge  these service provide you with alert for twelve month from the date of enrollment when change occur to your experian credit file  this notification be send to you the same day that the change or update take place with the bureau  in addition  we be provide you with proactive fraud assistance to help with any question that you might have or in the event that you become a victim of fraud  these service will be provide by cyberscout  a company specialize in fraud assistance and remediation service  
 
to enroll in credit monitor  service at no charge  please log on to  or csprotect com  click the sign up button  and follow the instruction to create your account  enter your information and the follow access code to complete your registration    access code    next  click the use now link on the monitor service tile to verify your identity and activate your monitor service  in order for you to receive the monitor service describe above  you must enroll within  day from the date of this letter  
 
what you can do  
 
in addition to enroll in credit monitor  we recommend that you take the follow precaution  
 
order your free credit report 
 
you be entitle under u s  law to one free credit report annually from each of the three national credit bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com  call toll free at     or complete the annual credit report request form on the u s  federal trade commission website at www ftc gov and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    do not contact the three credit bureau individually  they provide free annual credit report only through the website or toll free number  
 
when you receive your credit report  review it carefully  look for account you do not open  inquiry from creditor you do not initiate  and any inaccurate personal information  such a your home address and telephone number  you should notify the credit bureau of any inaccuracy in your report  whether due to error or fraud  a soon a possible so the information can be investigate and  if find to be in error  correct  if there be account or charge you do not authorize  immediately notify the appropriate credit bureau by telephone and in write  you should also call your local police department and file a report of identity theft  get and keep a copy of the police report because you may need to give copy to creditor to clear up your record or to access transaction record  even if there be no sign of fraud  you should continue to check your credit report every three month for the next year  
 
place a fraud alert on your credit bureau file 
 
a fraud alert instruct issuer of credit to use more than normal scrutiny for any request for new or additional credit  this add a layer of protection  but it might limit your ability to obtain instant credit  for example  an instant credit card offer by a retail store   you can place a fraud alert by contact one of three national consumer report agency directly at

free credit report  
 
it be recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  especially activity that may indicate fraud and identity theft  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  
 
you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past  year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  the breach be cause by unknown individual gain access to seiu  benefit group system and delete certain information  include personally identifiable information and protect health information

what information be involve

the investigation reveal that the prefill process populate some or all of the follow information  first and last name  driver license number  date of birth and or gender  
 
what you can do  
 
we have secure the service of kroll to provide a complimentary one year identity monitor service which include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  these service be completely free and activate this program will not hurt your credit score  visit  to activate and take advantage of your identity monitor service  you have until august     to activate your identity monitor service

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
single bureau credit monitor 
 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data  for instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
 
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
 
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  
 
there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  
 
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  state automobile mutual insurance company be hack by an unknown actor who use address not obtain from state auto to initiate quote for auto insurance for individual with whom state auto have no prior relationship  which lead to an unusual pattern within an application process normally use by their agent to obtain quote for prospective customer  the activity occur between march  and march     and personal information such a first and last name  driver license number  date of birth and or gender be access

  the personally identifiable information of approximately   employee and former employee  and   dsh job applicant who never become dsh employee

what information be involve  
the confidential information contain  
   individual name  alien registration number  a number  and expiration date  type of visa  and the date of your certificate of naturalization

at this time  dsh have no evidence that there have be any use or attempt use of the information compromise by this incident  the investigation be ongoing  if it be determine that more information be access than what be provide in this notice of data breach letter  another notification will be provide to the affect individual within the timeframe provide by law after the discovery that more information be access  
 
what we be do

what happen

there be no evidence that other university system be impact

notice of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident involve an online auto insurance quote platform operate by midvale indemnity company  midvale   you may have be affect by an unauthorized attempt to obtain your personal data through this quote platform  
 
this letter will provide you with information about the incident and a no cost service that midvale be make available to you to help monitor potential misuse of your personal data  
 
what happen 
 
we believe unauthorized party may have use an automate bot process to obtain your driver license number by enter personal information  such a your name and address  they acquire from unknown source into a midvale quote platform  we be notify you because you may have be affect by this incident  if you do not request an insurance quote use a midvale quote platform between january     and january     the unauthorized party may have request a quote in your name and may have obtain your driver license number  if  however  you do request a quote from a midvale quote platform between january     and january     you be not affect by this incident  
 
what information be involve 
 
to the extent you be affect by this incident  unauthorized party may have obtain your driver license number  we have reason to believe this data may be use to fraudulently apply for unemployment benefit in your name  please carefully review any write communication you receive from your state unemployment agency  especially if you have not apply for unemployment benefit  if you suspect that your data have be use to fraudulently apply for unemployment benefit  you should contact the relevant state unemployment agency immediately  
 
what we be do 
 
we identify the unauthorized activity and immediately take action to address it  we block the activity and work to notify potentially affect consumer  we take our responsibility to safeguard personal information seriously  and we have enhance our security control to help prevent this type of incident from recur  
 
to help protect you  we be offer you single bureau credit monitor  service free of charge  these service from cyberscout  an independent outside firm  will provide you with alert for twelve month from the date of enrollment whenever change occur to your experian credit file  the alert be send to you the same day that the change or update take place with the credit bureau  
 
to enroll in these service  please log on to  and follow the online instruction  when prompt  please provide the follow unique code to receive service   code here  
 
important 
 
you must register your account and activate your monitor service within  day from the date of this letter  otherwise  your ability to access the service will expire  
 
there be no delay in provide you this notification a a result of a law enforcement investigation  
 
what you can do 
 
if you wish to monitor your own credit report for unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at       
 
additional information on identity theft protection be also provide in the enclose page entitle information about identity theft protection  
 
for more information 
 
we take the security and privacy of your information very seriously and apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have cause  if you have any question or concern regard this matter  please contact cyberscout at      from   be to   pm eastern time monday through friday

chris szafranski

what happen  
 
county of orange social service agency  ssa  be write to you because of a privacy security incident that be discover in april  within the agencys family self sufficiency and adult service division  a former employee with access to ssa computer system may have inappropriately access and use your and or your family information without a business purpose  
 
what information be involve  
 
the follow information item about you and your family may have be access  first name  last name  phone number  address  social security number  date of birth  passport  driver license  e mail address  birth and marriage certificate  immigration document  tax document  bank statement  utility record  employment record  and medical record  
 
what we be do

what you can do  
 
we recognize this breach may be of significant concern to you and your family  therefore  we be take step to ensure your privacy and benefit information be better protect in the future  ssa have retain epiq  www epiqglobal com  to provide one    year of complimentary mytrueidentity b credit monitor service  
 
to enroll in this service  go to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the follow  letter activation code   insert unique  letter activation code   and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute

p o  box  
portland  or

notice of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident involve an online auto insurance quote platform of american family mutual insurance company  s i   american family   you may have be affect by an unauthorized attempt to obtain your personal data through this quote platform  
 
this letter will provide you with information about the incident and a no cost service that american family be make available to you to help monitor potential misuse of your personal data  
 
what happen 
 
we believe unauthorized party may have use an automate bot process to obtain your driver license number by enter personal information  such a your name and address  they acquire from unknown source into the american family quote platform  we be notify you because you may have be affect by this incident  if you do not request an insurance quote use the american family quote platform between february     and march     the unauthorized party may have request a quote in your name and may have obtain your driver license number  if  however  you do request a quote from the american family quote platform between february     and march     you be not impact by this incident  
 
what information be involve 
 
to the extent you be affect by this incident  unauthorized party may have obtain your driver license number  we have reason to believe this data may be use to fraudulently apply for unemployment benefit in your name  please carefully review any write communication you receive from your state unemployment agency  especially if you have not apply for unemployment benefit  if you suspect that your data have be use to fraudulently apply for unemployment benefit  you should contact the relevant state unemployment agency immediately  
 
what we be do 
 
we identify the unauthorized activity and immediately take action to address it  we block the activity and work to notify potentially affect consumer  we take our responsibility to safeguard personal information seriously  and we have enhance our security control to help prevent this type of incident from recur  to help protect you  we be offer you single bureau credit monitor  service free of charge  these service from cyberscout  an independent outside firm  will provide you with alert for twelve month from the date of enrollment whenever change occur to your experian credit file  the alert be send to you the same day that the change or update take place with the credit bureau  
 
to enroll in these service  please log on to  and follow the online instruction  when prompt  please provide the follow unique code to receive service   code here  
 
important 
 
you must register your account and activate your monitor service within  day from the date of this letter  otherwise  your ability to access the service will expire  there be no delay in provide you this notification a a result of a law enforcement investigation  
 
what you can do 
 
if you wish to monitor your own credit report for unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at       
 
additional information on identity theft protection be also provide in the enclose page entitle information about identity theft protection  
 
for more information 
 
we take the security and privacy of your information very seriously and apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have cause  if you have any question or concern regard this matter  please contact cyberscout at      from   be to   pm eastern time monday through friday  
 
sincerely  
 
chris szafranski

what information be involve

if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year unusual network activity be identify  and it be find that the file server be unauthorizedly access  mean it be hack by an external  
content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you about a recent security incident that occur between july     and october     which result in unauthorizedaccess to our network  the privacy and security of the personal information we maintain be of utmost importance to m bar c construction  we have take appropriate measure to protect your information and want to provide you with information about the incident and the service we be make available to you  
 
after launch an investigation in consultation with outside cybersecurity professional  we have determine that your full name and one or more of the follow  to the extent we maintain this information about you  be potentially accessible without authorization in connection with this incident  social security number  driver license number  and or bank account information  
 
to help protect you from potential misuse of your information  we have secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year  for more information on identity theft prevention and instruction on how to activate your one year membership  please see the additional information provide in this letter  
 
we recommend that you place an initial one year fraud alert on your credit file  at no charge  to tell creditor to contact you personally before they open any new account  you may also consider place a security freeze on your credit file  which prohibit  with certain specific exception  the consumer report agency from release your credit report or any information from it without your express authorization  
 
we apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have cause and be commit to maintain the privacy of personal information in our possession  if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question at phone number  the response line be available monday through friday    a m  to   p m  central time  exclude major u s  holiday  
 
sincerely  
 
m bar c construction

content of data breach notification letter  notice of potential data security incident 
 
may    
 
a recent potential data security incident experience by phillip galyen p c   galyen  may have impact personal information  
 
what happen  
 
in march   the galyen it department discover unusual activity within their network environment  galyen conduct an investigation and hire independent computer forensic investigator to help determine what happen  the investigation discover that a malicious actor may have access the galyen network without authorization  the malicious actor may have access and acquire certain personal information associate with client and employee of galyen  
 
what information be involve  
 
this incident may have involve information individual provide to galyen in connection with their representation or employment  the information may include individual name  date of birth  driver license or personal information  
 
what be we do  
 
a soon a the incident be discover  galyen take the step describe above  galyen be notify potentially impact individual through this website notice  in addition  galyen be offer certain individual who may have be impact with information about step they can take to help protect their personal information  along with complimentary credit monitor and identity remediation service  further  galyen report the incident to the federal bureau of investigation and will provide whatever cooperation be necessary to help prevent fraudulent activity and facilitate prosecution of the perpetrator  
 
for more information  
 
if you have any question or think your personal information may have be affect  can confirm your connection to galyen  and would like to inquire about enroll in the free credit and identity monitor service  please call     monday through friday from   be to   pm central time  
 
step you can take to protect your personal information  
 
while galyen be not aware of the misuse of any information involve in this incident  galyen encourage potentially affect individual to remain vigilant by take the follow step  
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   under rhode island and massachusetts law  you have the right to file a police report in connection with this incident

fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov and www ftc gov idtheft       
 
you also have certain right under the fair credit report act  fcra   these right include to know what be in your file  to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  to have consumer report agency correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  a well a others  for more information about the fcra  and your right pursuant to the fcra  please visit   
 
personal information of a minor  
 
you can request that each of the three national credit report agency perform a manual search for a minor social security number to determine if there be an associate credit report  copy of identify information for the minor and parent guardian may be require  include birth or adoption certificate  social security card and government issue identification card  if a credit report exist  you should request a copy of the report and immediately report any fraudulent account to the credit report agency  you can also report any misuse of a minor information to the ftc at  for more information about child identity theft and instruction for request a manual social security number search  visit the ftc website   the breach involve unauthorizedaccess to the organization network by a malicious actor
