re  notification pursuant to iowa code c  
 
dear attorney general miller  
 
we be write on behalf of our client  insurance technology corporation  itc   to notify you of a breach     
 
nature of the incident 
 
itc provide insurance broker with technology solution include a software application call agencymatrix  which offer a cloud base agency management system that allow broker to effectively manage their business  on february     an unauthorized third party gain access to the agencymatrix application and acquire certain personalysis of the incident  
 
a part of it investigation  itc determine that the personal information involve in this incident may have include individual full name and social security number and or driver license number  and possibly their date of birth and or usernames and password to the agencymatrix application  to date  itc have no evidence that any of the information potentially involve in this incident have be misuse  
 
step take relate to the incident 
 
itc provide substitute notice in usa today on april     itc begin mail notification to the potentially affect iowa resident on may     via u s  mail on behalf of it insurance broker customer who opt in for itc to do so  a sample copy of the notice that be send to those individual be attach hereto at exhibit b  in order to be fully transparent  we attach a sample copy of the notice that include the most comprehensive description of personal information involve in this incident  with that say  not all of these data element apply to the entire population of individual affect  thus  we send the same version of this notice with different variation of data element affect with respect to each iowa resident  
 
out of an abundance of caution  itc provide the potentially affect iowa resident whose social security number and or driver license number may have be involve in this incident with credit monitor and identity protection service through transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  at no charge for a period of twelve    month  and have also set up a dedicate support line that will be staff to answer any question individual may have about this incident or the service available to them  shortly after discover this issue  itc reset all valid password to the agencymatrix application  
 
in response to this incident  and a part of itcs continuous commitment to enhance the security of it infrastructure  itc have implement additional security measure to help protect the privacy of the information store on it system  itc continue to evaluate and modify it security measure  not only in response to this specific incident  but also in response to the ever change security landscape  
 
if you have any further inquiry concern this notification  please do not hesitate to contact me  
 
sincerely  
 
jennifer l  urban 
foley   lardner llp

step you can take to protect personal information 
 
monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your account and monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
 
  social security number  
 
  date of birth  
 
  address for the prior two to five year  
 
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
 
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax experian transunion

additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  
 
additional information for resident of the follow state  
 
connecticut  you may contact and obtain information from your state attorney general at  connecticut attorney general office   capitol ave  hartford  ct        www ct gov ag 
district of columbia  you may contact and obtain information from your attorney general at  office of the attorney general for the district of columbia   th street nw  washington  dc        www oag dc gov 
maryland  you may contact and obtain information from your state attorney general at  maryland attorney general office   st  paul place  baltimore the breach

what we be do

step you can take to help protect personal information 
 
monitor your account 
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax 
experian 
transunion

what happen

what information be involve

what we be do

fraud alert  
 
you may place a fraud alert in your file by call one of the three nationwide credit report agency above  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  
 
security freeze  
 
you have the ability to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may be able to use an online process  an automate telephone line  or a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue

on may     we identify unusual network activity  we immediately initiate our incident response protocol  which include isolate potentially impact device and shut off select system  we also begin an investigation with the assistance of computer forensic firm  the investigation determine that an unauthorized person gain access to our network  deploy malware  and  on april     acquire copy of some of the document on our system  on may     we discover that some of those document contain patient information  
 
upon conduct a review of those document  we determine that one or more file may have reflect your name  address  date of birth  social security number and or driver license number  health insurance information  medical record number  patient account number  and or clinical information  such a physician name  date s  of service  and or treatment information  
 
we have no indication that any of your information have be use to commit fraud  however  a a precaution  we be offer you a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworkssm credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information provide with this letter  
 
we also recommend that you review the statement you receive from your healthcare provider and health insurer  if you see any medical service that you do not receive  please call the provider or insurer immediately  
 
to help prevent something like this from happen again  we be continue to implement enhancement to our information security  system  and monitor capability  we deeply regret that this incident occur and for any concern this may cause you  we value your trust and confidence in scripps health and look forward to continue to serve you

content of data breach notification letter  azusa police department provide notification of data security incident 
 
on march     the city of azusa police department discover that certain aspect of it computer system be inaccessible  azusa police immediately contact it law enforcement partner and begin work with third party specialist to determine the source of the incident and the extent of system affect  the investigation determine that azusa police be the victim of a sophisticate ransomware attack and that certain system and information be access by an unauthorized individual  azusa police refuse to cooperate with the cybercriminal and do not pay any ransom  
 
on april     the investigation determine that certain azusa police information be acquire by the unauthorized individual during the incident  the information may have include social security number  driver license number  california identification card number  passport number  military identification number  financial account information  medical information  health insurance information  and or information or data collect through the use or operation of an automate license plate recognition system  although the police department have no evidence of actual or attempt misuse of information  it be provide notice to the public in an abundance of caution  
 
azusa police continue to review it network security policy and take additional step to further enhance it security  a it take the privacy and security of all information very seriously  the department also establish a dedicate assistance line to address question individual may have and to provide credit monitor service to potentially impact individual  
 
azusa police encourage individual to remain vigilant in regularly review and monitor their credit report account statement for suspicious activity and to detect error  additionally  individual can review the step provide in the notification to protect their information and contact the dedicate assistance line to obtain enrollment information for the credit monitor service be offer  
 
for more information  azusa police have establish a dedicate assistance line that can be reach at     monday through friday   a m  to  p m  pacific time  this notice be not delay by law enforcement  
 
individual want more information about step they can take to protect their information can obtain a copy of their credit report at no cost from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  they can also take step recommend by the federal trade commission to protect themselves from identity theft  the ftcs website offer helpful information at www ftc gov idtheft  
 
individual can contact one of the major credit report company for assistance in place a fraud alert or security freeze on their account  the contact information for transunion  experian  and equifax be provide in the notification  the breach be cause by a hack activity  
insufficient information there be not enough information provide to make a determination on the type of breach

additional step you can take  
 
we remind you that it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
federal trade commission 
consumer response center 
 pennsylvania avenue nw 
washington  dc  
  idtheft     
www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze 
po box  
allen  tx  
www experian com 
 
transunion security freeze 
po box  
chester  pa  
www transunion com 
 
equifax security freeze 
po box  
atlanta  ga  
www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the victor valley union high school district computer system be infect with malware and data on these system be subsequently access by an unauthorized party

public ally  inc   public ally   be write to inform you of an event that may impact the security of some of your information  while we be unaware of any attempt or actual misuse of your information  we be provide you with information about the event  our response  and step you may take to better protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it be necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on or about december     public ally learn that a database of employee or applicant usernames and password information have be find on the internet a part of a much larger data leak claim to be the result of data steal from a number of organization  we immediately undertake an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the issue  include whether this information have be leak in relation to any compromise of our internal computer system  our investigation find no indication of unauthorizedaccess to our internal computer system  but nonetheless we feel it be necessary to review the impact database find on the internet to determine the impact individual  we then conduct a thorough manual review of our record to determine the identity and contact information for potentially impact individual  we recently complete our review and be provide notice to impact individual  
 
what information be involve  
 
we determine the follow type of your information be impact  name and your organization or profile username and password  
 
what we be do  
 
we take this incident and the security of your personal safeguard to further secure the information in our system  
 
what you can do

step you can take to protect your information 
 
monitor your account 
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a fraud alert or credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax experian transunion 
  
  
  
         
 
equifax fraud alert  p o  box  atlanta  ga   
experian fraud alert  p o  box   allen  tx

equifax credit freeze  p o  box  atlanta  ga   
experian credit freeze  p o  box   allen  tx  
transunion credit freeze  p o  box   woodlyn  pa  
 
additional information 
 
you may further educate yourself regard identity theft  fraud alert  credit freeze  and the step you can take to protect your personal information by contact the consumer report bureau  the federal trade commission  or your state attorney general  the federal trade commission may be reach at   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc   www identitytheft gov    id theft        and tty       the federal trade commission also encourage those who discover that their information have be misuse to file a complaint with them  you can obtain further information on how to file such a complaint by way of the contact information list above  you have the right to file a police report if you ever experience identity theft or fraud  please note that in order to file a report with law enforcement for identity theft  you will likely need to provide some proof that you have be a victim  instance of know or suspect identity theft should also be report to law enforcement and your state attorney general  this notice have not be delay by law enforcement  
 
for district of columbia resident  the district of columbia attorney general may be contact at   th st  nw washington  d c        and oag dc gov  for maryland resident  the maryland attorney general may be contact at   st  paul place  th floor  baltimore  md       or      and www oag state md u  for rhode island resident  the rhode island attorney general may be reach at   south main street  providence  ri   www riag ri a database of employee or applicant usernames and password be find on the internet a part of a much larger data leak claim to be the result of data steal from a number of organization  public ally investigate the issue and find no indication of unauthorizedaccess to their internal computer system  but the database be still review to determine the impact individual

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant and review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you should also promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  the ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can also contact one of the follow three national credit report agency

atlanta  ga  
    
www annualcreditreport com 
 
fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  there be no charge to place  lift or remove the security freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov or www ftc gov idtheft       resident of new york  maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

what happen  
 
on may     we become aware of the presence of malicious code  or malware  on our website a a part of a review of our system prompt by a third party notice of fraudulent activity which may have involve payment card of customer who have visit our website www alituranaturals com between late  and early   we immediately remove the code  at this time  we believe that the malicious code be on our website from early october  to may     
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information involve may have include your name  address  and debit and or credit card information  a a result  this information may be at an increase risk of fraudulent use  
 
what we be do 
 
we be provide you with this notice to meet our legal obligation  but also so that you may take additional step to protect yourself  in addition  we be take several step to further strengthen and enhance our information security control to help prevent this from happen again  include accelerate the launch of our brand new website on an e commerce platform with more robust data security  
 
what you can do 
 
you should remain vigilant against identity theft  and we recommend that you review your bank or credit card statement carefully for unauthorized charge  if you do discover fraudulent charge  we recommend that you contact the fraud department at your bank or credit card company to cancel your card  and to request that a new one be issue  also  enclose be an information about identity theft protection guide  which describe recommendation by the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection and detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file  
 
for more information 
 
your trust be of paramount importance to u  and we be take this very seriously  we apologize for any inconvenience this incident may cause you  if you have any question  please call     from  a m  and  p m  pt monday through friday or email supportalituranaturals com  
 
sincerely  
 
andy hnilo 
ceo

re  notice of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
we be write to advise you of an incident  incident  that may involve unauthorizedaccess to some of your personal information on behalf of progrexion asg  inc   progrexion   locate at  east  south  salt lake city  ut   set forth below be important information concern the incident along with some resource that may help you protect against the possibility of misuse of your information  
 
what happen  
 
on april     progrexion discover search pattern that indicate a malicious third party be use progrexions public face platform to request certain information to help individual decide if progrexions assistance be require  while the information the malicious third party obtain do not include your social security number or any password or access code to account that you maintain  it appear that the malicious third party may have already possess this or similar information about you from some source other than progrexion  the malicious third party use this information to access progrexions public face platform to possibly view your fico score  account number or institution identity  e g   name of a bank   and limit detail about that account  e g   if any payment be late   
 
what information be involve  
 
the information that be potentially involve in the incident may have include your fico score  account number or institution identity  e g   name of a bank   and limit detail about that account  e g   if any payment be late  balance  and the like   it be important to note that the third party do not access from progrexion your social security number  or any password or access code to account that you maintain  
 
what be we do

content of data breach notification letter  subject  mcccd data security incident investigation complete 
 
dear   name    
 
we be write to inform you that the maricopa county community college district  mcccd  have complete it forensic investigation into the data security incident that occur on march     please read this email in it entirety for more information on the incident  mcccds response and find  and step you can take to further protect yourself  
 
what happen  
 
on march     mcccds third party monitor vendor detect suspicious activity on a system within the network  to protect our system and data  we immediately implement our incident response protocol and take all system offline  we hire a team of expert to investigate the suspicious activity and guide u through the containment and restoration process  
 
the forensic investigation determine that mcccd likely identify and prevent a potential ransomware attack  the investigation also identify an attempt to download a maricopa directory file contain the name  date of birth  email address  and hash password for maricopa user account  the password within the file be hash  which mean the password be unreadable without a key to decrypt or breachanged their password  
 
what information be impact  
 
it important to note that the student information and human resource management system be not host within the mcccd network and be completely unaffected by this incident  we be confident that no student or employee information from these system  such a social security number  educational information  or financial data  be compromise a a result of this incident  
 
what we be do and what you can do  
 
to increase protection against future incident  we have accelerate the implementation of new security measure to layer on to the security protocol we have in place prior to march th  they include  
 
  supplemental x endpoint detection and threat hunt software 
  additional deployment of multi factor authentication for all mcccd employee 
  force password reset to all mcccd user  include staff and student  
 
if you have already log on and complete a password reset  then you do not need to do it again  
 
go forward  we ask that you follow these guideline relate to usernames password  
 
  while on the network  do not ask website or account that you visit to remember your password s   
  you should avoid use your school email address password combination for any account that be not school relate  and do not use your school password for other account  
  if you do  we recommend change the password to those account  
  do not re use the same password for more than one website or account  
 
include in this email be tip for create strong and complex password  and detail on step that can be take to further protect your information  
 
if you have any question or concern  please contact the mcccd customer care center through live chat with extend availability or you may call     and choose option   monday through friday from  p m     p m   pacific standard time   
 
sincerely  
 
james curtin

at alderson broaddus university  we understand the importance of protect the information we maintain  i be write to inform you of an incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step that you may consider take  
 
what happen  
 
we complete an investigation into unauthorizedaccess to some of our computer system  upon discover the incident  we immediately take step to secure our network  contact law enforcement  and begin an investigation with the assistance of a cybersecurity firm  our investigation determine that an unauthorized person obtain access to some of our system at various time between january     and january     and take some file out of our network  we be not able to fully determine the file that be take and so conduct a review of the file that may have be involve  
 
what information be involve  
 
on april     we determine that some of your information be contain in the file that may have be take by the unauthorized person  include your name and social security number  
 
what we be do  
 
your confidence and trust be important to u  and we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  to further protect information in our system  we have implement additional safeguard and technical security measure  include multi factor authentication and additional password requirement  
 
what you can do  
 
while we have no indication that your information have be or will be misuse  we want to notify you of this incident and assure you that we take it very seriously  out of an abundance of caution  we have secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor service at no cost to you for one year  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  visit   idmonitoringurl   to activate and take advantage of your identity monitor service  you have until   date   to activate your identity monitor service

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
triple bureau credit monitor 
 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data at any of the three national credit bureau  for instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the universitys computer system be access by an unauthorized person who take some file out of their network  the incident be investigate by a cybersecurity firm and law enforcement be contact

san dieguito union high school district  san dieguito  be write to inform you of an event that may impact the privacy of some of your student personal information  we be provide you with information about the event and the step you may take to protect against the possibility of misuse of your student information  should you feel it appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
on or about april     san dieguito become aware of a suspicious mass email communication that appear to have be send in batch to the student body  the email contain an attachment with a list of student and limit student information  upon discovery  san dieguito immediately launch an internal investigation to determine the nature and scope of the activity  through this investigation  san dieguito determine that a former student send the email to the student body which contain an attachment  
 
what information be involve  
the internal investigation confirm that the email attachment contain student name  directory information  and username and password for your student san dieguito email account  
 
what we be do  
we take this incident and the security of personal safeguard to further secure the information in our system  san dieguito also notify regulatory authority  a require by law  
 
what you can do  
a a best practice  san dieguito encourage your student to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review account statement and to monitor credit report for suspicious activity  although no social security number be expose by this event  you can find more information on the resource available to you and your student in the enclose step you can take to protect personal information  we also encourage your student to practice good password hygiene and to reset their password  we previously provide instruction on how to reset your student email account password  instruction on how to reset the password can be find at my sduhsd net  
 
for more information  
we understand that you may have question about this incident that be not address in this letter  if you have additional question  please contact miquel jacob at    ext

step you can take to protect personal information 
 
monitor your account 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a fraud alert or credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax experian transunion

you may further educate yourself regard identity theft  fraud alert  credit freeze  and the step you can take to protect your personal malicious behavior or physicalloss of data

referee     crx id number   
 
dear   name     
 
capturerx be a vendor that provide service to certain healthcare provider  include   entity name long    capturerx be write  on behalf of   entity name short   to notify you of a recent event at capturerx that may affect the privacy of some of your personal information  we be provide you with information about the event  our response to it  and resource available to you to help protect your information  should you feel it appropriate to do so  
 
what happen

what happen

what information be involve

what we be do

dear   name     
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident involve blackbaud  inc  blackbaud  that have result in the exposure of your personal information  archbishop mitty high school take the security of your information very seriously  and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this incident may cause  this letter contain information about the incident and resource we be make available to you  
 
what happen 
blackbaud be a cloud compute provider that be use by archbishop mitty high school and many other educational institution to organize and store information relate to member of our community  in particular  archbishop mitty high school utilize blackbauds financial edge platform for student bill purpose  certain historical student data store on the financial edge platform include student social security number  at the time  blackbaud assure archbishop mitty high school that all social security number and date of birth store in financial edge be encrypt  however  in september   blackbaud advise archbishop mitty high school for the first time that social security number  and in some instance  date of birth  be not in fact encrypt for certain legacy version of financial edge  and that this information be compromise a a result of a cyber attack on blackbaud  in response to the september  notice from blackbaud  archbishop mitty high school open a thorough internal review of the record maintain by our institution via blackbaud and work extensively with blackbaud to determine the scope of this incident and it impact on archbishop mitty high school student and alumnus record  
 
what information be involve 
in late september   blackbaud advise archbishop mitty high school that backup file contain personal information such a your date of birth  mail address  and telephone number  
 
accord to blackbaud  and a far a we know  there be no indication that any of the expose information have be subject to misuse or to further dissemination  blackbaud have also assure u that they have implement several change to protect your data from any subsequent incident  again  while we have no evidence that any information relate to member of archbishop mitty high school community have be or will be misuse  we still encourage you to remain vigilant and immediately report any suspicious activity or suspect misuse of your personal information  
 
what we be do 
archbishop mitty high school take the protection and proper use of your information very seriously  ensure the safety of your data be of the utmost importance to u  and we sincerely regret any inconvenience or concern that this may cause  in light of this incident  we be provide you with access to single bureau credit monitor service at no charge for twenty four month  please find instruction below   further  we continue to monitor the situation and be in close contact with blackbaud  and we will be sure to keep you apprise of any additional information a it become available  
 
what you can do

proactive fraud assistance  for sensitive breach focus on customer retention  reputation management  or escalation handle  cyberscout provide unlimited access during the service period to a fraud specialist who will work with enroll notification recipient on a one on one basis  answer any question or concern that they may have  proactive fraud assistance include the follow feature

weiss   company have make immediate enhancement to our system  security  and practice  additionally  we have engage industry expert to assist u in conduct a full review of our security practice and system to ensure that appropriate security protocol be in place  we also be commit to help those people who may have be impact by this unfortunate situation  that be why weiss   company be provide you with access to triple bureau credit monitor  service at no charge  these service provide you with alert for twelve month from the date of enrollment when change occur to any of one of your experian  equifax  or transunion credit file  this notification be send to you the same day that the change or update take place with the bureau  in addition  we be provide you with proactive fraud assistance to help with any question that you might have

irs strongly advise obtain an identity protection pin 
 
the identity protection  ip  pin be a  digit number assign to eligible taxpayer  it help prevent identity thief from file fraudulent tax return with steal social security number  ssns   an ip pin also help the irs verify taxpayer identity and accept their electronic or paper tax return for process  the irs issue ip pin to confirm identity theft victim once their case be resolve  this process be unchanged  what be new be that any taxpayer who want an ip pin  even if they be not victim of identity theft  may now obtain one a well  
 
here what you need to know before apply for your ip pin  
 
this be a voluntary program  
you must pass a rigorous identity verification process to obtain an ip pin  spouse and dependent be also eligible for an ip pin if they can verify their identity  
an ip pin be valid for a calendar year  
you must obtain a new ip pin each file season  use the online ip pin tool  
the online ip pin tool be unavailable generally mid november through mid january each year  
correct ip pin must be enter on electronic and paper tax return to avoid rejection and delay  
 
how to get an ip pin  
 
the fastest  easiest  and prefer way be by use the get an ip pin online tool  here be how it work  
 
go to irs gov ippin  select the get an ip pin tool  verify your identity  and create an account 
once you have a username  password  and security code  you can enter the get an ip pin tool 
once in  your ip pin will be reveal to you  
 
unable to pass the online identity proof  
 
there be alternative available  but there will be a delay in obtain an ip pin  here be how it work  
 
 service mark with an   require an internet connection and email account and may not be available to minor under the age of  year of age  please note that when sign up for monitor service  you may be ask to verify personal information for your own protection to confirm your identity  
 
file a form  if you have a valid ssn or itin  an adjust gross income of   or less  and access to a telephone  an irs assistor will call you  validate your identity  and ensure that you receive an ip pin the next file season  
 
if you be ineligible for form   call the irs to learn about in person option  
 
other important information  
 
you can also obtain more information about identity theft and way to protect yourself from the federal trade commission  ftc   the ftc have an identity theft hotline      tty       they also provide information online at www ftc gov idtheft  
 
for more information  
 
while representative should be able to provide thorough assistance and answer most of your question  you may still feel the need to speak with weiss   company regard this incident  if so  please call me at    between   be and   pm pacific time  monday through friday  
 
at weiss   company  we take our responsibility to protect your personal information very seriously  we be deeply disturb by this situation and apologize for any inconvenience  
 
sincerely  
 
kenneth l  weiss

re  notice of data security incident 
 
dear sir or madam  
 
our office represent north iowa area community college  niacc  locate at  college drive  mason city  iowa   pursuant to iowa code chapter c and out of an abundance of caution  we be write to notify your office of an event that may affect the security of information relate to six hundred eighty seven    iowa resident  the investigation into this matter be ongoing  and this notice may be supplement with any new significant fact learn after it submission  
 
nature of the data event 
 
on tuesday  may     an unknown and unauthorized individual impersonate a niacc employee and send a phishing email to another niacc employee request student information  the text of this email be attach a exhibit a  this phishing attack lead to the compromise of two document contain student information and account balance  within  minute after the incident  the niacc employee discover they be a victim of a phishing attack  the niacc employee immediately report the incident to niacc administration  niacc administration contact the school chief information officer immediately  
 
within  hour  niacc notify all potentially affect student by email about this incident  niacc also notify all faculty and staff with a summary of the incident  niacc administration also report the incident to the mason city police department and the federal bureau of investigation  
 
the first compromise document in this data security incident contain the follow information for four hundred eighteen    iowa individual and include the follow information  name  address  student identification number  social security number  cell phone number  home phone number  and student account balance  
 
the second compromise document in this data security incident contain the follow information for two hundred sixty nine    iowa individual and include the follow information  name  address  student identification number  cell phone number  home phone number  and student account balance  
 
no other information be contain in both compromise document  
 
notice to iowa resident 
 
on june     niacc mail write notice of this incident to all potentially affect individual from the two compromise document  which include the total of six hundred eighty seven iowa resident     we have enclose two anonymized version of the letter  person whose social security number be discover receive a letter in the form of exhibit b and person whose social security number be not discover receive a letter in the form of exhibit c  
 
other step take and to be take 
 
in addition to alert student about the incident  niacc have provide student with guidance to help them stay vigilant about protect their information and incident of fraud  niacc recommend student review their account statement  monitor free credit report  and report any suspicious activity or suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include the attorney general office and the federal trade commission  ftc   niacc provide the contact information for the three national credit report agency and inform student of their right to place a security freeze on their credit report  niacc also recommend that student contact the niacc business office to securely pay their tuition  house fee  and student fee  
 
niacc be also offer all potentially affect student with identity theft protection service through id expert  the service include   month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  niacc have encourage affect individual to enroll and take full advantage of these service  
 
to help prevent this type of incident in the future  additional cybersecurity training have be require to help all faculty and staff identify and report future phishing email  niacc be also take further remedial step to strengthen it policy and procedure to ensure faculty and staff verify all request for protect information and that they do not share this information absent appropriate encryption  
 
contact information 
 
niacc take the privacy and security of it student information seriously and be commit to protect their information  should your office have any question regard this notification or other aspect of the data security event  please contact u at       
 
sincerely  
 
brian mccormac

content of data breach 
 
you be receive this letter because you be a current or former member of prominence health plan  prominence   and we be provide notice of a recent security incident that may have involve your personal information  while we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  this letter provide you with more information about what happen and what we be do in response  
 
what happen  
 
on april     prominence learn that it data system have be subject to an information security incident during which a third party gain unauthorizedaccess to certain information  prominence immediately take step to change the credential use to access it system  secure the impact environment  conduct an investigation of what happen  and restore the impact data from backup  the investigation determine that the incident occur in november   importantly  prominence membership benefit and service have not be interrupt  
 
what information be involve  
 
the data that be access include    audio record of call make to or from the prominence call center  and    electronic image  pdf  file contain certain healthcare provider claim form  and letter to patient with claim approval or denial  the audio record often include a patient full name  date of birth and member id number  and the pdf file typically include a patient name  date of birth  sex  member id number  mail address  and claim code  the incident do not include member social security number or financial information  give the nature of the access data file  however  the personal information be not easy to obtain in a usable format  prominence have conduct online monitor for any indication of actual or attempt misuse of data access and  to date  have not become aware of any such activity  
 
the incident only impact information for a portion of prominence plan member  however  in an abundance of caution and commitment to transparency  prominence be provide notice to approximately   individual represent all member of the prominence health plan during the   timeframe  
 
what be we do to protect your information  
 
prominence be implement additional security measure to enhance the continue security of information in it care and report the incident to the fbi a well a to federal and state regulator  
 
step you can take to help protect your information 
 
to help protect your identity  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of experians identityworkssm  include both identity detection service and assistance in the event of identity theft  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information  please follow the step below  
 
ensure that you enroll by  september     your code will not work after this date   
 
visit the experian identityworks website to enroll    
 
provide your activation code  
 
additional detail regard your experian identityworks membership  a credit card be not require for enrollment in experian identityworks  you can contact experian immediately regard any fraud issue and have access to the follow feature once you enroll in experian identityworks  
 
experian credit report at signup  see what information be associate with your credit file  daily credit report be available for online member only  
 
credit monitor  actively monitor experian file for indicator of fraud  
 
identity restoration  identity restoration agent be immediately available to help you address credit and non credit relate fraud  
 
experian identityworks extendcaretm  you receive the same high level of identity restoration support even after your experian identityworks membership have expire  
 
up to  million identity theft insurance  provide coverage for certain cost and unauthorized electronic fund transfer  
 
if you believe there be fraudulent use of your information and would like to discuss how you may be able to resolve those issue  please reach out to an experian agent at       if  after discuss your situation with an agent  it be determine that identity restoration support be need  then an experian identity restoration agent be available to work with you to investigate and resolve each incident of fraud that occur  include  a appropriate  help you with contact credit grantors to dispute charge and close account  assist you in place a freeze on your credit file with the three major credit bureau  and assist you with contact government agency to help restore your identity to it proper condition   identity restoration support be available to you for one year from the date of this letter and do not require any action on your part at this time  the term and condition for this offer be locate at www experianidworks com restoration  you will also find self help tip and information about identity protection at this site

free credit report  
 
it be recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  especially activity that may indicate fraud and identity theft  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your annual free credit report please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  
 
you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  
 
you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past  year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
federal trade commission and state attorney general office  
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your home state  you may also contact these agency for information on how to prevent or minimize the risk of identity theft  
 
you may contact the federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   www ftc gov bcp edu microsites idtheft     idtheft

step you can take to protect personal information 
 
monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your account and monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax experian transunion

what happen

what information be involve

what we be do

step you can take to protect your information 
 
enroll in credit monitor  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for one year provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
how to enroll

we be write to inform you of a data breach a third party gain unauthorizedaccess to a limit number of our employee email account  upon discovery  we immediately secure the email account  begin an investigation  and arrange resource to start identify  inform  and assist personal information may have be involve  during our review  we identify your information a have potentially be access  although we be not aware of any attempt to exploit this incident in a malicious way  
 
the personality  passport number  state driver license or other government identification number  and or tokenized or partial payment card information  to our knowledge  your information do not include your full  unencrypted payment card information  or social security number or equivalent taxpayer identifier  therefore  we believe the risk of someone misuse your data be low

although we be not aware of any attempt to exploit this incident in a malicious way  and although we believe the risk of someone misuse your data be low  third party involve in the incident could attempt to use your personal information to take fraudulent action  to reduce your risk of be subject to identity theft  you can monitor your financial account and your account statement for unusual or unauthorized activity over the next  to  month and promptly report any suspect identity theft to the police  you should be vigilant against possible phishing communication and email that appear to be  but be not  send from royal caribbean brand email address
