chief legal officer 
 
appendix 
 
measure that you can take to protect yourself with regard to consumer credit report bureau  
 
to help protect yourself against identity theft  you may consider place a fraud alert or security freeze on your credit report  
 
fraud alert  when you place a fraud alert on your credit report  business who pull your credit report will see that you may be a victim of identity theft  the company may then choose to verify your identity before they extend credit to anyone who purport to be you  this may make it harder for an identity thief to open more account in your name  to place an alert  contact any one of the three main credit report bureau  that company be require to tell the other two bureau about the alert  when you first place a fraud alert on your account  it will remain for at least  day  after which you can renew it  when you do place an alert on your report  be sure that all three major credit report company have your current contact information so they can get in touch with you  
 
security freeze  a security freeze or credit freeze go further than an alert and let you restrict access to your credit report entirely  which in turn make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  this be because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if creditor cannot see your file  they may not extend the credit  a credit freeze do not affect your credit score  a credit freeze also do not prevent you from get your free annual credit report  keep you from open a new account  apply for a job  rent an apartment  or buy insurance  but if you be do any of these  you will need to lift the freeze temporarily  either for a specific time or for a specific party  say  a potential landlord or employer  the cost and lead time to lift a freeze vary  so it be best to check with the the personal data that may have be access include customer name  contact information  date of birth  passport number  state driver license or other government identification number  and or tokenized or partial payment card information  
content of data breach notification letter   hogan lovell u llp 
columbia square 
 thirteenth street  nw 
washington  dc

f

dear attorney general miller  
 
we be write on behalf of our client  wolfe clinic  p c    wolfe eye clinic    regard a potential data security incident that occur on february     we take the security and privacy of the information in our control seriously and have take step to prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  
 
this letter be to inform you of the nature of the security breach include an offer of free credit monitor  
 
  nature of the security incident 
 
wolfe eye clinic be a network of eye care clinic provide eye care to patient across iowa  on february     wolfe eye clinic be the target of a cybersecurity attack that involve an unauthorized third party attempt to infiltrate wolfe eye clinic computer network  lock out wolfe eye clinic  and then demand a ransom payment  
 
upon detect this incident  wolfe eye clinic move quickly to secure it network environment and launch a thorough investigation  the investigation be perform with the help of independent it security and forensic investigator to determine the scope and extent of the potential unauthorizedaccess to wolfe eye clinic system and any sensitive information  give the complexity and scale of the cyberattack detect  the full scope of information potentially impact be not fully realize until may     
 
after the comprehensive forensic investigation into this incident conclude on june     wolfe eye clinic discover that individual name  mail address  date of birth  social security number  and or protect medical and health information may have be expose  wolfe eye clinic have have no report of relate identity theft a a result of this incident  february     to present   
 
  step take 
 
wolfe eye clinic take the security of all information in it control very seriously  give this  wolfe eye clinic be take step to prevent a similar event from occur in the future by implement additional safeguard and enhance security measure to better protect the privacy and security of information in it system  wolfe eye clinic have also review and take step to enhance it policy and procedure relate to the security of it system and server  a well a it information life cycle management  
 
wolfe eye clinic value the safety of it patient personal information and be therefore offer credit monitor and identity theft protection service through idx  idxs service include  at least  month of credit monitor and fully manage identity theft recovery service  with this protection  idx will help the affect individual resolve issue if their identity be compromise  
 
  contact information 
 
wolfe clinic remain dedicate to protect the sensitive information in it control  if you have any question or need additional information  please do not hesitate to contact me at robert walkerwilsonelser com or

dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
arthur j  gallagher   co   gallagher  be write to inform you of a security incident that may have affect some of your information  although we have no knowledge of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  we want to provide you with information about the incident  our response  and step you may take to better protect against possible misuse of your information  should you feel it appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on september     gallagher detect a ransomware event that affect our internal system  a a precautionary measure  we take our system offline  initiate response protocol  launch an investigation with the assistance of third party cybersecurity and forensic specialist  implement our business continuity plan to minimize disruption to our customer  and ensure the ongoing security of our system  
 
we work with the cybersecurity and forensic specialist to determine what may have happen and what information may have be affect  our investigation determine that an unknown party access or acquire data contain within certain segment of our network between june     and september     while the investigation be able to confirm that certain system be access  it be unable to confirm what information within those system be actually access  therefore  in an abundance of caution  gallagher conduct an extensive review of the entire content of the impact system  
 
on may     our investigation confirm that the impact data include information relate to certain individual  gallagher continue to work through june     to notify our business partner and to obtain address information for impact individual to provide accurate notice to impact party  
 
what information be involve  
 
although we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  and have no indication the information be in the possession or control of an unauthorized person or party  we be provide you this notification in an abundance of caution because certain information relate to you be access or acquire during this event  the impact information relate to you include your   bb text  dataelements     
 
what be we do  
 
the privacy and security of employee information be among our highest priority  and gallagher have strict security measure in place to protect information in our care  upon discover this incident  we immediately take step to protect the privacy and security of client  partner  and employee information  we also review exist security policy and implement additional measure and enhance security tool to further protect information in our system  we report this incident to law enforcement and regulatory authority  a require by law  
 
in addition to provide notice of this event to you  we be also provide you access  at no cost  to identity and credit monitor service for twenty four    month through kroll  information and instruction on how to activate these complimentary service can be find in the step you can take to help protect your information attach to this letter  
 
what can you do  
 
while gallagher be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of any information a a result of this incident  we nonetheless encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  you may review the information contain   first name     middle name     last name     suffix     address      address      city      state province     postal code     country     date    format  month day  year  eln xxxx in the attach step you can take to help protect your information  you may also activate to receive the identity and credit monitor service we be make available to you  there be no charge to you for the cost of this service  however  you will need to activate yourself in this service  
 
for more information  
 
we recognize that you may have question not address in this letter  if you have additional question  please call our dedicate assistance line at      toll free   monday through friday  exclude u s  holiday     a m  to   p m   central time  we sincerely regret any inconvenience this incident may cause you  protect information entrust to gallagher be very important to u  and we remain commit to safeguard the information in our care

content of data breach notification letter  dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
we be write to inform you about a recent incident that may have involve some of your information  hudson envelope  hudson  take the confidentiality and security of the information we maintain very seriously  
 
what happen  
hudson be recently alert to suspicious activity involve it e commerce website  upon learn this  hudson promptly launch an investigation  through this investigation  hudson discover that unauthorized code design to capture cardholder data be present on the web server that host it e commerce website between june     and january     when the code be discover and immediately remove  
 
what information be involve  
while present on the web server  the unauthorized code could have capture cardholder data  include cardholder name  bill and ship address  email address  telephone number  payment card number  expiration date  and card security code  cvv   enter during the checkout process by customer who place order on the website  we review order information for customer who place order on the website while the unauthorized code be present to identify individual whose information might have be involve  on may     we discover that you place an order on the website while the unauthorized code be present  
 
what we be do  
we regret any concern or inconvenience this may cause you  to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  hudson have implement enhance log and additional security feature within it e commerce environment  
 
what you can do  
we encourage you to review your payment card statement for any unauthorized charge  you should immediately report any such charge to your card issuer because payment card network rule generally provide that cardholder be not responsible for unauthorized charge that be timely report  the phone number to call be usually on the back of your payment card

if you have question  please call      monday friday  from   a m  until   p m   eastern time  exclude major u s  holiday

additional step you can take 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert  
there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  
you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  
there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  payment card data be capture by unauthorized code present on the web server that host the e commerce website  cardholder name  bill and ship address  email address  telephone number  payment card number  expiration date  and card security code  cvv   enter during the checkout process by customer who place order on the website be compromise

what happen

what information be involve

notice of data breach 
 
morgan stanley value our relationship with you and we place the highest degree of importance on protect your data  a your current or former stock plan administrator  we write to inform you of a data security incident relate to your personal information  
 
what happen 
 
in may   a morgan stanley vendor that provide account maintenance service to our stock plan business notify morgan stanley that the vendor have suffer a data security incident  the incident involve your personal information relate to your current or former stock plan account  which be obtain by an unauthorized individual  there be no data security breach of any morgan stanley application in connection with this incident  the incident involve file that be in the vendor possession  include encrypt file from morgan stanley  although the file be encrypt while store in a tool use by the vendor  we believe that the unauthorized individual be able to obtain the decryption key during the security incident  
 
what information be involve 
 
the follow personal information be locate in the file obtain from the vendor  name  address  last know address   date of birth  social security number  corporate company name  
 
what we be do 
 
morgan stanley have review the vendor remediation of the incident  accord to the vendor  the vulnerability that lead to this incident be remediate in january of   although the data be obtain by the unauthorized individual around that time  the vendor do not discover the impact to morgan stanley until may   in addition  we have arrange with experian to provide you with their experian identityworks credit monitor and fraud detection service for  month at no charge to you  to take advantage of this offer  please visit enrollment url before enrollment end date and use code code to enroll in this complimentary offer  
 
if you have question about the product  need assistance with identity restoration or would like an alternative to enroll in experian identity work online  please contact experians customer care team at customer service number by enrollment end date  be prepare to provide engagement number engagement   a proof of eligibility for the identity restoration service by experian  
 
what you can do 
 
in addition to enroll in the credit monitor service  we have include a list of resource for protect yourself against potential misuse of your personal information with this letter  
 
for more information 
 
we understand the importance you place on data security and we take our responsibility to protect your information very seriously  we sincerely regret any inconvenience or concern this matter may cause you  if you have any question  please feel free to contact the client service center at     at any time  enclose be a standard reference guide with additional information on the protection of personal information  
 
morgan stanley supplemental information for the protection of personal information 
 
avoid phishing  please use caution when respond to third party who request disclosure of your personal information via email request or screen pop ups  legitimate agency company do not ask for this type of information in an email  we will never ask for your account password by email or by phone  
 
remain vigilant  a always  you should monitor your statement for any activity you do not recognize  contact u immediately to report any suspicious activity  you also should not click link or open attachment send from a typical or unknown sender  even if they appear to be legitimate  pay special attention to link that purportedly take you to website or other resource relate to this incident  or offer you service to assist with this incident  when in doubt  call your regular morgan stanley contact to verify the legitimacy of the communication  
 
order your free credit report  you be entitle under u s  law to one free credit report annually from each of the three nationwide consumer report agency  to order your credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at     we encourage you to remain vigilant by review your account statement and monitor your free credit report  
 
federal fair credit report act right  you also have right under the federal fair credit report act  fcra   which promote the accuracy  fairness and privacy of information in the file of consumer report agency  more information be available at   
 
obtain a police report  you may be entitle by state law to obtain a police report relate to this matter  however  to our knowledge  no such report exist  if you be the victim of identity theft  you also have the right to file a police report and obtain a copy of it  
 
fraud alert and security freeze  you can place a fraud alert or security freeze on your credit report  free of charge  by call any of the toll free number provide below  unlike a fraud alert  you must place a security freeze on your credit file at each consumer report agency individually  for more information on fraud alert and security freeze  you also may contact the ftc a describe below  you may have to submit personal information to obtain the security freeze  include name  social security number  date of birth  and photograph of a government id

what happen

what information be involve

at impactree  we take protect our member security and privacy very seriously  out of an abundance of caution  we be go to operate a if this information may have be access until we can ascertain that it be not  
 
personal data may also include phone number or street address  if you submit it   
 
no personal financial information be store on the impactree platform  any donation make to nonprofit find through action on the platform be process with the nonprofit directly via their respective donation system  impactree do not keep or store any financial information  impactree do not keep or store social security number  driver license information  identification card number  tax identification number  passport number  or military identification number  we have no reason to believe that any of impactrees user or customer financial or governmental information have be compromise  
 
what we be do

stride inc   stride  write to let you know about a data security incident that we discover that affect some of your information  because the security of information be of utmost importance to u  we be notify you of the event a well a resource available to you to help protect your information  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on or around november     stride be the victim of a ransomware attack  ransomware be a form of attack in which  after gain access to a system  the attacker encrypt a victim file and then demand a ransom to restore access to the data  educational institution  from primary school through higher education  be increasingly become a target of ransomware attack  a soon a we discover that our system have be infect with ransomware  we quickly take step to lock down impact system  notify federal law enforcement authority  and begin work with an industry lead third party forensic team to investigate and assist with the incident  
 
work with third party forensic investigator  stride determine that an unknown actor may have gain access to stride system from november    to november     after careful consideration  we also decide to make a payment to the ransomware attacker  a a proactive and preventive step in exchange for assurance that the information obtain by the attacker from our system would be return to stride and would not be release on the internet or otherwise disclose  while there be always a risk that the threat actor will not adhere to negotiate term  base on guidance we have receive about the attack and the threat actor  the company believe the payment be a reasonable measure to take in order to prevent misuse of any information the attacker obtain  
 
once the incident be contain  stride initiate a comprehensive review  with the assistance of industry lead forensic specialist  to identify any information of individual contain in the file affect by the incident  stride also then undertake a comprehensive internal effort to reconcile the result of the third party review and find contact information for the affect individual  
 
extra a soon a stride be aware that information be impact  include yours  we work a quickly a possible to notify you

take advantage of your identity monitor service

single bureau credit monitor

dear name  
 
forefront management  llc be commit to protect the confidentiality and security of our current and former employee information  we be write to inform you that we recently identify and address a data security incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure that have be take  and some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on june     forefront conclude our investigation of an intrusion into our it network by cyber criminal and determine that the incident result in unauthorizedaccess to certain file on our it system that contain employee information  we first identify the intrusion on june     and immediately take our entire network offline to protect the information we maintain and to secure our system  we also launch an investigation and notify law enforcement  
 
what information be involve  
 
through our investigation  we determine that the intrusion result in an unauthorized party gain access to our it network between the date of may     and june     while in our it network  the unauthorized party access certain file that contain information pertain to a small number of forefront employee  while our investigation do not find evidence that your information be specifically involve  we could not rule out the possibility that file contain some of your information  include your name and social security number  may have be subject to unauthorizedaccess a a result of this incident  additionally  our investigation determine that the unauthorized party also access certain file that contain a small number of forefront dermatology patient information  if you be a current or former forefront dermatology patient  we cannot rule out the possibility that some of your patient information could have be involve  although investigation do not find evidence that patient information relate to our employee be specifically involve  this information may have include your name  address  date of birth  patient account number  health insurance plan member id number  medical record number  date of service  provider name  and or medical and clinical treatment information  
 
what we be do  
 
out of an abundance of caution  and because we take this incident seriously  we be offer you a complimentary  month membership to transunions mytrueidentity credit monitor service  this service help detect possible misuse of your information and provide you with identity protection support focus on immediate identification and resolution of identity theft  mytrueidentity be free  and enroll in this program will not affect your credit score  for more information on mytrueidentity  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary  month membership and step you can take to protect your information  please see the page that follow this letter  
 
what you can do  
 
we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your financial account statement for any unauthorized activity  if you see charge or activity you do not authorize  you should contact your financial institution immediately  additionally  if you be also a current or former patient of forefront dermatology  we recommend that you review the statement you receive from your healthcare provider and health insurance plan  if you see any service that be not receive  please contact the provider or health plan immediately  
 
for more information  
 
we deeply regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  we take this matter very seriously and be continue to enhance our security protocol to help prevent a similar incident the incident involve cyber criminal hack into forefront management llcs it network result in unauthorizedaccess to employee information and patient information of forefront dermatology sc

additional detail regard your  month experian identityworks credit b membership

additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
  equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
  experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
  transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft  a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
  experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
  transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
  equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or the unauthorizedaccess to guess inc s system and attempt to encrypt their system  along with the subsequent discovery of unauthorizedaccess to the company system for a period of several week  indicate that the breach be cause by an external  likely a hacker or group of hacker

  daily access to your equifax credit report and  bureau vantagescore credit score 
   bureau credit monitor with email notification of key change to your credit report 
  webscan notification when your personal information  such a social security number  credit debit card  or bank account number be find on fraudulent internet trade site 
  automatic fraud alert  which encourage potential lender to take extra step to verify your identity before extend credit  plus block inquiry alert and equifax credit report lock 
  identity restoration to help restore your identity should you become a victim of identity theft  and a dedicate identity restoration specialist to work on your behalf 
  up to    of identity theft insurance coverage for certain out of pocket expense result from identity theft  
  lose wallet assistance if your wallet be lose or steal  and one stop assistance in cancel and reissue credit  debit  and personal identification card

what happen

what information be involve

what we be do 
 
upon learn of the incident  we immediately launch an investigation and have since cease use the third party service that have be compromise  we have cooperate with federal law enforcement and engage lead cybersecurity expert in connection with investigate and respond to the incident  base on the nature of the incident  it have take time to accurately determine what data be impact  after determine community memorial health system information be impact  we notify community memorial health system on may

dear ejuice direct customer  
 
we value your business and respect the privacy of your information  which be why we be write to let you know about a cybersecurity incident involve the ejuice direct e commerce website that may have allow an unauthorized third party to acquire a copy of personal information you enter into the website  
 
what happen  
 
a malicious script be inject into the website by an unauthorized third party that may have allow access to personal information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the data access include payment card detail  card number  cvc cvv  and expiration date   other information be not compromise  
 
what we be do  
 
upon discover the incident  we immediately contract with a lead cybersecurity firm to conduct a thorough forensic investigation and will notify you if there be further significant development  we have implement additional security measure to prevent the reoccurrence of such a breach and to protect the privacy of our customer  the additional security measure include the follow  
 
  the malicious script have be remove from the website  
  multi factor authentication  mfa  have be enable for all administrative account on the website  
  a web application firewall  waf  have be enable and configure to provide additional security  
 
what you can do  
 
we be notify you so that you can take action which will assist to minimize or eliminate potential harm  we strongly advise you to take preventive measure to help prevent and detect any misuse of your information  
 
for more information  
 
we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this incident have cause you  please be advise that we will keep you inform of any development in the investigation which may be of importance to you  if you have any question about the incident  please contact u at     monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  central time or noticeejuicedirect com  
 
ejuice direct recommend step to help protect your information 
 
  monitor financial account  
 
a a first step  we recommend that you closely monitor your financial account and if you see any unauthorized activity  you should promptly contact your financial institution  we also suggest that you submit a complaint with the federal trade commission by call      i  idtheft  or online at www ftccomplaintassistant gov  
 
  review your credit report  
 
a a second step  you may want to contact the three u s  credit report agency  equifax  experian  and transunion  to obtain a free credit report from each by call     or by log onto www annualcreditreport com  even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  check your credit report periodically can help you spot a problem and address it quickly  
 
  place fraud alert with the three credit bureau  
 
you can place a fraud alert at one of the three major credit bureau by phone and also via experians or equifaxs website  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  the contact information for all three bureau be a follow  
 
credit bureau

p o  box  
atlanta  ga   
www equifax com

p o  box  
allen  tx  
www experian com

p o  box  
chester  pa   
www transunion com 
 
it be necessary to contact only one of these bureau and use only one of these method  a soon a one of the three bureau confirm your fraud alert  the others be notify to place alert on their record a well  you will receive confirmation letter in the mail and will then be able to order all three credit report  free of charge  for your review  an initial fraud alert will last for one year  if you be a victim of identity theft  you have the right to an extend fraud alert which be good for  year  
 
  place a security freeze  
 
you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit file free of charge  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or telephone bill  
 
  obtain additional information

dear  individual   
 
out of an abundance of caution  we be write to inform you of a cybersecurity incident which affect the sn service corporation  sn   the cybersecurity incident may have result in the potential compromise of some of your data  this letter contain information about the incident and information about how to protect your personal information go forward  sn consider the protection of sensitive information a top priority  and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience a a result of the incident  
 
what happen 
 
on or about october     sn discover unauthorizedaccess to it network  upon discovery  sn immediately terminate the access and retain a specialize cybersecurity forensic team to conduct an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  the forensics team first identify the name and location of file that be exfiltrated from the firewall record  this investigation conclude on or about november     base on the result of the investigation  it be determine that an unauthorized party may have be able to access sensitive personal information for some of our borrower  
 
sn be able to quickly identify a subset of document which be believe to contain sensitive information for some borrower  in the interest of notify the borrower a quickly a possible  a preliminary notice be provide for that collection of document a quickly a possible  a data mining vendor be then hire to review the remain document to identify any additional individual that may have be affect and what data may have be expose  the data mining vendor provide it result on or about april     
 
sn engage in a substantial data validation process to verify the accuracy of the data and reconcile to internal record  immediately after conclude it validation procedure  sn procure credit monitor for affect individual and draft notice to individual  consumer credit report agency  and state regulator a appropriate  
 
what information be involve 
 
while we have no reason to believe that your information have be misuse a a result of this incident  we be notify you out of an abundance of caution and for purpose of full transparency  base on the investigation  the unauthorized party may have have access to one or more of the follow data element  name  contact information  date of birth  social security number  and loan borrower information  please note that not every data element be present for every individual  while we appreciate that the incident may be concern  please note that sn be not aware of any instance of misuse of sensitive data  
 
what we be do 
 
sn engage a specialize cybersecurity firm to conduct an investigation of the incident  since the incident  sn have continue to strengthen it security posture  additionally  we have also obtain complimentary credit monitor for all affect individual  we encourage you to take advantage of the complimentary credit monitor service  we be make these service available to you at no cost  however  you will need to enroll yourself in these service  
 
what you can do 
 
we recommend that you continue to remain vigilant in monitor your personal information  the easiest way to do this be to take advantage of the complimentary credit monitor and identity theft service we be offer to you  detail regard these service be include in a separate attachment to this letter  to reiterate  we be make these service available to you at no cost  however  you will need to enroll yourself in these service  
 
there be additional step you can take to protect yourself which be contain in the supplement to this letter title additional important information  the protection of your information be a top priority  and we sincerely regret any concern or inconvenience that this matter may cause  if you have any question  please do not hesitate to call phone number monday through friday  between   be and   pm central time  
 
sincerely  
 
sn service corporation

nature of the data event

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
transunion 
p o  box  chester  pa  
    
www transunion com 
 
experian 
p o  box  allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
equifax 
p o  box  atlanta  ga  
   
www equifax com 
 
free annual report 
p o  box  atlanta  ga  
    
annualcreditreport com 
 
fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc at federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  d c    or online at consumer ftc gov and www ftc gov idtheft  or to the attorney general in your state  resident of new york  maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

dear   ccname     
 
we be write you on behalf of resort data process  inc   a property management software provider  to inform you of a recent cyber security attack against our online book system use by hotel and resort  the incident may have involve your personal information  include your name and credit or debit card information  we take the privacy and security of your information seriously  and sincerely apologize for any concern or inconvenience this may cause you  this letter contain information about step you can take to protect your information  and resource available to help you  
 
what happen  
on or about june     we become aware of suspicious activity relate to our online book system  we take immediate step to terminate the attacker access and develop and deploy a security patch  we enlist a lead cybersecurity forensics firm to assist u in fully investigate the incident  the investigation reveal that attacker use malicious code to acquire credit debit card information enter while book reservation at property that use our online book system  the investigation identify malicious activity a early a january  along with compromise credit debit card information from reservation make between approximately january     and approximately may     and also between approximately february     and june     
 
who and what information be involve  
if you be receive this letter  your payment card be likely involve in the incident for reservation make online directly with a hotel or resort between approximately january     and approximately may     you may call the number below for more information  information at risk may have include your name  address  phone number  email address  credit debit card number  expiration date  and security code card verification code  no book be affect  
 
what we be do  
we be take step to help prevent this type of incident from occur in the future  since the incident  we fix the software vulnerability and be consult with cybersecurity expert to identify and implement additional control to further enhance our online book system security  
 
what you can do  
you should carefully review the credit and debit card statement for any payment card you have use to make an online reservation  if you identify any suspicious activity  immediately contact your financial institution  
 
more information

  place fraud alert and obtain information about fraud alert from the  credit bureau  place a fraud alert at  of the  major credit bureau by phone or online  this tell creditor to follow certain procedure  e g   contact you  before open any new account in your name or change exist account  please note  a fraud alert can protect you but may delay you obtain credit  to place a fraud alert  notify one of the credit bureau and they will notify the others  you will receive confirmation letter and then can order all  credit report  free of charge  an initial fraud alert last  year  note  no one may place a fraud alert on your credit report except you  
 
  place a security freeze  by place a security freeze  no one will be able to use your identify information to open new account or borrow money in your name  contact all  credit bureau list above to place the security freeze  please note  when you place the freeze  you will not be able to borrow money  obtain instant credit  or get a new credit card until you lift or permanently remove the freeze  place and remove credit freeze be free

notice of data breach 
 
dear memberfirstname memberlastname  
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that may have expose some of your personal identifiable information  pii  use in connection with savory spice retail sale website  we take the protection and proper use of your information seriously  for this reason  we be contact you directly to explain the circumstance of the incident  
 
what happen  
 
on or about october     we learn that an unauthorized third party have attack savory spice computer network  in response  savory spice immediately initiate an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  upon further investigation  we determine what information may have be access and which customer may have be affect  on or about july     we conclude our investigation and determine that between april     and march     unauthorized party may have gain access to customer purchase information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information acquire may have include your first and last name  credit and or debit card number  expiration date  and security code  
 
what we be do  
 
savory spice deeply regret that this incident occur  after learn of the data security incident  savory spice engage a third party forensics and information technology service provider to investigate the incident  in response  we promptly implement new security measure consistent with the third party forensics service provider recommendation to further enhance payment security on our website  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant and regularly review your account statement and credit report for any incident of fraud  identity theft  or unauthorized activity  please review the enclose additional resource section include with this letter  this section describe additional step you can take to help protect yourself  include recommendation by the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection and detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file

free credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  you may request a report online at www annualcreditreport com or by call toll free      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report free of charge if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  
 
you can place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well   
 
   full name  with middle initial and any suffix  
   social security number  
   date of birth  
   current address and any previous address for the past  year  and 
   any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  
 
the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
federal trade commission and state attorney general office  
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission  ftc  and or the attorney general office in your home state  the ftc and your state attorney general office can provide you with more information about prevent identity theft  fraud alert  and security freeze  
 
you can contact the ftc at

what information be involve

what you can do 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant by regularly review your credit report  financial account statement  and statement you receive from healthcare provider for any unauthorized activity  if you see charge or activity you do not authorize  please contact the relevant provider immediately  
 
we be also provide a complimentary membership to krolls identity monitor service to current and former employee who believe that they may have be affect by this incident  krolls identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  for more information on identity theft prevention and kroll identity monitor  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary membership  please call our dedicate call center for this incident at

fraud alert and credit or security freeze 
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also an unauthorized party gain access to some of transformcos computer server between june     and june     lead to a data breach involve certain file contain current and former transformco employee social security number  financial account number  and or healthcare insurance information

subject  notice of data security incident 
date  
 
dear streetfire user  
 
we be write to inform you that we recently discover that some archive data from the prior streetfire net website be acquire by an unauthorized party  include some of your information  please review the information below  
 
what happen  
on june     an unknown actor use what be believe to be a previously unknown technique to gain access to server store backup information regard the prior streetfire net website  quickly after detect the attack we take step to remediate it  but the attacker be able to download certain file before be expel  
 
what information be involve  
we promptly retain lead cyber forensics firm to investigate the incident and conduct a thorough analysis of the file take by the attacker  we learn on july     that the information involve include information about your account and participation on the streetfire site include your information not specify  
 
what be we do  
after remediate the attack  we take step to understand the nature and scope of the potential unauthorizedaccess and engage outside cybersecurity expert to investigate  we be work with these expert to assess the need for additional security measure  and we will continue to closely monitor our system for unauthorized activity  
 
a an additional measure  we be offer you the option to enroll in one year of identity monitor service from identity theft guard solution  idx   these service include cyberscan monitor  if you would like to activate this coverage  please visit and use the enrollment code below  
 
idx representative be available monday through friday from  be to  pm pacific time  please note the deadline to enroll be october     
 
enrollment code  code not specify 
 
what can happen next and what can you do  
because your information be expose a a result of the attack  it be possible that unauthorized third party try to use your information  we therefore recommend that you take extra precaution to protect yourself  
 
although the streetfire website be no longer active  we recommend that you change your password on any other service on which you use the same password you most recently use on streetfire net  
 
you may also receive phishing email to the email account you use to register your account at streetfire  the email to which we be send this notice   so you should exercise care when receive unexpected email  
 
this incident do not affect your credit or involve information use to obtain credit  however  we be require by law to provide additional information to you in this letter regard those issue  this information be provide below  
 
more information 
for the latest information on this incident  you may contact u at privacymotortrend com  
 
on behalf of motortrend  we regret any inconvenience this may cause you  
 
sincerely  
the motortrend team 
 
identity theft information 
this incident do not affect your credit or involve information that can be use to obtain credit  however  the follow resource can help you learn more about protect yourself or recover from identity theft  
 
you have the right to put a fraud alert or security freeze on your credit report  a fraud alert will notify any merchant check your credit history that you may be the victim of identity theft and that the merchant should take additional measure to verify the application  contact anyone of the three credit report agency will place an alert on your file at all three of them  a security freeze restrict all creditor access to your account  but might also delay any request you might make for new account  credit report agency cannot charge you to place a security freeze  
 
equifax       www equifax com  p o  box   atlanta  ga   
experian    experian      www experian com  p o  box   allen  tx  
transunion       www transunion com  fraud victim assistance division  p o  box   fullerton  ca   
 
you will need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  the agency be not permit to charge you for place or lift a freeze  each credit report agency will confirm your request with a unique pin or password that you will need in order to lift or remove the freeze  you should keep the pin or password in a safe place  
 
suspect identity theft should be report to law enforcement  your attorney general  or the federal trade commission  which also offer information about and respond to identity theft at identitytheft gov  the ftc can be reach at  
 
consumer response center 
 pennsylvania avenue  nw 
washington  dc  
  id theft

what happen

what information be involve

what be we do

what can you do

content of data breach notification letter  ryan specialty group  llc  rsg  be write to inform you of a security incident that may have impact some of your personal information  this letter provide detail about the incident  our response  and resource available to you to help protect your information from potential misuse  
 
what happen  
on or around april     rsg become aware of unusual activity relate to certain employee email account  we immediately launch an investigation to understand the nature and scope of the activity  on april     we discover that certain employee email account be access without authorization between april     and april     we could not determine whether any specific email in those account be access or view  a a precaution  we conduct a programmatic and manual review of the content of the email account to determine whether sensitive information be present in the email at the time of the incident  this review be complete on june     and we determine that certain personal information be accessible  although not necessarily actually access or view by unauthorized individual  within the account at the time of the incident  
 
what information be involve  
it be uncertain whether information relate to you be access or view during this incident  however  we be notify you out of an abundance of caution  the information relate to you that be accessible within the email account include your name and breachedelements  
 
what we be do  
we take this incident and the security of personal information in our care seriously  upon learn of this incident  we quickly investigate  respond  and assess the security of relevant system  our response include further secure the potentially compromise account by reset relevant account password  block potentially malicious ip address  remove any suspicious email from rsg mailbox  review for and disable any suspicious rule within rsg mailbox  and open investigation with our email solution and manage service provider to gain further insight into the incident  a part of our ongoing commitment to the security of information  we be also review exist policy and procedure to reduce the likelihood of a similar future incident  
 
we be also offer you access to complimentary credit monitor and identity protection service for twenty four    month through experian  these service include identity detection and resolution of identity theft  if you wish to activate the credit monitor and identity protection service  you may follow the instruction include in the step you can take to help protect your information  
 
what you can do

under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth

notice of data security incident 
 
dear   first name     last name    
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident experience by nt hold corporation  nt  that may have impact your personal information  we take the privacy and security of your information seriously and sincerely apologize for any concern or inconvenience this may cause you  this letter contain information about step you can take to protect your information and resource we be make available to help you  
 
what happen  
 
on november     we discover a data security incident that disrupt access to our network  a part of our response process  we initiate our business continuity protocol and engage an independent computer forensic investigator to help u determine what occur and whether any information be at risk  the forensic investigator find that an unauthorized actor gain access to certain nt system and file store on our network but be unable to confirm whether the information be access or view  out of an abundance of caution  nt conduct a thorough review of the content of the file  on march     the investigation confirm that the impact data include information relate to certain individual  nt then work to validate the data and obtain accurate contact information to process notification  the list be finalize  and we determine that your information may have be impact by this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
while there be no evidence that the file be access or view  the investigation conclude that the file may have contain your first and last name  social security number  financial account information  and date of birth  
 
what we be do  
 
nt take this incident and the security of your personal control for all type of remote access to our system and perform a global password reset  we have also notify and be cooperate with law enforcement  
 
in addition  while we be not aware of any misuse of your information  we have arrange for you to receive credit monitor and identity protection service at no cost to you  a a precautionary measure  
 
we be provide you with access to single bureau credit monitor single bureau credit report single bureau credit score cyber monitor  service at no charge  these service provide you with alert for   length of service   from the date of enrollment when change occur to your credit file  this notification be send to you the same day that the change or update take place with the bureau  cyber monitor will look out for your personally  we be provide you with proactive fraud assistance to help with any question that you might have or in the event that you become a victim of fraud

notice of data breach 
 
dear name  
 
we be write to inform you of a data breachool  
 
what happen  
 
during a schedule penetration test in early june   we identify a vulnerability associate with our website  we fix the vulnerability and begin an investigation with the assistance of a forensic firm  on june     the investigation determine that an unknown party exploit the vulnerability and likely acquire a copy of the otis digital driver license database between january     and february     
 
what information be involve  
 
we conduct a review of the database and determine that your username  usually your email address  and password to our website be store in the database  the database do not collect or contain any other personal information such a birthdates  social security number  or financial information for any user  
 
what we be do  
 
for your security  we have disable the password involve  and you will need to reset your password the next time you use your account  we be also take step to enhance the security of the database base on the result of the investigation  
 
what you can do  
 
at this time  we have no evidence that this information have be misuse  if you use the same username and password for any other account  we recommend that you change your password there a well  you should also review the additional information on the follow page on way to protect yourself  
 
for more information  
 
we regret any inconvenience or concern this incident may cause  if you have question  please call xxx xxx xxxx or toll free at xxx xxx xxxx  monday friday between   a m  and   p m   est  
 
sincerely  
 
brian t  nichols 
 
chief information officer

what happen  
between march    and april     an unauthorized third party intermittently access the email account of certain abide service employee  upon discovery of this incident  abide service promptly engage a specialize cybersecurity firm to conduct a forensics investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  the forensic investigation be complete on april     the investigation confirm that the unauthorized party may have access abide client personal information have be misuse by any third party  abide notify you out of an abundance of caution  
 
what information be involve  
thus far  base on the investigation  it appear the expose information may include abide client information contain in the email account of certain abide employee  include abide client name  address  date of birth  social security number  medical information  insurance information  a well a the name of the program that client participate in  amount pay for the medical care receive  rent subsidy  and copy of the rent check  at this time  abide service have no reason to believe your personal information have be misuse by any third party  but out of an abundance of caution  abide service want to inform you of this incident  
 
what we be do  
upon discovery of this incident  abide service immediately change all computer password and improve our computer security setting by enable of a two factor authentication for our email  moreover  abide service promptly file a report with the fbi  at this time  abide service be not aware of your information be use in an unauthorized manner  but out of an abundance of caution  abide service want to make you aware of this matter and offer resource to help you protect your information  
 
what you can do  
further  abide service have arrange for kroll to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintentional exposure of confidential data  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you about a recent security incident that may have involve some of your personal information we maintain be of the utmost importance to u  and we want to assure you that we be take significant measure to protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
netgain  a third party vendor that provide data host service to safetycall  experience a network intrusion result in unauthorizedaccess to certain portion of it network  netgain first become aware of a potential security incident on november     which ultimately culminate in the launch of ransomware on december     the last day of unauthorizedaccess on it network be december     netgain report that it environment be secure  on january     netgain inform u that certain of safetycalls customer data may have be take from it network a part of the attack  
 
what we be do  
 
upon learn of the issue  we immediately obtain the record that may have be compromise and begin a comprehensive review with outside data privacy professional to determine whether any sensitive data be locate within them  our investigation conclude on extra that the record do contain a limit amount of personal information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the impact data set contain some of your personal information  include your name and any information you provide in relation to the product incident you report when you call to report an issue with an extra product  which may describe a physical injury or adverse reaction  
 
what you can do  
 
we have no information to date indicate that your information involve in this incident be or will be use for any unintended purpose  to the extent it be helpful  this letter provide precautionary measure you can take to protect your personal information on the follow page  
 
for more information  
 
please accept our apology that this incident occur  we be commit to maintain the privacy of personal information  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question at phone number  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do if you be concern about potential misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday from  be    pm eastern time  or saturday and sunday from  be    pm eastern time  be prepare to provide your engagement number  
 
other important information 
 
protect your medical information  
 
we have no information to date indicate that your information involve in this incident be or will be use for any unintended purpose  a a general matter  however  the follow practice can help to protect you from medical identity theft  
 
  only share your health insurance card with your health care provider and other family member who be cover under your insurance plan or who help you with your medical care  
  review your explanation of benefit  eob   which be a statement you receive from your health insurance company after you have a medical visit  follow up with your insurance company or care provider bill office for any item you do not recognize  if necessary  contact the care provider on the eob statement and ask for copy of medical record from the date of the potential access  note above  to current date at no expense to you  
  ask your insurance company for a current year to date report of all service pay for you a a beneficiary  follow up with your insurance company or the care provider for any item you do not recognize  
 
sincerely  
safetycall the breach  
content of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
ibex global solution  inc   ibex  be write to inform you of an incident that may have affect the security of your personal information from possible misuse  
 
what happen  
 
on august     ibex discover that it be the victim of a malware attack that affect a limit segment of our system  we immediately take these system offline and launch an investigation with the help of third party computer specialist to determine the nature and scope of the incident  on or about september     the investigation confirm that certain file on our system may have be access without authorization between july  and august     we conduct a thorough review of the potentially impact file and our internal system to identify the information that be involve and to whom it relate  on or about september     a third party firm be engage to review the potentially impact file  on or about june     ibex determine that one or more of the potentially impact folder include information relate to individual  we continue to review and reconcile the information with internal and public record to identify the individual to whom the data relate and the appropriate contact information for those individual  these effort be complete on or around july     at which time ibex determine the scope of impact individual and the type of protect data associate with those individual  
 
we work to provide notification to potentially impact individual a quickly a possible  however  there be no indication that your specific information be access or misuse  we be notify potentially impact individual out of an abundance of caution  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine that the information relate to you that may have be potentially affect include your name    breach element    
 
what we be do  
 
information security be among ibexs highest priority  and we have strict security measure in place to protect information in our care  upon discover this incident  we immediately take step to review and reinforce the security of our system  we have implement additional cybersecurity measure to further protect against similar incident move forward  we report this incident to law enforcement and be cooperate with their investigation  we be notify potentially impact individual  include you  so that you may take step to protect your information  a an add precaution  we be also offer   variable data   month of complimentary access to credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration service through equifax  individual who wish to receive these service must enroll by follow the enrollment instruction find in the enclose step you can take to help protect your personal information  
 
for more information
