august    
 
re  important security notice about your bath   body work account 
 
dear bath   body work customer  
 
at bath   body work  we care about your privacy and the security of your personal information  thats why we be contact you today  
 
what happen  
 
we recently learn that an unauthorized party gain access to certain personal information in your bath   body work online loyalty account between approximately june     and june     we believe that the unauthorized party capitalize on a breach of another company system where you may have use the same login information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information that could have be access by the unauthorized party be the viewable information in your bath   body work online loyalty account include  for example  name  email address  mail address  if enter   birth day and month  not year   telephone number  loyalty account number and any gift card number and gift card pin link to your account via the bath   body work loyalty application on your mobile device  if you have elect to save payment card information through your account  only the last four digit of the payment card save would have be visible  purchase make in our store be not impact  
 
what we be do 
 
step be take  
 
  promptly after learn of the issue  we take step to secure the account and determine the nature of the issue  
  we be coordinate with law enforcement  
  for your protection  weve disable your current password  and youll need to make a new one  
  visit the sign in page on bathandbodyworks com  
  click on  forget password   
  enter the email address associate with your account  
  a forget password link will be send to your email address  if you do not immediately receive the link  please check your spam folder  
  follow the instruction to reset your password  
 
although it do not appear that the unauthorized individual be target reward redemption  to prevent the unauthorized use of reward  we be only accept bath   body work reward redemption when the loyalty account number for an order match the loyalty account that we have on file  
 
what you can do 
 
step you should take  
 
  please monitor your bath   body work account for suspicious activity  
  promptly change the username and password on all other online account for which you use the same or similar username and password  
  validate the availability of any reward and gift card amount that may have be link to your account  
  call u if you have question or concern  include with any gift card link to your account  if possible  please have proof of purchase information available  
 
out of an abundance of caution  we have arrange to provide potentially affect shopper with free identity protection service for one year  you may contact u at         a m     a m  eastern   day week  if you be interest in this option  
 
for more information 
 
in this mail  we have include additional step that you can take to further protect your information  
 
please know we take the responsibility of protect the confidentiality of your personal information seriously  we be very sorry that this occur and be work diligently to maintain your trust  
 
sincerely  
 
customer care service reference guide 
 
we encourage affect individual to take the follow step  
 
  register for identity protection service  we have arrange to provide potentially affect shopper with free identity protection service for one year  you may contact u at        a m     p m  eastern   day week  if you be interest in this option  
  order your free credit report  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com  call toll free at      or complete the annual credit report request form on the u s  federal trade commission  ftcs  website at www consumer ftc gov and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    the three nationwide consumer report agency provide free annual credit report only through the website  toll free number  or request form  
 
when you receive your credit report  review it carefully  look for account you do not open  look in the inquiry section for name of creditor from whom you havent request credit  some company bill under name other than their store or commercial name  the consumer report agency will be able to tell you when that be the case  look in the personal activity  
 
report incident  if you detect any unauthorized transaction in a financial account  promptly notify your payment card company or financial institution  if you detect any incident of identity theft or fraud  promptly report the incident to law enforcement  the ftc  and your state attorney general  if you believe your identity have be steal  the ftc recommend that you take these step  
 
  close the account that you have confirm or believe have be tamper with or open fraudulently  for streamline checklist and sample letter to help guide you through the recovery process  please visit www identitytheft gov   
  file a local police report  obtain a copy of the police report and submit it to your creditor and any others that may require proof of the identity theft crime  
 
you can contact the ftc to learn more about how to protect yourself from become a victim of identity theft and how to repair identity theft  
 
federal trade commission 
consumer response center 
 pennsylvania avenue  nw 
washington  dc  
   idtheft     
www ftc gov idtheft  
 
consider place a fraud alert on your credit file  to protect yourself from possible identity theft  consider place a fraud alert on your credit file  a fraud alert help protect you against the possibility of an identity thief open new credit account in your name  when a merchant check the credit history of someone apply for credit  the merchant get a notice that the applicant may be the victim of identity theft  the alert notify the merchant to take step to verify the identity of the applicant  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by call any one of the toll free number provide below  you will reach an automate telephone system that allow you to flag your file with a fraud alert at all three consumer report agency  for more information on fraud alert  you also may contact the ftc a describe above  
 
equifax 
equifax information service llc

consider place a security freeze on your credit file  you may wish to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit file  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit file at the consumer report agency without your consent  unlike a fraud alert  you must place a security freeze on your credit file at each consumer report agency individually  there be no charge to place or lift a security freeze  for more information on security freeze  you may contact the three nationwide consumer report agency or the ftc a describe above  a the instruction for establish a security freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three nationwide consumer report agency to find out more information  
 
the consumer report agency may require proper identification prior to honor your request  for example  you may be ask to provide  
 
  your full name with middle initial and generation  such a jr   sr   ii  iii  
  your social security number 
  your date of birth 
  address where you have live over the past five year 
  a legible copy of a government issue identification card  such a a state driver license or military id card  
  proof of your current residential address  such a a current utility bill or account statement  
 
product offer  valid date  and participate store subject to change without notice  offer not valid on product purchase through third party  store and online  selection may vary by store and online  while supply last  no substitution and no rain check issue  not valid toward previous purchase  other restriction may apply  for more information  visit customer care  please do not reply to this email  a it be send from an address that cannot accept incoming email  bath   body work   west main street  new albany  ohio  usa    bath   body work  all right reserve  an unauthorized party gain access to certain personal information in the bath   body work online loyalty account by capitalize on a breach of another company system where the customer may have use the same login information

i be write to inform you of a recent incident that may have involve some of your personal information  on september     one of my computer system be infect with ransomware that encrypt the data  however  my it consultant quickly identify and contain the malware  wipe the affect computer system  and immediately restore from backup  since the incident occur  i have be work with multiple party to identify responsibility for the notification letter and associate service  
 
a you know  i collect a variety of confidential information from you  include your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and financial account number  although i do not have any evidence that any of your information have be steal or misuse  i want to let you know this event occur and assure you that i be take it very seriously  
 
in response to the incident  i have take step to help prevent a similar incident in the future  include update user password and implement additional security safeguard  in an abundance of caution  i have arrange to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year through kroll  a leader in risk mitigation and response  the identity monitor service we be make available to you include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  for more information on identity theft prevention and kroll identity monitor  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary membership  please visit the below website and see the additional information provide with this letter  visit  to activate and take advantage of your identity monitor service  you have until november     to activate your identity monitor service

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
triple bureau credit monitor 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data at any of the three national credit bureausfor instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  youll have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  
 
to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity over the next  to  month  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the computer system be infect with ransomware that be identify and contain by the it consultant  and then wipe and restore from backup  since the incident involve an external and the use of malware to encrypt the data  it be classify a a hack type of breach

what happen  
 
backnine be an insurance broker and financial service firm locate in westlake village  california  backnine sell life  long term care  and disability insurance a well a annuity  
 
on july     backnine learn of a code error that cause certain insurance and annuity application to be upload to a publicly accessible folder on it cloud storage system  upon discovery  backnine immediately secure the folder so that it be no longer publicly accessible  backnine also audit the cloud storage system to confirm that the folder at issue be the only one affect and alter the misconfigured code to ensure that future application would be upload to and store in the intend  non publicly accessible folder  
 
in addition  backnine  with the assistance of outside data privacy and cybersecurity expert  conduct an investigation and work to identify the individual whose personal information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the impact cloud storage folder contain the follow information provide by the applicant to backnine while designate you a a   role policy type      data element

fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to

fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  since the physicalbreach

identity protection reference guide 
 
  review your credit report  we recommend that you remain vigilant by monitor your credit report for any activity you do not recognize  under federal law  you be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report company  to order your free annual credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com  call toll free at       or complete the annual credit report request form on the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www ftc gov and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    the three credit bureau provide free annual credit report only through the website  toll free number  or request form  if you see anything in your credit report that you do not understand  call the credit bureau at the telephone number on the report  you should notify the credit bureau of any inaccuracy in your report  whether due to error or fraud  a soon a possible so the information can be investigate and  if find to be in error  correct  if there be account or charge you do not authorize  immediately notify the appropriate credit bureau by telephone and in write  
 
  place fraud alert with the three credit bureau  you can place a fraud alert at one of the three major credit bureau by phone and also via experians or equifaxs website  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  you can learn more about fraud alert by contact the credit bureau or by visit their website

monitor your account 
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
social security number  
date of birth  
address for the prior two to five year  
proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax 
experian 
transunion

notice of data breach 
 
pendrick capital partner hold llc  pendrick  be inform you of a recent incident that may affect some of your information  pendrick acquire medical debt and receive information from entity a part of it normal business operation  we be provide you with notice of the incident  step we be take in response  and resource available to help protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on or about may     pendrick discover suspicious activity relate to an employee email account  we immediately take step to secure the account and launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  this investigation confirm access to certain employee email account on separate occasion between april     to may     while the investigation be able to determine the email account be access  it be unable to determine whether any specific email or attachment within the impact email account be actually access by the unauthorized individual  a part of our investigation  on or about june     an initial review of the impact account determine they may contain information relate to certain pendrick customer  therefore  out of an abundance of caution  we conduct a comprehensive review of the impact email account to identify email or attachment that contain protect information  
 
what information be involve  
 
on or about june     this review be complete  and we immediately begin a review of the result to identify address information for the individual whose information may have be affect and to determine which pendrick customer the individual belong  this additional review be complete on or about july     and we then work to provide notification to potentially impact individual a quickly a possible  the information potentially impact include your name  extraextra  to date  pendrick have no evidence of actual or attempt misuse of your information  
 
what we be do  
 
pendrick take the confidentiality  privacy  and security of information in our possession very seriously  a part of our ongoing commitment to the privacy and security of personal security measure to mitigate any risk associate with this incident and to better prevent similar incident from occur in the future  in addition to notify you  we be also notify state regulator  where require  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your account statement  monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity  and to detect error  additionally  we be offer you access to complimentary credit monitor service for extra month through experian  you can find out more about how to safeguard your information in the enclose step you can take to help protect your information  
 
for more information  
 
if you have question about this incident that be not address in this letter  you may reach pendrick at      from  a m  to  p m  pst  monday through friday and  a m  to  p m  pst  on saturday suspicious activity relate to an employee email account be discover  and investigation confirm access to certain employee email account on separate occasion between april     to may     although it couldnt be determine whether any specific email or attachment within the impact email account be actually access by the unauthorized individual  the investigation confirm that the email account be access

at san andreas regional center  we value transparency and respect the privacy of your information  which be why we be write to let you know about a data breach that may involve some of your personal information  
 
what happen 
 
on july     we discover that we be the victim of a sophisticate ransomware attack that impact our network and server  ransomware incident typically involve an unauthorized actor gain access to an entitys network and deploy malware that encrypt the entitys file  make them inaccessible  the unauthorized actor then commonly demand a ransom payment in exchange for the key to decrypt the entitys file  
 
after discover the incident  we quickly take step to secure and safely restore our system and operation  further  we immediately engage outside counsel and third party forensic expert to conduct a thorough investigation of the incident nature and scope  assist in the remediation effort  and contact and file a report with the fbi  we conclude our initial investigation on august     and determine that an unauthorized individual encrypt some of our system that contain your information  further  the unauthorized individual acquire some of the information contain on our server  but we cannot confirm if the information obtain by the unauthorized individual include your information  
 
however  a of now  we have no evidence indicate misuse of any of your information  but we want to notify you of this incident out of an abundance of caution  
 
what information be involve 
 
the type of information potentially involve be your first and last name  address  date of birth  telephone number  social security number  email address  health plan beneficiary number  health insurance information  full face photo  and or comparable image  uci  unique identify number or code generate by u for you   medical information  diagnosis  disability code  and other certificate license number  
 
what we be do 
 
a explain above  we take immediate step to secure our system  file a report with the fbi  and engage third party forensic expert to assist in the investigation  further  in response to this incident  we be implement cybersecurity safeguard  enhance our employee cybersecurity training  and improve our cybersecurity policy  procedure  and protocol to help minimize the likelihood of this type of incident occur again  
 
what you can do 
 
the security and privacy of the information contain within our system be a top priority for u  therefore  while we have no evidence indicate your information be misuse  we strongly recommend you remain vigilant  monitor and review all of your financial and account statement  and report any unusual activity to the institution that issue the record and law enforcement  please see other important information on the follow page for guidance on how to best protect your identity

american freight  llc and it relate subsidiary and affiliate  include american freight outlet store  llc  american freight   understand the importance of protect and secure the personal information that we maintain  i be write to inform you of an incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you may consider take  
 
what happen  
 
we have conduct an investigation involve unauthorizedaccess to a small number of our employee email account  upon first learn of the unauthorizedaccess  we immediately take step to secure the employee email account and begin an investigation  the investigation determine that an unauthorized person have access to the content of the account at various time between november     and december     
 
what information be involve  
 
the investigation do not determine whether the unauthorized individual view any content in the subject email account  we search the content of the account to identify document contain personal information that may have be view or acquire and on june     we determine that an email or attachment contain your   bb text  impact data     
 
what we be do

what you can do

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
triple bureau credit monitor 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data at any of the three national credit bureau  for instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  youll have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  
 
to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
if your health information be involve  we also recommend that you review any statement that you receive relate to your health insurance  if you identify any service that you do not receive  please notify your healthcare provider immediately  
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it the breach involve unauthorizedaccess to the email account of a small number of employee due to hack by an unauthorized person

syufy enterprise  lp  syufy  be commit to protect the privacy and security of the information entrust to u  we be write to inform you of a recent event that may impact some of your information  although we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  we be provide you with detail about the event  step we be take in response  and resource available to help you better protect your information  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on september     we detect suspicious activity on certain system on the syufy network  we immediately launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  through the investigation  we identify certain file and folder on the network that may have be view or take by an unauthorized actor between september     and september     although the investigation could not definitively confirm whether an unauthorized actor view or take such file  in an abundance of caution  we conduct a thorough review of the potentially impact file to determine whether they contain any sensitive information  this review be complete on or about march     we thereafter work to identify address information in order to notify potentially impact individual  which we have now complete  
 
what information be involve  
 
we cannot confirm if the unauthorized actor s  view or take any specific information relate to you  however  we determine that the potentially at risk file contain your name  data element  
 
what we be do  
 
we take step to contain the incident  include reset user password promptly upon discovery  a part of our ongoing commitment to the privacy and security of information in our care  we be evaluate opportunity to improve security and to better prevent future event of this kind  we have secure the service of idx to provide you with credit monitor and identity restoration service for  month  at no cost to you  
 
what you can do  
 
a a precaution  we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your account statement and by monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  you can find out more about how to better protect against the potential misuse of information in the enclose step you can take to protect your information  there  you will also find more information about the credit monitor service we be offer and how to enroll

step you can take to protect your information 
 
enroll in credit monitor 
 
  website and enrollment  go to  and follow the instruction for enrollment use your enrollment code provide at the top of the letter  
  activate the credit monitor provide a part of your idx identity protection membership  the monitor include in the membership must be activate to be effective  note  you must have establish credit and access to a computer and the internet to use this service  if you need assistance  idx will be able to assist you  
  telephone  contact idx at     to gain additional information about this event and speak with knowledgeable representative about the appropriate step to take to protect your credit identity  
 
monitor your account 
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a credit freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a fraud alert or credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax 
  
    
equifax fraud alert  p o  box  atlanta  ga   
equifax credit freeze  p o  box  atlanta  ga   
 
experian 
  
    
experian fraud alert  p o  box   allen  tx  
experian credit freeze  p o  box   allen  tx  
 
transunion 
  
    
transunion fraud alert  p o  box   chester  pa  
transunion credit freeze  p o  box   woodlyn  pa  
 
additional information 
 
you may further educate yourself regard identity theft  fraud alert  credit freeze  and the step you can take to protect your personal information by contact the consumer report bureau  the federal trade commission  or your state attorney general  the federal trade commission may be reach at   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc   www identitytheft gov    id theft        and tty       the federal trade commission also encourage those who discover that their information have be misuse to file a complaint with them  you can obtain further information on how to file such a complaint by way of the contact information list above  you have the right to file a police report if you ever experience identity theft or fraud  please note that in order to file a report with law enforcement for identity theft  you will likely need to provide some proof that you have be a victim  instance of know or suspect identity theft should also be report to law enforcement and your state attorney general  
 
this notice have not be delay by law enforcement  there be suspicious activity on syufy enterprise lp network  file and folder be target  and there be no confirmation if the unauthorized actor view or take any specific information relate to the individual data  
content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent security incident that may have involve some of your personal information we maintain very seriously  we provide adverse event report service relate to consumer product for various company  include extra  
 
the incident occur at a third party vendor  netgain  which provide data host service to safetycall  netgain inform u that it experience a network intrusion result in unauthorizedaccess to certain portion of it network  netgain first become aware of a potential security incident on november     which ultimately culminate in the launch of ransomware on december     the last day of unauthorizedaccess on it network be december     netgain report that it environment be secure  
 
on january     netgain inform u that certain of safetycalls customer data may have be take from it network a part of the attack  upon learn of the issue  we immediately obtain the record that may have be compromise and begin a comprehensive review with outside data privacy professional to determine whether any sensitive data be locate within them  our investigation conclude on extra that the record do contain a limit amount of personal information  
 
the impact data set contain some of your personal information  include your name and any information you provide in relation to the product incident you report when you call to report an issue with an extra product  which may describe a physical injury or adverse reaction  
 
we have no information to date indicate that your information involve in this incident be or will be use for any unintended purpose  to the extent it be helpful  this letter provide precautionary measure you can take to protect your personal information  
 
please accept our apology that this incident occur  we be commit to maintain the privacy of personal information  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line that we have set up to respond to question  the response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do if you be concern about potential misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday from  be to  pm eastern time  or saturday and sunday from  be to  pm eastern time  be prepare to provide your engagement number  
 
we have no information to date indicate that your information involve in this incident be or will be use for any unintended purpose  a a general matter  however  the follow practice can help to protect you from medical identity theft  
 
  only share your health insurance card with your health care provider and other family member who be cover under your insurance plan or who help you with your medical care  
  review your explanation of benefit  eob  which be a statement you receive from your health insurance company after you have a medical visit  follow up with your insurance company or care provider bill office for any item you do not recognize  if necessary  contact the care provider on the eob statement and ask for copy of medical record from the date of the potential access  note above  to current date at no expense to you  
  ask your insurance company for a current year to date report of all service pay for you a a beneficiary  follow up with your insurance company or the care provider for any item you do not recognize  
 
sincerely  
safetycall the breach occur due to unauthorizedaccess from an external and the installation of ransomware on the third party vendor  netgains network  result in the potential theft of customer data  include personal

notice of data breach 
 
dear   first name     last name    
 
we be write to inform you of a data security incident that affect sac wireless  a a result of this incident  the security of some of your personal information may have be compromise  
 
what happen 
 
on june     sac wireless become aware that certain aspect of our internal technology infrastructure may have be access by an unauthorized third party a part of a ransomware attack  upon learn of the incident  we promptly deploy multiple security tool and infrastructure enhancement to contain the incident  we then contact the fbi and engage external counsel and cyber security expert to better understand the scope of the incident and determine what  if any  personalysis  we believe that our infrastructure may have be access a early a april     the threat actor  conti  gain access to the sac system  upload file to it cloud storage  and then  on june   deploy ransomware to encrypt the file on sac system  
 
what information be involve 
 
our internal review of potentially impact personal information list be compromise for every individual  
 
what we be do 
 
we have be work and will continue to work with our cyber and forensic expert to remedy this incident and to identify potential enhancement to our information security system  in response to this ransomware attack  we have already change firewall rule  disconnect vpn connection  activate conditional access geo location policy to limit non u s  access  provide additional employee training  deploy additional network and endpoint monitor tool  expand multi factor authentication  and deploy additional threat hunt and endpoint detection and response tool  we will deploy additional new measure in the come month  and we continue to assess and monitor new threat and security vulnerability on an ongoing basis  
 
a part of protect your online identity and safety  we have engage experian to offer you a free  month membership to their identity protection service  please refer to appendix a for detail on the service provide and how you can enroll for free  
 
what you can do 
 
in addition to enroll for free in experians identity protection service  see appendix a for detail   we recommend you take the follow precaution  
 
security freeze 
 
you can place a security freeze on your credit report  which may help prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any request you make for new loan  credit mortgage  employment  house or other service  it be free to place  lift  or remove a security freeze  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you need to make a request to each consumer report agency  see contact info below   depend on the agency  you may be ask to provide some or all of the follow information when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse or a minor under the age of   this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  you may also need to include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  you may obtain a free security freeze by contact one or more of the follow national credit report agency  
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga

what we be do

notice of data security incident 
 
to   first name     last name    
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have affect your personal information  
 
what happen  
 
on march     mfa financial  inc   mfa  suffer a cybersecurity incident in it legacy environment  upon discovery  we take immediate step to contain the threat and engage a third party forensics firm to investigate the incident and assist with remediation effort  we also notify federal law enforcement authority of the incident  
 
our investigation have find that  between february    and march     the unauthorized party be able to access and remove data from a file server in our legacy environment  which contain personal information pertain to certain mfa employee and contractor  
 
what information may have be involve  
 
a a result of our ongoing investigation  on august     we be able to determine that your personal information may have include  name  address and social security number  
 
what we be do  
 
mfa take the security of personal information very seriously  a soon a we discover the incident  we promptly launch a forensic investigation  contact law enforcement  and take step to remediate the incident  in response to this incident  we have enhance our security and monitor and take other measure to minimize the risk of a similar incident in the future  we have arrange to offer you credit monitor  identity theft protection  and dark web monitor service for a period of two year  at no cost to you  through idx  you have until december    to activate these service  and instruction on how to activate these service be include in the attach reference guide  
 
what you can do  
 
in addition to sign up for your complimentary credit monitor  the enclose reference guide include additional information on general step you can take to monitor and protect your personal information  we encourage you to carefully review credit report and account statement to ensure that all of your account activity be valid  any questionable charge should be promptly report to the company with which the account be maintain  
 
for more information 
 
if you have any question about this matter or would like additional information  please refer to the enclose reference guide  visit  or call toll free     the call center be open from   be to   pm eastern time  monday through friday  except holiday  
 
we regret that this incident occur and apologize for any inconvenience this incident may have cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
harold e  schwartz 
senior vice president   secretary 
 
reference guide 
 
review your account statement 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  
 
order your free credit report 
 
to order your free annual credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com  call toll free at       or complete the annual credit report request form on the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www ftc gov and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    the three credit bureau provide free annual credit report only through the website  toll free number or request form  upon receive your credit report  review it carefully  look for account you do not open  look in the inquiry section for name of creditor from whom you have not request credit  some company bill under name other than their store or commercial name  the credit bureau will be able to tell if this be the case  look in the personal activity  
 
how to enroll in idx credit monitor protection 
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service for two year provide by idx  to enroll in this service  please call    or visit  and follow the instruction for enrollment use enrollment code  enrollment code the monitor include in the membership must be activate to be effective  note  you must have establish credit and access to a computer and the internet to use this service  if you need assistance  idx will be able to assist you  we encourage you to take advantage of these protection and remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft  include regularly review and monitor your credit report and account statement  
 
contact the u s  federal trade commission 
 
if you detect any unauthorized transaction in any of your financial account  promptly notify the appropriate payment card company or financial institution  if you detect any incident of identity theft or fraud  promptly report the matter to your local law enforcement authority  state attorney general and the ftc  you can contact the ftc to learn more about how to protect yourself from become a victim of identity theft by use the contact information below  
 
federal trade commission 
consumer response center 
 pennsylvania avenue  nw 
washington  dc  
  idtheft     
www ftc gov idtheft  
 
place a fraud alert on your credit file 
 
to protect yourself from possible identity theft  consider place a fraud alert on your credit file  a fraud alert help protect against the possibility of an identity thief open new credit account in your name  when a credit grantor check the credit history of someone apply for credit  the credit grantor get a notice that the applicant may be the victim of identity theft  the alert notify the credit grantor to take step to verify the identity of the applicant  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by call any one of the toll free fraud number provide below  you will reach an automate telephone system that allow flag of your file with a fraud alert at all three credit bureau  
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  georgia  
   
www equifax com 
 
experian 
p o  box  
allen  texas  
   
www experian com 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
   
www transunion com 
 
security freeze 
 
you have the right to request a credit freeze from a consumer report agency  free of charge  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate a freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a security freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a security freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit bureau  to place a security freeze on your credit report you must contact the credit report agency by phone  mail  or secure electronic mean and provide proper identification of your identity  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  below  please find relevant contact information the breach  and a third party forensics firm assist with remediation effort

information security be among dmgs highest priority  and we have security measure in place to protect information in our care  upon become aware of this incident  we immediately take step to confirm the security of our system  a part of our ongoing commitment to the security of information  we be review exist security policy and have implement additional cybersecurity measure to further protect against similar incident from occur in the future  in addition  we notify law enforcement and be support their investigation into this incident

what happen

what information be involve  
 
we believe it be likely the attacker only want money and not the information on our computer  but the encrypt system may have contain some of your personal information may have be compromise  your name  address  date of birth  insurance policy number  and limit health  such a diagnosis code  and insurance information relate to your treatment  if you would like more information about specific information that be identify  you can request that information by call the number below

dear mr   
 
notice of data breach 
 
what happen  
we be write to inform you about a recent privacy incident that be discover on or around august     at the department of state hospital coalinga  dsh c   an employee of dsh c have be provide patient roster to the unite state district court  eastern district of california  the district court  at the request of the district court  the purpose of this be to determine whether patient be eligible for a waiver of their file fee when file a lawsuit  although the roster contain more information than be need  include information regard patient who never file any lawsuit  there be no evidence that the information on the roster be use for any purpose apart from the district court clerk make an eligibility determination for a public benefit provide by the court  
 
what information be involve  
the dsh c roster provide to the district court contain your name  case number  birth date  legal commitment  admission date  unit number  and gender  the information do not contain other information  such a your social security number  driver license number  or financial account number which could expose you to identity theft  
 
what we be do  
we regret that this incident occur  after discover the error  dsh c take immediate action to limit the exposure of your information by contact the district court clerk to destroy any and all dsh c patient roster that have be provide to the district court by dsh  additionally  any procedure the staff follow regard patient record will be review and revise to provide dsh staff with further clarity  education  and awareness regard data protection  
 
dsh have identify  and be notify  you  a an individual whose protect health information  phi  be provide to the district court  which be why you be receive this letter  in addition  dsh c have report this breach to the california office of information security  the california highway patrol  the u s  health and human service office of civil right  the california department of public health  the california department of justice  and the california office of health information integrity  
 
what you can do  
keep a copy of this notice for your record in case of future problem with your medical record  you may also want to request a copy of your medical record from dsh c  to serve a a baseline by submit the dsh  form to your treatment team  if you be no longer a patient at dsh c  you may mail the form to the health information management department  department of state hospital coalinga  po box   coalinga  ca   
 
other important information  
enclose be a copy of breach help consumer tip from the california attorney general for your review  
 
for more information  
if you have additional question about this breach be also enclose with this notice  you may also e mail u with question at dshcshprivacyofficerdsh ca gov  please do not include your social security number or medical information in an e mail to dsh  
 
you may also contact your patient right advocate  jodie keasler  at       or the patient right assistant  garrett stipe  at

dear   name     
 
k and b surgical center  llc  k b  be write to inform you of a recent data security incident that may have result in an unauthorizedaccess of your sensitive personal information at this time  we be provide you with detail about the event  step we be take in response  and free resource available to help you protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
on march     k b discover that an unauthorized user have gain access to it network  upon discovery of this incident  k b promptly engage a specialize cybersecurity firm to conduct a forensic investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  on april     the forensic investigation determine that an unauthorized user access k b system from march    to march     then k b perform data mining on the affect server to identify the specific individual and the type of information that may have be compromise  and on july     k b finalize the list of individual to notify  at this time  k b have no reason to believe your personal information have be misuse by any third party  however  out of an abundance of caution  k b want to inform you of this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
the type of information involve vary by individual  however  the information potentially expose during the unauthorizedaccess may have include your name  date of birth  and other data element  
 
what we be do 
 
k b be commit to ensure the privacy and security of all personally  k b be provide you with guidance on how to help protect against the possibility of information misuse  
 
furthermore  k b be provide you with  month of complimentary identity monitor service through equifax  while k b be cover the cost of these service  you will need to complete the activation process by follow the instruction include in the enclose step you can take to help protect your information  
 
what you can do 
 
k b encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review your account statement  and to monitor your credit report for suspicious or unauthorized activity  additionally  security expert suggest that you contact your financial institution and all major credit bureau to inform them of such a breach and take the recommend step to protect your interest  include the possible placement of a fraud alert on your credit file  please review the enclose step you can take base on the description of the incident  an unauthorized user gain access to k b network and the company engage a specialize cybersecurity firm to investigate the nature and scope of the incident  therefore  it be most likely a hack

notice of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you about a recent data security incident that may have result in unauthorizedaccess to your protect health information  raa of ca be a cover entity that provide anesthesiology service through a professional service agreement with dignity health  d b a mercy hospital downtown and d b a mercy hospital southwest  we value and respect the privacy of your information and apologize for any concern or inconvenience this may cause you  this letter contain information about what happen and step we be take to protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
on july     an administrator at raa of california have their password protect laptop steal  we investigate to determine what patient information may have be present on the laptop and your information be identify  we have no evidence that this information have be access or misuse  but we value patient transparency and want to notify you of this incident  we immediately contact law enforcement and file a police report  but the laptop bag and it content have not be recover  
 
what information be involve  
 
from our investigation  it appear that your protect health information be present on the laptop  this information include your name  address  date of birth  provider name  date of service  diagnosis and treatment information  health insurance information  and other information relate to your medical care  
 
what be we do  
 
while we believe there be a low risk of misuse of your information  we want to offer you identity theft protection service through idx  these service include  month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service  with this protection  idx will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise  
 
enrollment url     
 
enrollment tfn       
 
enrollment code  find at the top of this letter 
 
we want to assure you that we be take step to prevent this type of incident from happen in the future  we be in the process of make sure all health professional laptop be encrypt  and we be also review exist policy and procedure relate to patient confidentiality  we will also be retrain our staff member on appropriate protocol for the storage of patient information  
 
we encourage you to enroll in the identity monitor service  and we always recommend our client keep an eye on their benefit statement for any suspicious activity  if you have any question or concern  please call     monday through friday from  be    pm pacific time  please note the deadline to enroll be december     
 
your trust be a top priority of ours  and we deeply regret any inconvenience or concern that this matter may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
marc koch  md 
 
chief executive officer 
 
raa of ca 
 
recommend step to help protect your information 
 
  website and enrollment  go to  and follow the instruction for enrollment use your enrollment code provide at the top of the letter

  telephone  contact idx at     to gain additional information about this event and speak with knowledgeable representative about the appropriate step to take to protect your credit identity  
 
  review your credit report  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor credit report  under federal law  you also be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report company  to obtain a free annual credit report  go to www annualcreditreport com or call      you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report by one of the three credit bureau every four month  if you discover any suspicious item and have enroll in idx identity protection  notify them immediately by call or by log into the idx website and file a request for help  if you file a request for help or report suspicious activity  you will be contact by a member of our id care team who will help you determine the cause of the suspicious item  in the unlikely event that you fall victim to identity theft a a consequence of this incident  you will be assign an id care specialist who will work on your behalf to identify  stop  and reverse the damage quickly  you should also know that you have the right to file a police report if you ever experience identity fraud  please note that to file a crime report or incident report with law enforcement for identity theft  you will likely need to provide some kind of proof that you have be a victim  a police report be often require to dispute fraudulent item  you can report suspect incident of identity theft to local law enforcement or to the attorney general  
 
  place fraud alert with the three credit bureau  if you choose to place a fraud alert  we recommend you do this after activate your credit monitor  you can place a fraud alert at one of the three major credit bureau by phone and also via experians or equifaxs website  a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  the contact information for all three bureau be a follow

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc

fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov and www ftc gov idtheft       resident of new york  maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have expose some of your personal information  we take the protection and proper use of your information very seriously  for this reason  we be contact you directly to explain the circumstance of the incident  
 
what happen  
 
in late july  a title company use a a vendor for some loan transaction by nation lend be a victim of a ransomware attack that freeze the data in their system and make it inaccessible  the company have be restore it system through the use of backup and redundant measure  but they have not rule out the possibility that the individual whose malware cause the incident be able to access information from the system  nation lend receive notice from the company a few week later and launch it inquiry to attempt to determine which of our customer information might be at risk  
 
what information be involve  
 
information from the close package for your loan  include document bear your name  address  social security number  email  account financial information  and information about your asset  
 
what we be do  
 
we suspend any further transaction with the vendor and move pending close to our other service provider  the vendor be review their security practice and control and upgrade their security system  before we resume any business transaction with this vendor  they will have to pass a complete cybersecurity evaluation and demonstrate that their system and personnel be harden against any further attack  we be also require a review of their data storage policy to minimize how long your information remain in their system  
 
to help relieve concern and restore confidence follow this incident  we have secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintended with this letter  
 
what you can do  
 
please review the enclose additional resource section include with this letter  this section describe additional step you can take to help protect yourself  include recommendation by the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection and detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file
