free credit report  
 
it be recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  especially activity that may indicate fraud and identity theft  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  
 
to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available from the u s  federal trade commission  ftc  website at www consumer ftc gov  to  
 
annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    
 
for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  
 
you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past  year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible and display your name  current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
federal trade commission and state attorney general office  
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your home state  you may also contact these agency for information on how to prevent or minimize the risk of identity theft  
 
you may contact the federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   www ftc gov bcp edu microsites idtheft     idtheft

for connecticut resident  you may contact the connecticut office of the attorney general  the ransomware attack mention be a type of malware attack that fall under the  hack by an external or infect by malware  label

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident that may have result in unauthorizedaccess to some of our customer payment card data use on our website  www dickblick com  at dick blick hold  inc   dick blick hold   we take the privacy and security of your personal information seriously and be continuously evaluate and improve our security and payment system to ensure your information be secure  
 
what happen  
 
we recently discover that our website  www dickblick com  which be use for online purchase  be modify by a bad actor with malicious code that capture certain payment card data a it be enter on the website by customer in connection with a purchase  we immediately engage external forensic investigator and data privacy professional and commence a prompt and thorough investigation into the incident  a a result of this review  we determine that the payment card information that potentially may have be access be information relate to transaction between march     and december     make on our website  www dickblick com  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information that may have be acquire in this incident include customer name  credit or debit card number  payment card   cvvs   or  digit code on the front or back of the payment card   and payment card expiration date  we discover on august     that you complete a transaction at our website  www dickblick com  between march     and december     with your payment card end in last four digit  and your payment card information may be at risk  no other personal information of yours be affect because of this incident  your payment card company be already aware of the potential risk to your payment card and may have already close your account and reissue you a new payment card  
 
what we be do 
 
because we value our relationship with you  we want to make you aware of the incident  we also want to let you know what we be do to further secure your information and suggest step you can take to protect your information  since learn of the incident  we have implement enhance security safeguard to help protect against similar intrusion  we be also conduct ongoing monitor of our website  www dickblick com  to ensure that it be secure from any malicious activity  
 
what you can do 
 
a a best practice  you should call your bank or payment card issuer if you see any suspicious transaction  the policy of the payment card brand  such a visa  mastercard  american express  and discover  provide that you be not liable for any unauthorized charge if you report them in a timely manner  you should also ask your bank or payment card issuer whether a new card should be issue to you if it have not be already  below you will find precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant by review your financial account statement for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis and monitor free credit report  
 
for more information 
 
your trust be a top priority for dick blick hold  and we deeply regret the inconvenience this may have cause  the privacy and protection of our customer information be a matter we take seriously  if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our dedicate and confidential toll free response line to respond to question at phone number  this response line be staff with professional familiar with this incident and knowledgeable on what you can do to protect against misuse of your information  the response line be available monday through friday    a m  to   p m  eastern time  
 
other important information 
 
  place a fraud alert  you may place an initial one year fraud alert on your credit file  at no charge  a fraud alert tell creditor to contact you personally before they open any new account  to place a fraud alert  call any one of the three major credit bureau at the number list below  a soon a one credit bureau confirm your fraud alert  they will notify the others

to place the security freeze  youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  pin  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
if your personal information have be use to file a false tax return  to open an account or to attempt to open an account in your name or to commit fraud or other crime against you  you may file a police report with your local law enforcement agency  
 
  obtain a free credit report  under federal law  you be entitle to one free credit report every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call     or request your free credit report online at www annualcreditreport com  once you receive your credit report  review them for discrepancy  identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  verify all information be correct  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report company  
 
  additional helpful resource  even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  be sure to obtain a copy of the police report  a many creditor will want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you may also file a complaint with the federal trade commission  ftc  by contact them on the internet at www ftc gov idtheft  by phone at   idtheft        or by mail at federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  in addition  you may obtain information from the ftc about fraud alert and security freeze

content of data breach notification letter  dear   first name    
 
we regret to inform you that your information may have be involve in a data security incident  eastern los angeles regional center  elarc  take the privacy and security of all information very seriously  although there be no evidence to suggest that any of the impact information be subject to actual or attempt misuse during this incident  we want to be a supportive and transparent a possible  therefore  we be write to inform you about the incident  our response  and step you can take to help protect your information  
 
what happen  
on july     elarc discover suspicious activity relate to one employee email account  upon discovery  elarc take swift action to secure it email system and network  elarc also immediately launch an internal investigation and engage lead  independent cybersecurity specialist  base on this investigation  elarc confirm on august     one employee email account be subject to unauthorizedaccess for a limit period of time on july     although there be no reason to believe that any information within the affect email account be subject to actual or attempt misuse during this incident  we be provide this notification to you out of an abundance of caution and so that you may monitor your information and take advantage of the complimentary resource be offer to you  
 
what information be involve  
the type of information that may have be impact include your first and last name  social security number  elarc issue unique client identifier number  tax id number  information regard your medical history  treatment or diagnosis  and or health insurance information  
 
what we be do  
we have take every step necessary to address the incident and be commit to fully protect all of the information that you have entrust to u  upon learn of this incident  we immediately take the step describe above  we have also implement additional technical safeguard to further enhance the security of information in our possession and prevent similar incident from happen in the future  in addition  we have arrange for you to activate  at no cost to you  an online identity monitor service for  month provide by kroll  due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  additional information regard how to activate the complimentary identity monitor service be enclose  
 
what you can do  
we recommend that you remain vigilant in regularly review and monitor all of your account and explanation of benefit statement to guard against any unauthorized transaction or activity  if you discover any suspicious or unusual activity on your account  please promptly contact your financial institution or company  we have provide additional information below  which contain more information about step you can take to help protect yourself against fraud and identity theft

step you can take to help protect information

take advantage of your identity monitor service  
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
single bureau credit monitor  
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data  for instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation  
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration

you can sign up for the online identity monitor service anytime between now and december     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  activate this service will not affect your credit score  you must be over age  with a credit file activate these service  
 
monitor your account

you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any of the three credit report bureau list below  a an alternative to a fraud alert  you have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without your express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a credit freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  e g   state driver license or identification card   and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  if you be a victim of identity theft

review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity

security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  there be no charge to place  lift or remove the security freeze  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement

credit and security freeze  you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze can be place without any charge and be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the three major credit report company a specify below to find out more information

notice of data breach 
 
navistar  inc   navistar  value the privacy of our current and former employee and use physical  and administrative measure to safeguard your personal information  our record indicate you be a current or former participant in either the navistar  inc  health plan or the navistar  inc  retiree health benefit and life insurance plan  collectively  the plan   we be write to you to notify you about a security incident we recently experience  which have impact information relate to your participation in the plan  below be detail on the step we be take to address the situation  
 
what happen  
 
on may     navistar learn of a potential security incident affect it information technology system  it system   upon learn of the security incident  navistar launch an investigation and take immediate action in accordance with our cybersecurity response plan  navistar conduct it investigation with the assistance of lead cybersecurity expert hire to evaluate and address the scope and impact of the incident  on may     navistar receive a claim that certain data have be extract from our it system  in the course of our investigation  we be able to confirm that an unauthorized third party have access and take certain data from our it system  include data relate to participant in the plan  on august     we discover that some of the data take by the unauthorized third party contain information relate to your participation in the plan  base on the information navistar have at this time  we believe that this incident occur prior to may     
 
what information be involve  
 
the data that be take may have include your full name  address  date of birth  and information relate to your participation in the plan  such a information identify certain of your provider and prescription  
 
what be we do  
 
we take immediate action to investigate the situation once we learn of the potential incident  navistar have take a number of step to enhance our security protocol and control  technology  and training  we continue to assess further option to protect our it system  
 
what can you do  
 
we recommend that you remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft  you can review your account statement and monitor free credit the data breach appear to have be cause by an unauthorized third party access and extract data from navistars it system

content of data breach notification letter  dear   name     
 
we regret to inform you that forward air corporation  forward air  recently experience a data breach that may have impact the security of your personal information  we be write to provide you with information about the incident  our response  and step you can take to better protect yourself against identity theft and fraud  
 
on december     we discover suspicious activity occur within certain company computer system  we immediately launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  our investigation reveal that certain forward air system be accessible in november and early december   and that certain data  which may have include your personal information  be potentially view or take by an unknown actor  
 
on or about july     we determine that your name  address  date of birth  social security number  driver license number  passport number  or bank account number be potentially view and or take by an unknown actor  while there be no indication that anyones information have be subject to actual or attempt misuse  we be notify you because your information be store on our system  
 
the confidentiality  privacy  and security of information entrust to u be among our highest priority  and we take this incident very seriously  a part of our ongoing commitment to information security  we be review our exist policy and procedure regard data privacy and be evaluate additional measure and safeguard to protect against this type of incident in the future  in addition to notify you  we will also be notify state regulator  a require  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for  month provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
to enroll in this service  please go directly to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and enter the follow unique  letter activation code   activation code    follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base  credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the follow  digit telephone passcode   pass code   and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain  month of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and vantagescore credit score by transunion  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address  and more  the service also include the ability to lock and unlock your transunion credit report online  access to identity restoration service that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity  and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
you can sign up for the mytrueidentity online credit monitor service anytime between now and   enrollment deadline    due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file at transunion  or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  or be under the age of   enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
we encourage you to monitor your account and order your free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free      you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft

notice of security incident 
 
dear   name     
 
forward air corporation  forward air  write to inform you of a recent incident that may impact the security of some of your information  a a current or former independent contractor or driver  forward air maintain certain information relate to you  this letter contain information about the incident  our response  and step you should take to better protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on december     forward air learn of suspicious activity occur within certain company computer system  forward air immediately launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  the investigation determine that certain forward air system be accessible in november and early december   and that certain data  which may have include your personal base on the information provide  it appear that the data breach be cause by an unintendeddisclosure  a a result of suspicious activity detect within the company computer system  there be no evidence of hack  insider activity  or physicaltheft

re  notice of data security incident 
 
dear individual  
 
mtg greatly value the relationship we have with you and understand the importance of protect your personal information  this letter also describe credit protection service we be provide to you free of charge  
 
what happen  
 
after mtg become aware of suspicious activity  we launch a comprehensive investigation  suspend credit card transaction  move the server offline  and engage a third party forensic specialist to determine the nature and scope of the incident  on september     the investigation conclude that the incident occur between june     and june     potentially expose certain transaction  mtg report this security incident to law enforcement  
 
what information be involve  
 
accord to the forensic firm  the information in this cyber incident concern payment card information for certain order place on our website  the information involve include the name  address  and credit card information  we want to clarify that we do not store full credit card information beyond the completion of the sale transaction  there be no other personal information involve in this incident  
 
what we be do 
 
mtg take the protection of your personal information  
 
further  we decide to take a number of other step to promote security  for example  we implement enhance security protocol and suspend all sale activity on our platform to ensure the threat be contain  we have decide to use a new shop platform to handle credit card process of order meet specific security requirement  the new site will be launch at  www refausa com 
 
what you can do 
 
in addition to enroll in the complimentary two year membership of experians identityworkssm  we encourage you to consider these measure to monitor and protect your personal information and to remain vigilant for potential incident of fraud and identity theft  
 
vigilance  regularly monitor your financial account and  if you see any unfamiliar activity  promptly contact your financial institution  monitor your credit report  which be available free of charge  a note below  
 
free annual credit report  you may obtain a free annual credit report from each of the three national consumer credit report company  experian  equifax  and transunion  by call      or by log onto www annualcreditreport com  for more information about obtain your free credit report  visit the federal trade commission  ftc  site at    
 
fraud alert  you may place a fraud alert on your credit file to ask creditor to contact you before they open any new account or change your exist account  a request for an initial alert or an extend alert can be make from any of the three national consumer credit report company and can help detect any possible misuse of your personal information  note that a fraud alert may protect you but also may cause delay when you seek to obtain credit  the initial fraud alert be active for  day and can be extend  for more information about fraud alert and security or credit freeze  visit the ftc site at    
 
security or credit freeze  you may place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a freeze prevent an unauthorized personal consumer credit report company at the toll free telephone number or website list below  keep in mind that when you place the freeze  you will not be able to borrow money  obtain instant credit  or get a new credit card until you temporarily lift or permanently remove the freeze

content of data breach notification letter  subject  unauthorizedaccess to your coinbase account 
 
dear insert customer name  
 
we be write to inform you about an unauthorized third party gain access to your coinbase account and what we be do to help you manage this  
 
unfortunately  between march and may     you be a victim of a third party campaign to gain unauthorizedaccess to the account of coinbase customer and move customer fund off the coinbase platform  at least   coinbase customer have fund remove from their account  include you  
 
in order to access your coinbase account  these third party first need prior knowledge of the email address  password  and phone number associate with your coinbase account  a well a access to your personal email inbox  while we be not able to determine conclusively how these third party gain access to this information  this type of campaign typically involve phishing attack or other social engineer technique to trick a victim into unknowingly disclose login credential to a bad actor  we have not find any evidence that these third party obtain this information from coinbase itself  
 
even with the information describe above  additional authentication be require in order to access your coinbase account  however  in this incident  for customer who use sm text for two factor authentication  the third party take advantage of a flaw in coinbases sm account recovery process in order to receive an sm two factor authentication token and gain access to your account  
 
a soon a coinbase learn of this issue  we update our sm account recovery protocol to prevent any further bypass of that authentication process  
 
we will be deposit fund into your account equal to the value of the currency improperly remove from your account at the time of the incident  some customer have already be reimburse    we will ensure all customer affect receive the full value of what you lose  you should see this reflect in your account no later than today  
 
we be set up a dedicate phone support line for our customer who have be impact by this at        these representative be aware of this incident and can answer additional question you may have  this phone support line be available for question and support relate to this incident only    other general inquiry should be direct to   
 
we will be provide free credit monitor to affect customer who be interest and if available in your country of residence  we will be share information about how to obtain that service in a separate communication shortly  
 
coinbase have also be work closely with law enforcement to support it investigation into the individual behind this incident  coinbases internal investigation into this incident be ongoing  
 
the third party who access your coinbase account would have be able to view the follow information  depend on what information you have in your account  your full name  email address  home address  date of birth  ip address for account activity  transaction history  account hold  and balance  
 
we strongly encourage our customer who currently use sm base two factor authentication to use an even stronger method of secure their coinbase account  such a time base one time password  totp  or a hardware security key  
 
we also strongly encourage you to change the password on your coinbase account to a new  strong and unique password that you do not use on any other site  because the third party need access to your personal email account a part of this incident  we strongly encourage you to change your password in the same way for your email account and for any other online account where you use a similar password  
 
we encourage you to monitor your personal account and free credit report for any suspicious activity  consistent with best practice for the next   month  incident of suspect identity theft can and should be report to law enforcement and government agency  include the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
we recognize that the trust you place in coinbase be precious and we will continuously work to uphold the highest standard to maintain that trust  please be assure that we will continue to aggressively pursue bad actor and monitor our product to ensure the highest standard of security be meet  if you need additional assistance with your account  please dont hesitate to reply to this support case  
 
sincerely  
the coinbase team the unauthorized third party gain access to customer coinbase account use phishing attack or other social engineer technique and move customer fund off the platform  take advantage of a flaw in coinbases sm account recovery process to bypass two factor authentication  at least   customer have fund remove from their account  and the intruder be able to view sensitive information such a name  email address  home address  transaction history  account hold  and balance  coinbase reimburse all affect customer and provide free credit monitor and support through a phone line  the case be still under investigation

notice of data breach 
 
to our customer  
 
we be write to notify you about an issue that may involve your neiman marcus online account information  
 
what happen  
 
earlier this month  we learn that in may  an unauthorized party obtain personal information associate with certain of our customer online account  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information for affect customer vary and may have include your name and contact information  payment card number and expiration date  without cvv number   neiman marcus virtual gift card number  without pin   and the username  password  and security question and answer associate with your neiman marcus online account  more than  of affect payment and virtual gift card be expire or invalid  
 
what we be do 
 
promptly after learn of the issue  we engage a lead cybersecurity expert and notify law enforcement  our investigation be ongoing  and we be work quickly to determine the nature and scope of the matter  to protect our customer  we require an online account password reset for affect customer who have not change their password since may   we will continue to take action to enhance our system security and safeguard information  
 
what you can do 
 
we deeply regret that this incident occur  we take our obligation to safeguard personal information very seriously and be alert you so you can take step to help protect your information  these step include the follow  
 
  if you detect unauthorized transaction involve your payment card  please contact your payment card company or financial institution  
  change your credential for any other online account if you use credential that be the same a or similar to those use for your neiman marcus account  
  order a credit report  you be entitle under u s  law to one free credit report annually from each of the three nationwide consumer report agency  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      we encourage you to remain vigilant by review your account statement and monitor your free credit report  
 
the reference guide below provide recommendation by the u s  federal trade commission on the protection of personal information  
 
for more information 
 
we hope this information be useful to you  for more detail about this issue  please visit  or call      monday through friday  a m     p m  cst  saturday and sunday  a m     p m  cst  exclude major u s  holiday   please be prepare to provide engagement number b  
 
we regret any inconvenience this may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
david goubert 
president and chief customer officer 
 
reference guide 
 
we encourage affect customer to take the follow step  
 
order your free credit report  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com  call toll free at      or complete the annual credit report request form on the u s  federal trade commission  ftcs  website at www consumer ftc gov and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga    the three nationwide consumer report agency provide free annual credit report only through the website  toll free number  or request form  
 
when you receive your credit report  review it carefully  look for account you do not open  look in the inquiry section for name of creditor from whom you have not request credit  some company bill under name other than their store or commercial name  the consumer report agency will be able to tell you when that be the case  look in the personal activity  
 
report incident  if you detect any unauthorized transaction in a financial account  promptly notify your payment card company or financial institution  if you detect any incident of identity theft or fraud  promptly report the incident to law enforcement  the ftc  and your state attorney general  if you believe your identity have be steal  the ftc recommend that you take these step  
 
  close the account that you have confirm or believe have be tamper with or open fraudulently  for streamline checklist and sample letter to help guide you through the recovery process  please visit   
  file a local police report  obtain a copy of the police report and submit it to your creditor and any others that may require proof of the identity theft crime  
 
you can contact the ftc to learn more about how to protect yourself from become a victim of identity theft and how to repair identity theft  
 
federal trade commission

washington  dc

in accordance with iowa code c   c   i be write on behalf of the neiman marcus group  llc  nmg or the company  to notify you regard a data security issue  earlier this month  nmg learn that in may  an unauthorized party obtain personal information for affect customer vary and may have include name and contact information  payment card number and expiration date  without cvv number   neiman marcus virtual gift card number  without pin   and usernames  password  and security question and answer associate with neiman marcus online account  more than  percent of the affect payment and virtual gift card be expire or invalid  although the affect payment and virtual gift card data and a portion of the impact password be encrypt  the unauthorized party appear to have obtain the relevant decryption key  the rest of the impact password be hash  the company previously discontinue use of security question and answer for customer neiman marcus online account  
 
promptly after learn of the issue  nmg engage mandiant  a lead cybersecurity expert  and notify federal law enforcement  nmgs investigation be ongoing  and the company be work quickly to determine the nature and scope of the matter  to protect the company customer  nmg require an online account password reset for affect customer who have not change their password since may   the company will continue to take action to enhance it system security and safeguard information

very truly yours

subject  notice of data breach 
 
dear   first name     last name    
 
at pulmuone food usa  inc   we be commit to protect the confidentiality and security of the information we receive and maintain  we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident we experience that may have involve some of your information  while we be unaware of any misuse of your information  we be notify you of the incident  offer you complimentary credit monitor and identity protection service  and inform you about step you can take to help protect your personal information  
 
what happen  
 
on august     pulmuone food learn of a security incident that result in unauthorizedaccess to our digital environment  upon discover this unauthorized activity  pulmuone food immediately secure our digital environment and begin to investigate  we also engage a lead computer forensic firm and cybersecurity expert to conduct an investigation to determine what happen  the investigation reveal that an unauthorized party access certain file and data store on pulmuones computer server  
 
what information be involve  
 
pulmuone complete a comprehensive review of the data that could have potentially be access by the unauthorized party and  on august     determine that information include your  name  social security number  and driver license number  
 
what we be do  
 
to prevent something like this from happen again  we be implement additional technical security measure and increase employee cybersecurity training  while we have no indication that your information have be misuse  we be nonetheless provide you with information about step that you can take to help protect your personal information  a a further precaution  we be also offer you one year of complimentary credit and identity monitor service through idx  this product help detect possible misuse of your information and provide you with identity protection support  
 
what you can do  
 
you can enroll in idxs complimentary credit and identity monitor service by go to  or call      when prompt  please provide the follow unique code   xxxxxxxx   to enroll in the service  the deadline to enroll be december     for more information on how you can protect your personal information  please review the resource provide on the follow page  
 
for more information  
 
if you have any question regard the incident or would like assistance with enroll in the service offer  please call     monday through friday between  a m  to  p m  pacific time  
 
to enroll  please call      or visit   enrollment code    xxxxxxxx    
 
the security of your information be a top priority for pulmuone food  we take your trust in u and this matter very seriously and we deeply regret any worry or inconvenience that this may cause you  
 
sincerely  
 
harry yoon 
chief financial officer 
pulmuone food usa  inc  
 
additional step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www consumer ftc gov  www ftc gov idtheft  
 
copy of credit report  
 
you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free     or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
equifax  p o  box   atlanta  ga        www equifax com  
 
experian  p o  box   allen  tx        www experian com  
 
transunion  p o  box   chester  pa        www transunion com  
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two kind of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report  an initial alert and an extend alert  you may want to consider place either or both fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least  day  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and provide the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert be also free and will stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at  military member may also place an active duty military fraud alert on their credit report while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  
 
credit or security freeze  under u s  law  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  for up to one year at no cost  the freeze will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  for information and instruction on how to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency identify above  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place a you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze from my credit report  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or via phone  a credit bureau must lift the credit freeze within an hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after receive your request  
 
irs identity protection pin  
 
you can obtain an identity protection pin  ip pin  from the irs that prevent someone else from file a tax return use your social security number  the ip pin be know only to you and the irs and help the irs verify your identity when you file your electronic or paper tax return  you can learn more and obtain your ip pin here    
 
you also have certain right under the fair credit report act  fcra   these right include the right to know what be in your file  to dispute incomplete or inaccurate information  to have consumer report agency correct or delete inaccurate  incomplete  or unverifiable information  for more information about the fcra  and your right pursuant to the fcra  please visit   
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  
 
california resident  visit the california office of privacy protection  www oag ca gov privacy  for additional information on protection against identity theft  the data breach at pulmuone food usa  inc  be due to an unauthorized party access certain file and data store on pulmuones computer server  the investigation reveal that the intrusion be a result of hack through unauthorizedaccess to their digital environment

further  we recommend take the follow action immediately  
 
  place a fraud alert on your credit file  we strongly recommend that you place a fraud alert on your credit file  the fraud alert be free and will require potential creditor to verify your identity before issue credit in your name  thereby reduce or hopefully eliminate the likelihood of the creation of an unauthorized account  a call to any one of the three credit report agency list below will place a fraud alert on your credit file with all three agency  you dont need to call all three agency  you will receive letter from the agency confirm the fraud alert and inform you about how to get a free copy of your credit report  the fraud alert be renewable every  day

again  we sincerely regret this incident and want to assure you we do treat the security of the information entrust to u with the utmost importance

dear   name     
 
pacific city bank  pcb  be commit to protect the privacy and security of the information entrust to u  we be write to inform you of a cybersecurity incident that may have affect the security of your personal information  
 
what happen  
 
on august     pcb detect unusual activity on it network  we immediately take action to disable the activity  investigate it source  and monitor our network  subsequently  we become aware of claim that we have be the target of a ransomware attack  on september     we confirm that an external actor have illegally access and or acquire certain data on our network  we have be work with third party forensic investigator to determine the nature and scope of the incident  identify the information that may have be access and or acquire  and determine who may have be affect  the investigation reveal that this incident impact certain file contain certain pcb customer information  some of these file contain document relate to loan application  such a tax return  form w  information of their employee  and payroll record  your information be include a part of the support documentation of your employer loan application  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information impact may vary by individual  
 
what we be do  
 
the privacy and security of the information entrust to u be of the utmost importance to pcb  and we take this incident very seriously  we have report this incident to the appropriate law enforcement authority  a part of our ongoing commitment to ensure the security of information in our care  we have conduct a thorough investigation into this incident and be continue to monitor our system security  additionally  we be review our exist policy and procedure  include our information security plan  to evaluate additional measure and safeguard to protect against this type of incident in the future  
 
what you can do  
 
it be always important to remain vigilant and monitor your financial account statement and credit report for sign of fraud  in addition  pcb be offer you one year of free equifax complete premier credit monitor and identity theft protection  you will not be bill for this service  instruction for enroll in the equifax complete premier program be enclose with this letter  if you be under the age of   you will need to call    to receive a code that allow you to enroll in the equifax credit monitor and identity theft protection service for individual under age   the enclose material also provide important information about additional step you can take to protect your information  
 
security freeze information  
 
you can request a security freeze on your credit file by send a request in write  by mail  to each of the three nationwide credit report company  when a security freeze be add to your credit report  all third party  such a credit lender or other company  whose use be not exempt under law will not be able to access your credit report without your consent  the security freeze may delay  interfere with or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make that involve access to your credit report  this may include  but be not limit to  new loan  credit  mortgage  insurance  rental house  employment  investment  license  cellular phone service  utility service  digital signature service  internet credit card transaction  and extension of credit at the point of sale  
 
other important information  
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft  you should contact your local law enforcement  the federal trade commission  and or your state attorney general and file a police report  
 
please know that the security of your information be of paramount importance to u  and we deeply regret any worry or inconvenience this incident may have cause  if you have additional question  please call    between   a m  and   p m  eastern time  monday through friday  
 
sincerely  
 
andrew chung 
executive vice president   chief risk officer 
pacific city bank

notice of data breach 
 
dear first name  
 
we be write to inform you of an incident potentially involve some of your personal data safe and secure be very important to u and we deeply regret that this incident occur  
 
what happen  
 
on or about june     a third party seek to disrupt our operation by mean of an unauthorized  remote access to our computer network  after become aware of the incident  we quickly take step to secure our system and begin a thorough investigation with the support of lead outside cybersecurity expert  we also promptly notify the fbi of the incident  
 
cmg have determine that the unauthorized third party access a server contain limit personal information be acquire by the unauthorized third party or misuse a a result of this incident  nevertheless  we be notify you out of an abundance of caution because your information be contain in the data set that the unauthorized actor attempt to obtain  
 
what information be involve  
 
the type of personal data field  
 
what we be do 
 
we have implement enhance security control and have be cooperate with law enforcement to investigate this incident  
 
although at this time we have no indication of any misuse of your information  a a precaution  we be offer a complimentary two year membership of identityworkssm credit b which include credit monitor and identity theft protection service through experian  once you enroll  experian provide you with the follow key feature  
 
  experian credit report at signup  see what information be associate with your credit file  daily credit report be available for online member only   
  credit monitor  actively monitor experian  equifax and transunion file for indicator of fraud  
  experian identityworks extendcaretm  you receive the same high level of identity restoration support even after your experian identityworks membership have expire  
   million identity theft insurance    provide coverage for certain cost and unauthorized electronic fund transfer

we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have affect the privacy of some of your personal information  this letter explain the incident and offer you assistance for safeguard your information  include complimentary identity monitor service  
 
what happen 
 
on august     an unauthorized party access the reprosource network  we discover ransomware on the morning of august   and in less than an hour we sever all network connection activity and contain the incident  we immediately launch a comprehensive investigation to determine the cause and scope of the incident  we retain lead cybersecurity expert to assist with our investigation  confirm containment of the ransomware  and quickly and securely recover operation  additionally  we promptly notify law enforcement  
 
while our investigation do not confirm that the unauthorized party acquire data in the incident  out of an abundance of caution  we be notify individual whose personalysis be ongoing  in the interest of initiate notification  we be send you this notice and provide the service outline in this letter  
 
what information be involve 
 
base on our investigation to date  some of your personal information that may have be access  
 
what we be do 
 
a discuss above  upon learn of the attack  we immediately sever all network connection activity and contain the incident  we also enhance our cybersecurity by add additional monitor and detection tool a safeguard against ransomware and other cyber threat  
 
what you can do 
 
to help relieve concern follow this incident  we have secure the service of kroll inc  to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintentional exposure of confidential data  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  a current credit report  web watcher  public persona  quick cash scan   million identity fraud loss reimbursement  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration

for colorado  georgia  maine  maryland  massachusetts  new jersey  puerto rico  and vermont resident  you may obtain one or more  depend on the state  additional copy of your credit report  free of charge  you must contact each of the credit report agency directly to obtain such additional report s   
 
fraud alert  there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency  
 
security freeze  you have the ability to place a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  on your credit report free of charge  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you may use an online process  an automate telephone line  or submit a write request to any of the three credit report agency list above  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that  if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     the unauthorized party access reprosources network and infect it with ransomware  indicate that it be hack by an external

dear attorney general miller  
 
i write on behalf of reprosource fertility diagnostics  inc   reprosource or company  regard a security incident  on august     an unauthorized party access the reprosource network  the company discover ransomware on the morning of august   and in less than an hour sever all network connection activity and contain the incident  reprosource immediately launch a comprehensive investigation to determine the cause and scope of the incident  retain lead cybersecurity expert to assist with it investigation  confirm containment of the ransomware  and quickly and securely recover operation  additionally  the company promptly notify law enforcement  
 
while the company investigation do not confirm that the unauthorized party acquire data in the incident  out of an abundance of caution  we be notify individual whose personal information may have be affect and offer them a one year free subscription to krolls identity monitor service  
 
base on it investigation to date  reprosource have determine that personal information may have include driver license number  passport number  social security number  financial account number  and credit card number  
 
we begin mail notification on october     because our data analysis remain ongoing  we have not yet be able to determine the final number of iowa resident impact  to date  we have identify approximately  iowa resident who may have be impact by the incident  a our analysis progress  we will keep your office inform if we identify additional iowa resident  
 
reprosource have enhance it cybersecurity by add additional monitor and detection tool a safeguard against ransomware and other cyber threat  unaddressed copy of the letter be attach  reprosource have also establish a call center to answer patient question         
 
reprosource remain commit to protect it patient personal information and assist those who may have be affect by this incident  reprosource be provide notice to individual pursuant to  cfr    and applicable state law  by virtue of this notice  the company do not waive any right and reserve all right under such law  
 
please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any question regard this letter  
 
sincerely  
 
phyllis b  sumner

content of data breach notification letter  dear   first name     middle name     last name     suffix    
 
we be write to inform you of a recent cybersecurity incident that may have involve some of your personal information  at timios  inc   we take the security and integrity of our data very seriously and regret any concern this may cause  
 
what happen  
 
we detect unauthorizedaccess to certain device in our network  result in the encryption of some of our system  we immediately activate our incident response plan  take measure to stop the unauthorizedaccess  and launch an investigation  a cybersecurity firm be engage to assist with the investigation and determine the nature and scope of the incident  through the investigation  we identify unauthorizedaccess to timios system between july      on july     the investigation determine that personal information relate to some individual may have be access or acquire by an unauthorized actor during that time  but be unable to determine whether the unauthorized actor actually view any of the information  out of an abundance of caution  we be notify all individual whose data may have be access  we review the file that may have be access or acquire and determine on september     that your information may have be involve  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information access or acquire may include your name and one or more of the follow  social security number  driver license or state issue identification number  passport number  tax identification number  military identification number  financial account number  payment card number  and or date of birth  
 
what we be do  
 
we notify law enforcement and be fully cooperate with their investigation  we be also take a number of step to help prevent something like this from occur again  we implement additional measure to further enhance our security protocol and be provide continue education and training to our employee  
 
a a precaution  we be offer a complimentary one year membership to experians identityworks credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information provide with this letter  
 
what you can do  
 
it be a best practice to remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report for any unauthorized activity  a always  you should remain vigilant for incident of fraud that may attempt to trick you into provide password or other information about yourself  we also encourage you to enroll in experian identityworks  
 
if you have any question  please call       monday through friday from   be to   pm central time  
 
sincerely  
 
ray davison 
chief executive officer 
timios  inc

additional step you can take  
 
we remind you that it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity over the next  to  month  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft  a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security the unauthorizedaccess to certain device in timios network and the encryption of some system indicate that this be a hack incident

step you can take to help protect personal information  
 
activate identity monitor  
to help relieve concern and restore confidence follow this incident  we have secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor at no cost to you for one year  kroll be a global leader in risk mitigation and response  and their team have extensive experience help people who have sustain an unintentional exposure of confidential data  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  
 
monitor your account  
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
place a fraud alert or credit freeze  
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau  
 
additional information  
you may further educate yourself regard identity theft  fraud alert  credit freeze  and the step you can take to protect your personal information be exfiltrated

content of data breach 
 
dear recipient  
 
we be contact you regard a data security incident that occur on september    at the public school and education employee retirement system of missouri  psrs peer   a a result  your personal information may have be potentially expose to an unauthorized individual  please be assure that we have take every step necessary to address the incident  
 
what happen  
this incident occur a a result of a psrs peer employee email account be access by an unauthorized individual  the psrs peer information technology department disable the impact employee email account within a few minute of be notify of the unauthorizedaccess  the unauthorized individual have access to this account for less than one hour  
 
what information be involve  
the access email account contain file with personal psrs peer account number associate with you  it may have also include your birthdate  
 
additional action you can take

content of data breach notification letter  dear customer  
 
we be write to inform you of a data breachases make on either of our website  although we have no knowledge of any actual misuse of your information  we be provide notice to you about the incident  
 
what happen  
 
on september     we receive a notification from our payment processor about a potential data breachase on one of our website during that time  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information that the attacker have access to include your first and last name  your address  your phone number  email  and any debit or credit card number with expiration date you may have use on our website  
 
what be we do  
 
we have correct the security configuration problem on september     and add additional security measure to decrease the possibility of this happen again  we have report this incident to our payment processor  who have alert the credit card company of the data breach  we have also notify the california attorney general of this incident  
 
what you can do  
 
to protect yourself  we recommend that you immediately contact your credit or debit card company and inform them that your card information may have be compromise  so that they can issue you a replacement card if they have not already do so  review your account statement and report any suspicious activity to the relevant financial institution  for more information on identity theft  we suggest that you visit the website of the california office of privacy protection at www privacy ca gov  
 
for more information 
 
if there be anything else that we can do to assist you  please email incident responseacademictherapy com  
 
sincerely  
 
company name base on the information provide  it appear that debit and credit card information may have be compromise through unauthorizedaccess to the company website  the company have report the incident to their payment processor and credit card company  and be advise customer to contact their financial institution to report any suspicious activity

newbridge security corporation understand the importance of protect the information we maintain  we be write to inform you of an incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you may consider take in response  
 
what happen  
newbridge have conclude an investigation into a network intrusion incident by an unauthorized person  upon learn of the incident  we take immediate step to secure the network  begin an investigation  and a cybersecurity firm be engage to assist  
 
what information be involve  
although the investigation determine that some of newbridges network system be access by an unauthorized personal information potentially at risk could not be determine  we determine on august     that information of current or former customer may have be access and may have include your name  address  social security number  and newbridge account information  
 
what we be do  
to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  newbridge have increase several of it security measure  include but not limit to remove legacy authentication method  increase audit log on all system  apply harden policy for greater encryption on system communication  increase the sensitivity of endpoint protection  strengthen password policy to require greater complexity  implement multifactor authentication for both internal and remote network access  and strengthen email security effort for identify phishing or malicious content a well a internal training for our user to identify these type of cyberattacks  
 
what can you do

if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record

fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report

background

what happen

monitor your account 
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax experian transunion
