if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
  experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
  transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
  equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga  the breach be due to an unauthorized actor exploit a configuration error in the microsoft power app portal

step you can take to help protect your personal information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report

fraud alert  
 
you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least one year  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state

notice of data breach 
 
dear ryan aaron  
 
we be write to inform you of an incident that may have involve some of your information  we be provide this notice to explain the incident and measure we have take  and also to provide some step you can take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on june     some centinela valley union high school district computer system be infect with malware that encrypt the data on those machine  we quickly identify and contain the malware  begin to restore access to data  and launch an investigation with the assistance of a cybersecurity firm  
 
what information be involve  
 
on july     the investigation determine that an unauthorized personal information have be steal or misuse  our investigation thus far have not be able to rule out that possibility  
 
what be we do  
 
we have take step to help prevent a similar incident in the future  include the implementation of additional security safeguard and control in our network infrastructure  in an abundance of caution  the district be offer you a complimentary one year membership in identity theft protection service through idx  idx identity protection service include   month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage id theft recovery service

credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
    
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the data breachool district computer system on june     and an unauthorized person access data for current and former employee and student on july     
content of data breach notification letter  dear   name     
 
we be reach out to you again in regard to the security incident that may have compromise the payment card you use in march  for a transaction or attempt transaction at www scufgaming com  we have complete our investigation and want to inform you of the situation  please note that this communication do not mean that fraud do or will occur on your payment card account  however  we advise you to monitor your account and notify your card provider of any unusual or suspicious activity  a a precaution  you may wish to request a new payment card number from your provider  
 
what happen  
on february     login credential for a third party vendor be use to insert an unauthorized script onto the backend system of scuf gamings webstore  the unauthorized script be detect on march     and remove immediately on that same day  we conduct a rigorous investigation in partnership with third party forensic specialist to identify what the script could do and determine on april     that the script be capable of capture credit card information  we then work to determine the window of time where credit card information could have potentially be expose which conclude on july     the investigation confirm there be a chance the unauthorized script present on our site may have expose some of your personal information at the point of sale  we be unable to confirm if any credit card transaction during this time period be affect  
 
what information be involve  
our investigation have determine that order process via paypal be not compromise  and that the incident be limit to payment or attempt payment via credit card between february rd and march th  the potentially expose data be limit to cardholder name  email address  bill address  credit card number  expiration date  and cvv  
 
what we be do 
a part of our security measure  we regularly screen activity on our website and continuously improve our security protocol  we will continue to enhance our security feature to defend against security threat  in addition  we be also increase the scrutiny of our third party vendor and continue to work with third party forensics expert to prevent future incident  
 
what you can do 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your account statement and monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error over the next  to  month  you can find out more about how to protect against potential identity theft and fraud in the enclose step you can take to protect personal information  
 
for more information

team scuf 
 
step you can take to protect personal information 
monitor your account 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax 
experian

community medical center  inc   cmc  be a non profit community health center serve san joaquin  solano  and yolo county in northern california  we be write to let you know of an incident that may have expose some of your personally identifiable and protect health information and provide you with resource you can use to help protect your information  
 
what happen and what information be involve  
 
on october     we shut down many of our system proactively after detect unusual activity on the network  upon detection  we immediately take all system offline and take step to investigate and determine the nature of the incident  base on the result of that assessment  there be evidence to suggest an unauthorized third party access cmcs network  a comprehensive investigation be also conduct to identify any instance of sensitive data compromise so that we could contact individual who may have be affect by this incident  this letter serve to notify you that it be possible the follow personal information could have be compromise by an unauthorized third party  first and last name  mail address  social security number  date of birth  demographic information  and medical information maintain by cmc  
 
what we be do  
 
upon detect this incident  we move quickly to initiate a response  which include conduct an investigation with the assistance of cybersecurity expert  confirm the security of our network environment  and notify law enforcement  cmc have also review and alter our policy and procedure relate to the security of our system and server  and review and alter how we manage data within our network  
 
we be offer free identity monitor service through kroll  a lead identity protection technology company  kroll service include   month of credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  with this protection  kroll will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise  
 
what you can do

employee benefit administration   management  eba m  be write on behalf of jwch institute  inc   jwch  to inform you of a recent data security event that involve some of your personal information  eba m have your information a we provide third party administrative service to your employer for it self fund health plan  although there be no indication your information be at significant risk  we take this event seriously and be provide you with information about the incident and what we know so far  
 
what happen  
 
on august     eba m learn that one of it employee inadvertently upload a data file to a publicly accessible website on june     upon realize this mistake  we immediately launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the incident  we determine that the file be publicly accessible from june     until august     upon review the file we determine your personal information be impact  
 
what information be involve  
 
although we do not have any indication of misuse of your personal information at this time  we be provide this notification to you out of an abundance of caution  the information involve include the follow  name  address  social security number  and date of birth  
 
what we be do  
 
the security of information in our care be among our highest priority  at this time  we do not have any knowledge of actual or attempt misuse of the expose information  however  we be notify you so that you may take further step to best protect yourself  we be review our policy and procedure relate to data management and security  and implement additional training and education to our employee to reduce the risk of similar future incident  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to review the enclose step you can take to protect personal step you may take and information on what you can do to better protect against the possibility of identity theft and fraud  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  we also encourage you to enroll in the complimentary credit monitor service we be offer you

under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also contact the three major credit bureau directly to request a free copy of your credit report at the number and website identify below  you also have the right to place a  security freeze  on your credit report at no cost or charge  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who may access the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or to lift a security freeze on your credit report

gorilla circuit be commit to protect the privacy and security of the information we maintain  we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have involve some of your personal information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and some step you may consider take in response  
 
what happen  
 
gorilla circuit conclude it investigation of an incident that involve unauthorizedaccess to certain of our computer system  through the investigation  we discover that an unauthorized party gain access to certain gorilla circuit computer system between august     and september     although we be unable to determine which file  if any  the unauthorized party access  out of an abundance of caution  gorilla circuit review the file host on those system to identify individual whose personal information may have be accessible to the unauthorized party  
 
what information be involve  
 
on october     gorilla circuit determine that one or more of the file contain your name and social security number  
 
what we be do  
 
to help prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  we have implement additional measure to enhance the security of our network  and we will continue to train our employee concern data security  
 
what you can do  
 
a a precaution  we be offer you a complimentary one year membership to identity monitor service through kroll  the identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  for more information on identity theft prevention and krolls identity monitor service  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  please visit the below website

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
triple bureau credit monitor 
 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data at any of the three national credit bureausfor instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert  
 
there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be or be about to be a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  
 
there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  
 
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the notification explain that an unauthorized party gain access to certain gorilla circuit computer system between august     and september     the breach be cause by outside hacker

content of data breach 
 
at agi publish  inc   d b a valley yellow page   agi   we value transparency and respect the privacy of your information  we be write to let you know about a data breach that may involve your personal information  
 
what happen 
 
on september     we discover that we be the victim of a sophisticate ransomware attack that impact our network and server  after discover the incident  we quickly take step to secure and safely restore our system and operation via viable backup  further  we immediately engage outside counsel and third party forensic expert to conduct a thorough investigation of the incident nature and scope  assist in remediation effort  and contact and file a report with the fbi  we conclude our investigation on october     and determine that the unauthorized individual gain access to and potentially obtain information from our system  
 
concurrent to our investigation  we begin a comprehensive review of the impact data and believe that your personal and or protect health information be potentially involve in the incident  however  a of now  we have no evidence indicate misuse of any information  but we want to notify you of this incident out of an abundance of caution  
 
what information be involve 
 
the type of information potentially involve be your first and last name  address  social security number  and date of birth  if you be on the health plan between  and   the impact information may also include your health plan number and monthly premium amount  if you be on the ameritas dental plan any time since   the impact information may also include your payment amount for dental claim  
 
what we be do 
 
a explain above  we take immediate step to secure our system  contact the fbi  and engage third party forensic expert to assist in the investigation  further  in response to this incident  we be implement additional cybersecurity safeguard  enhance our employee cybersecurity training  and work to improve our cybersecurity policy  procedure  and protocol to help minimize the likelihood of this type of incident from occur again  
 
what you can do 
 
the security and privacy of the information contain within our system be a top priority for u  therefore  while we have no evidence indicate your information be misuse  we strongly recommend you remain vigilant  monitor and review all of your financial and account statement  and report any unusual activity to the institution that issue the record and law enforcement  please see other important information  attach  for guidance on the organization be a victim of a ransomware attack by an unauthorized individual who gain access to their system and potentially obtain personal information

below  we provide more detail information for you and respond to question you may have regard this matter  
 
what happen  
 
goldwater bank believe that it be the subject of what appear to be an attempt ransomware attack on may     on that date  goldwater bank it vendor receive alert of unusual network activity and be able to quickly respond and stop the unauthorizedaccess in process and prevent further infiltration  goldwater bank report the event to the federal bureau of investigation and have work to investigate the event to determine what happen  what data be impact  and who be responsible  through our investigatory effort  we identify a location where some of the impact data be be store and work quickly to secure it removal  we have not receive any evidence to date that any of the access data have be otherwise misuse  
 
what information be involve  
 
the file that be access include customer name and contact information a well a account information  the impact information may include name  address  telephone number  social security number  account number  and tax identification number  at this time  we do not believe the password or log in credential for financial account be compromise  
 
what we be do 
 
keep your information confidential be one of our most important responsibility  we be notify you so that we may work together to protect your information  we have take the follow precaution  
 
  we conduct our own internal investigation to protect and minimize any financial impact to you  
  in addition to notify individual whose personal information may have be involve  we have thoroughly evaluate our exist cybersecurity infrastructure and process  
  while we have a number of safeguard in place to protect information from unauthorizedaccess  we be also always work to strengthen them so we can stay ahead of this type of threat activity  
  we be work with law enforcement to identify and pursue the responsible party  
  a an additional measure of protection  goldwater bank have arrange for a complimentary one year membership in an identity privacy protection service provide by identityforce  you will not be bill for this service  this product provide you with  among other thing  advance fraud monitor  dark web monitor  identity restoration service  and identity theft insurance  this service will expire at the conclusion of the complimentary period and will not automatically renew  any renewal of service elect by the consumer be pay for by the customer and do directly through identityforce  to learn more about the complimentary membership and enroll  go to  and enter the verification code provide below to complete enrollment  
 
verification code    vcode   
 
what you can do 
 
we recommend you take the follow additional precaution to protect your personal and account information  
 
  get your free credit report from annualcreditreport com  check for any account or charge you dont recognize  you can order a free report from each of the three credit report company once a year  
  please promptly review your credit report and account statement over the next  to  month and notify u of any unauthorized transaction or incident of suspect identity theft relate to your account with goldwater bank  
  if you ever suspect that you be the victim of identity theft or fraud  you can contact your local police  
  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you place a free fraud alert on your credit file  a fraud alert tell creditor to contact you before they open any new account or change your exist account  contact any one of the three major credit bureau  a soon a one credit bureau confirm your fraud alert  the others be notify to place fraud alert  the initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you can renew it after one year  
 
  equifax  equifax com personal credit report service or     
  experian  experian com help or     
  transunion  transunion com credit help or     
 
  ask each credit bureau to send you a free credit report after it place a fraud alert on your file  review your credit report for account and inquiry you dont recognize  these can be sign of identity theft  
  if your personal information have be misuse  visit the ftcs site at identitytheft gov to report the identity theft and get recovery step  even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the ftc recommend that you check your credit report periodically so you can spot problem and address them quickly  
  you may also want to consider place a free credit freeze  a credit freeze mean potential creditor cannot get your credit report  that make it less likely that an identity thief can open new account in your name  to place a freeze  contact each of the major credit bureau at the link or phone number above  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it  
  try to file your tax early before a scammer can  tax identity theft happen when someone use your social security number to get a tax refund or a job  respond right away to letter from the irs  
  if you wish to close your exist account and replace it with a new account number  please contact the bank to do so  
 
for more information 
 
if you have any question regard this incident or your account  please contact goldwater bank dedicate response professional toll free at

gmgs risk management   insurance service  gmgs  be dedicate to provide quality insurance coverage to our client  out of an abundance of caution  we be write to inform you of a data security incident that may have result in the exposure of some of your personal data  please know we take the security of your information very seriously  gmgs sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this incident may cause you  this letter contain information about the incident and step you can take to further protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
on december     gmgs discover that an employee email account have be access by an unknown individual  after learn of the incident  gmgs engage outside forensic expert to determine whether the incident result in the exposure of sensitive information  the forensic expert complete their investigation in february of   gmgs then engage a data review team to determine which individual it need to notify  at the end of june   the data mining project confirm that personally identifiable information  pii  and protect heath information  phi  may have be expose a a result of the unauthorized email compromise  gmgs then engage in an extensive review of it file to locate contact information for the impact population  
 
what information be involve  
 
personal data such a your name  social security number  driver license number  date of birth  medical information  and health insurance information may have be view by an unauthorized individual  at this time  gmgs have no reason to believe that any patient pii have be misuse a a result of this incident  
 
what we be do  
 
gmgs take the security of your personal information very seriously and have take step to prevent a similar event from occur in the future  include implement multifactor authentication  in order to help relieve concern and restore confidence follow this incident  we have arrange for certain impact individual to enroll in complimentary credit monitor  
 
what you can do  
 
in an effort to help relieve concern a a consequence of this incident  and out of an abundance of caution  gmgs be provide you with access to single bureau credit monitor  service at no charge  these service provide you with alert for twelve month from the date of enrollment when change occur to your experian credit file  this notification be send to you the same day that the change or update take place with the bureau  in addition  we be provide you with proactive fraud assistance to help with any question that you might have or in the event you become a victim of identity theft  these service will be provide by cyberscout  a company specialize in fraud assistance and remediation service  
 
to enroll in credit monitor  service at no charge  please log on to  and follow the instruction provide  when prompt please provide the follow unique code to receive service  kuyaedjiz  in order for you to receive the monitor service describe above  you must enroll within  day from the date of this letter  gmgs also refer you to the additional important information section of this letter  which provide you with further information to obtain your credit report  place fraud alert  and freeze your credit  
 
for more information  
 
the protection of your information be our top priority  and gmgs sincerely regret any inconvenience that this matter may cause you  if you have any question or require additional information  please call the follow toll free number       representative be available to assist you between the hour of   be to   pm eastern time  monday through friday  representative be available for  day from the date of this letter

you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any of the three credit report bureau list below  a an alternative to a fraud alert  you have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without your express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a credit freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  e g   state driver license or identification card   and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  if you be a victim of identity theft

the information potentially impact include your first and last name a well a your social security number  and may have also include your medical information  
 
in response to this incident  we change account password and enhance security protocol  we be work with third party specialist to harden our network  and be review our policy and procedure relate to data protection  our investigation into this incident remain ongoing  
 
to date  we have no evidence of actual or attempt misuse of your information a a result of this incident  however  in an abundance of caution  we be provide you access to   month of credit monitor and identity protection service through equifax at no cost to you  instruction about how to enroll in these service and additional resource available to you be include in the enclose step you can take to help protect your information

i be write to inform you of a data security incident recently discover by sea mar community health center  sea mar  that may have impact your personal protect health information  sea mar take the privacy and security of all patient information very seriously  this letter contain information about the recent incident  step that you can take to help protect your information  and resource that sea mar be make available to assist you  
 
what happen  
on june     sea mar be inform that certain data belong thereto have be copy from the sea mar digital environment  upon receipt of this information  sea mar immediately undertake effort to secure it environment and commence an internal investigation to determine what happen and to identify the specific information that may have be involve  in so do  sea mar engage lead  independent cybersecurity expert for assistance  a a result of it investigation  sea mar learn on august     that additional data may have be copy from the sea mar digital environment between december  and march   and that such data may have contain personal protect health information belong to sea mar patient  sea mar thereafter begin collect contact information need to provide notice to potentially affect individual  this process be complete on august     
 
sea mar have no evidence that any potentially affect information have be misuse  nonetheless  sea mar be send this letter to notify you about the incident and to provide information about step that you can take to help protect your personal protect health information  
 
what information be involve  
sea mar determine that your name  address  social security number  date of birth  client identification number  medical vision dental orthodontic diagnostic and treatment information  medical vision dental insurance information  claim information  and or image associate with dental treatment may have be impact in connection with this incident  
 
what we be do  
a soon a sea mar discover this incident  sea mar take the step describe above  sea mar also begin work with cybersecurity expert to identify area in which it can further improve the security of it network to reduce the likelihood of a similar event occur in the future  additionally  sea mar report this incident to the federal bureau of investigation and will provide any cooperation necessary to hold the perpetrator of this incident accountable  
 
to help relieve concern and to help safeguard your identity follow this incident  sea mar have secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor service at no cost to you for  month the data of sea mar community health center be copy  indicate that an external hack into their digital environment  
content of data breach notification letter  strategic benefit advisor  inc   sba  be a third party benefit consult firm that help company customize and improve their employee benefit program  this notice be to inform you of a recent incident that may affect the privacy of some of your information  sba take the protection of your information very seriously  although there be no evidence of actual or attempt misuse of your information relate to this incident  this letter provide detail regard the incident  our response  and access to resource so that you can protect your personal information  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  we be also offer  month of complimentary credit and fraud monitor with    in identity theft insurance  enrollment instruction can be find in the follow page  
 
what happen  
on september     sba learn it be the victim of a criminal cyberattack  we promptly take step to secure our system and commence an investigation into the nature and scope of the incident  we have work diligently to determine what may have happen and what information may have be affect  our investigation be able to confirm that a limit number of file be access or acquire by the criminal actor  and on october     sbas investigation confirm that the impact data include certain information relate to you  
 
what information be involve  
although we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  we be provide you this notification out of an abundance of caution because certain information relate to you be access or acquire during this event  the impact information relate to you include your name and social security number  and potentially your address and date of birth  
 
what we be do  
the privacy and security of information be among our highest priority  and sba have strict security measure in place to protect information in our care  upon discover this incident  we immediately take step to secure the environment and to conduct an investigation to determine the scope of any unauthorizedaccess to legally protect information  we also commence a review of exist security policy and be implement additional measure and enhance security tool to further protect information in our system  in addition  we be implement additional safeguard and be provide additional training to our employee on data privacy and security  finally  we have report this incident to law enforcement and will cooperate with any criminal investigation into this matter  
 
in addition to provide notice of this event to you  we be provide identity theft and credit monitor protection service for  month through experian at no cost to you  information and instruction on how to enroll in these complimentary service can be find in the step you can take to protect personal information attach to this letter  
 
what you can do  
while sba be not aware of any actual or attempt misuse of information a a result of this incident  we nonetheless encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your account statement and monitor your credit report for suspicious activity  you may review the information in the attach step you can take to protect personal information a well a enroll to receive the free identity protection service available to you  there be no charge to you for the cost of this service  however  you will need to enroll yourself in this service  
 
for more information  
we understand you may have question about this incident that be not address in this letter  we have set up a dedicate assistance line to answer your privacy question  if you have additional question or concern  please call u toll free at        a m  to  p m   eastern time  monday through friday and  a m  to  p m   eastern time  saturday and sunday  exclude u s  holiday

at agi publish  inc   d b a valley yellow page   agi  we value transparency and respect the privacy of your information  which be why we be write to let you know about a data breach that may involve your personal information  
 
what happen 
 
on september     we discover that we be the victim of a sophisticate ransomware attack that impact our network and server  after discover the incident  we quickly take step to secure and safely restore our system and operation via viable backup  further  we immediately engage outside counsel and third party forensic expert to conduct a thorough investigation of the incident nature and scope  assist in remediation effort  and contact and file a report with the fbi  we conclude our investigation on october     and determine that the unauthorized individual gain access to and potentially obtain information from our system  
 
concurrent to our investigation  we begin a comprehensive review of the impact data and believe that your personal and or protect health information be potentially involve in the incident  however  a of now  we have no evidence indicate misuse of any information  but we want to notify you of this incident out of an abundance of caution  
 
what information be involve 
 
the type of information potentially involve be your first and last name  address  social security number  and date of birth  
 
what we be do 
 
a explain above  we take immediate step to secure our system  contact the fbi  and engage third party forensic expert to assist in the investigation  further  in response to this incident  we be implement additional cybersecurity safeguard  enhance our employee cybersecurity training  and work to improve our cybersecurity policy  procedure  and protocol to help minimize the likelihood of this type of incident from occur again  
 
what you can do 
 
the security and privacy of the information contain within our system be a top priority for u  therefore  while we have no evidence indicate your information be misuse  we strongly recommend you remain vigilant  monitor and review all of your financial and account statement  and report any unusual activity to the institution that issue the record and law enforcement  please see other important information  attach  for guidance on how to best protect your identity  
 
to help protect your identity  we be offer a complimentary  month membership of experians identityworkssm  this product provide you the breach impact the network and server of the organization  lead to unauthorizedaccess to potentially sensitive personal and protect health information  make it a hack

monitor your account 
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a the description mention  suspicious activity  and  unauthorized actor  indicate that this breach be due to unauthorizedaccess

take advantage of your identity monitor service

single bureau credit monitor

fraud consultation 
 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration

dear full name  
 
we be write to notify you that our recent data security incident may have have an impact on some of your personal information and to advise you of service olympus corporation of the america  oca  be offer at no charge to you to help protect your continue privacy  
 
it be important to note that we have no evidence that your personal information have be use inappropriately  but we be send this letter to tell you what happen  what information be potentially involve  what we have do and what you can do to protect your continue privacy  
 
unfortunately  these type of incident be become common  they be frustrate and disruptive to organization like ours and our employee  despite our regular monitor  vigilance  and prevention measure  this incident occur  and we be work hard to ensure this do not happen again  
 
what happen  
on october     oca discover suspicious activity on it network system that we have since confirm to be a data security incident  our investigation reveal that an unauthorized third party gain access to oca system  and certain file that contain confidential company and employee information be corrupt and render unavailable in an attempt to disrupt our system  there be no evidence that any unauthorized personal information be disclose or publish in that way  
 
what information be involve  
the corrupt file likely include personal information  such a your name  address  social security number social insurance number  and detail of your participation in ocas retirement program  while there be no evidence that the data have be access by an unauthorized person or use in an unauthorized way  we do want to make you aware of the situation out of an abundance of caution give the nature of this information  
 
what we be do 
immediately upon learn of this incident  we launch an investigation and recovery effort with the assistance of cyber expert and law enforcement  determine whether information be compromise in any way be one of the top priority of this effort so that we could notify potentially affect individual  rest assure  we be also make increase effort to improve our information security to prevent incident like this from occur in the future  
 
to help protect your identity  we have arrange to offer a complimentary two year subscription to experian identityworkssm credit monitor and identity theft protection  to activate your membership and start monitor your credit and the use of your personal information

this vulnerability do not affect purchase make by our customer use paypal

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include your state attorney general and the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
you can visit the ftcs website at  for additional information  you may have the right to file and obtain a police report from your local law enforcement agency  to file a complaint with the ftc  go to identitytheft gov or call   id theft       complaint file with the ftc will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  which be a database make available to law enforcement agency  
 
obtain and monitor your credit report 
 
we recommend that you obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency by visit  call toll free     or by complete a credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can access the request form at

other important information 
 
security freeze 
 
in some u state  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file  a security freeze  also know a a credit freeze  make it harder for someone to open a new account in your name  it be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to apply for a new credit card  wireless phone  or any service that require a credit check  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement  or insurance statement  there be no charge to request a security freeze or to remove a security freeze   there be a charge of  to request or remove a security freeze

step you can take to protect personal information  
 
enroll in credit watch  
go to www equifax com activate  enter your unique activation code of    activation code   then click submit and follow these  step  
 
  register  complete the form with your contact information and click continue  if you already have a myequifax account  click the sign in here link under the let get start header  once you have successfully sign in  you will skip to the checkout page in step   
 
  create account  enter your email address  create a password  and accept the term of use  
 
  verify identity  to enroll in your product  we will ask you to complete our identity verification process  
 
  checkout  upon successful verification of your identity  you will see the checkout page  click sign me up to finish enroll  
 
key feature  
  credit monitor with email notification of key change to your equifax credit report 
  daily access to your equifax credit report 
  webscan notification when your personal information  such a social security number  credit debit card or bank account number be find on fraudulent internet trade site 
  automatic fraud alert  which encourage potential lender to take extra step to verify your identity before extend credit  plus block inquiry alert and equifax credit report lock 
  identity restoration to help restore your identity should you become a victim of identity theft  and a dedicate identity restoration specialist to work on your behalf 
  up to    of identity theft insurance coverage for certain out of pocket expense result from identity theft 
 
monitor your account  
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc   
  social security number 
  date of birth 
  address for the prior two to five year 
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill 
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc   
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax 
experian

we be write to inform you of a recent security incident that occur between february    and february     involve unauthorizedaccess to a next peak cpa  inc  employee email account  the privacy and security of your personal information be of the utmost importance to u  and we want to assure you that we be take significant measure to protect your information  
 
we immediately launch an investigation in consultation with outside cybersecurity professional to analyze the extent of any compromise of the email account and the security of the email and attachment contain within it  base on our comprehensive investigation and document review  which conclude on october     we discover that the compromise email account contain your personal information  
 
to date  we be not aware of any report of identity fraud or improper use of your information a a direct result of this incident  however  out of an abundance of caution  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of experian identityworkssm credit b to help safeguard you against identity fraud  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information and provide you with identity protection service focus on immediate identification and resolution of identity theft  identityworks credit b be completely free to you  and enroll in this program will not hurt your credit score  
 
for more information on identity theft prevention and identityworks credit b  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  please see the additional information provide in this letter  this letter also provide other precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your financial account statement and credit report for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis

what happen

you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any of the three credit report bureau list below  a an alternative to a fraud alert  you have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without your express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a credit freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  e g   state driver license or identification card   and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  if you be a victim of identity theft

dear name  
 
we regret to inform you that a security incident have occur that affect your godaddy manage wordpress host service  on november   we detect suspicious activity in our wordpress host environment and immediately launch an investigation with the assistance of a third party it forensics firm  we have also contact law enforcement  our investigation be ongoing  but we have determine that an unauthorized third party gain access to certain authentication information for administrative service on or about september     specifically  this include your customer number  email address associate with your account  wordpress admin login set at inception  and your sftp and database usernames and password  
 
this mean that the unauthorized party could have access your manage wordpress service and make change to it  include alter your website and the content store on it  the exposure of your email address may also present a heighten risk of phishing attack  we be take several step to protect you and your data  first  we have block the unauthorized third party from our system  second  we have rotate your wordpress admin login credential  sftp password  and your database password  your website be still up and run  but you wont be able to edit content until you reset your password  
 
here be the instruction on how to reset each password  
 
  wordpress admin login    
  sftp or data password    
  wordpress database password    
 
if you use the same password for other account  we recommend that you change your password to those account and adopt data security best practice  such a choose a strong unique password  regularly change it  and enable multi factor authentication where available  we also recommend that you remain vigilant for potentially fraudulent communication send to your email address purport to be from godaddy or other third party  
 
finally  because the private key of your exist manage wordpress ssl certificate be expose  the certificate will need to be revoke  we be in the process of install a free dv ssl certificate on your website for one year to minimize potential site downtime  if you would like to continue use your exist ssl certificate product  please follow the direction below to rekey a new certificate    
 
if you have any other question or need further assistance  please call     for resident live in california  colorado  delaware  illinois  new york  new jersey  oregon  vermont  washington  and wyoming  please visit  for additional resource that describe additional step you can take to help protect your information  include recommendation by the federal trade commission regard identity theft protection and detail on how to place a fraud alert or a security freeze on your credit file  
 
thank you  
 
demetrius come 
chief information security officer the explanation provide clear indication of a suspicious party gain unauthorizedaccess to login credential on godaddys wordpress host environment

what happen  
 
on december     we identify a data security incident that result in the encryption of certain system within our environment  we address the incident  make upgrade to certain aspect of our computer security  restore the impact system from recent backup  and resume normal operation  we believe at the time that the incident be fully contain and do not find any evidence that information have be exfiltrated from our environment  on may     we be make aware that certain information have be exfiltrated from our environment by an unauthorized person  we immediately launch an investigation  and a cybersecurity firm be engage to assist  
 
what information be involve  
 
we cannot confirm specifically what information  if any  be view by the unauthorized person  however  on august     the investigation confirm that the information present on our system at the time of the incident  i e   information that be access by the unauthorized person  include your full name and social security number  
 
what we be do  
 
information privacy and security be among our highest priority  we have strict security measure in place to protect information in our care  upon learn of the incident  and to help prevent something like this from happen in the future  we have take step to confirm and further strengthen the security of our system  include deploy sentinelone endpoint detection   response software on the computer in our environment  upgrade our filter capability to block traffic from malicious source  establish and review permission for secure file share portal  reset user password  and transfer sensitive data to cloud storage  we also continue to educate our employee on cybersecurity best practice  
 
we be notify individual whose information be involve  include you  so that you may take further step to protect your personal information should you feel it be appropriate to do so  
 
what can you do  
 
a a precautionary measure  we also secure the service of kroll to provide identity monitor service at no cost to you for one    year  your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  these service be completely free to you  and activate these service will not hurt your credit score

content of data breach notification letter  dear   first name    
 
we regret to inform you that some of your personal information store by keolis transit america  kta   a subsidiary of keolis north america  kna   may have be access without authorization  we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and be take swift action to prevent such incident from happen in the future  we take the protection of your information very seriously  
 
on or around may     two individual not affiliate with keolis find a thumb drive label with keolis in a laundromat  they view several file on the thumb drive  notice human resource information  and promptly contact keolis  the company collect the thumb drive  the file on the thumb drive include spreadsheet contain personal information under these circumstance  we be provide this notice out of an abundance of caution  
 
a soon a we become aware of this incident  we begin investigate the incident and the data on the thumb drive  we engage third party forensic expert to assist with this review  
 
we be notify you so that you can take action to reduce the risk of harm  should you feel it appropriate to do so  we have retain kroll to provide you with  month of identity and monitor service  free of charge  you can activate the service by follow the direction in the attach document  
 
you may also contact the three credit report agency to obtain a credit report  place a fraud alert  or implement a credit freeze  a credit freeze  which can be place without any charge  prohibit a credit report agency from release any information from a consumer credit report without write authorization  to learn more about these option  please use the follow resource  
 
equifax

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
your identity monitor service include credit monitor  fraud consultation  and identity theft restoration  visit  to activate and take advantage of your identity monitor service  you have until   bb text  activation deadline    to activate your identity monitor service  membership number    membership number s n   for more information about kroll and your identity monitor service  you can visit info krollmonitoring com  
 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
single bureau credit monitor 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit datafor instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  youll have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft  
 
fraud consultation 
you have unlimited access to consultation with a kroll fraud specialist  support include show you the most effective way to protect your identity  explain your right and protection under the law  assistance with fraud alert  and interpret how personal information be access and use  include investigate suspicious activity that could be tie to an identity theft event  
 
identity theft restoration 
if you become a victim of identity theft  an experience kroll license investigator will work on your behalf to resolve relate issue  you will have access to a dedicate investigator who understand your issue and can do most of the work for you  your investigator will be able to dig deep to uncover the scope of the identity theft  and then work to resolve it  
 
krolls activation website be only compatible with the current version or one version earlier of chrome  firefox  safari  and edge  
 
to receive credit service  you must be over the age of  and have establish credit in the u s   have a social security number in your name  and have a u s  residential address associate with your credit file  the personal information of individual work for keolis transit america be lose due to a thumb drive leave unattended and find by two individual not affiliate with keolis  the thumb drive contain sensitive information such a name  address  social security number  financial account information  and or limit medical information  which be all physical paper document file

content of data breach notification letter  ae v  
notice of data breach 
 
dear   name     
 
seneca family of agency  seneca  provide service to family in our community and write to notify you of an incident that may affect the privacy of your information  this letter include information about the incident  our response  and resource we be make available to you  
 
what happen  
on august     we experience a network disruption that impact our ability to access certain file on our network  we immediately report the incident to law enforcement and begin work with computer specialist to determine what occur  our investigation determine that information store on our network be access between august  and august     although we have no evidence of misuse of information a a result of this incident  our investigation be unable to definitively rule out access to certain information  therefore  in an abundance of caution  we be notify individual with information store on our network  
 
what information be involve  
the type of information store on our network may have include your name and the follow data element    data element    
 
what we be do  
upon discover this incident  we immediately begin an investigation and take step to further protect our network  we be also provide potentially impact individual with access to  month of credit monitor and identity protection service through equifax  
 
what you can do  
we encourage you to enroll in the credit monitor and identity protection service we be make available to you  information about how to enroll in these service along with additional resource available to you be include in the attach step you can take to protect your information  
 
for more information  
we understand you may have question about this incident  you may contact our dedicate assistance line at     between   a m  and   p m  pacific time  monday through friday   exclude major u s  holiday  or write to u at  golf link road  oakland  ca   
 
return mail process center 
p o  box  
portland  or

  address

  state   
  zip   
  country   
 
ae v  
we sincerely regret any concern this incident may cause you  the privacy and security of information be important to u  and we will continue to take step to protect information in our care  
 
sincerely  
scott osborn  lcsw 
chief operate officer 
seneca family of agency
