step you can take to protect your information 
 
enroll in credit monitor   identity protection 
enrollment instruction 
go to www equifax com activate and enter your unique activation code of   activation code   then click submit and follow these  step  
  register  complete the form with your contact information and click continue  if you already have a myequifax account  click the sign in here link under the let get start header  once you have successfully sign in  you will skip to the checkout page in step   
  create account  enter your email address  create a password  and accept the term of use  
  verify identity  to enroll in your product  we will ask you to complete our identity verification process  
  checkout  upon successful verification of your identity  you will see the checkout page  click sign me up to finish enroll  the confirmation page show your complete enrollment  click view my product to access the product feature  
 
key feature 
credit monitor with email notification of key change to your equifax credit report 
daily access to your equifax credit report 
webscan notification when your personal information  such a social security number  credit debit card or bank account number be find on fraudulent internet trade site 
automatic fraud alert  which encourage potential lender to take extra step to verify your identity before extend credit  plus block inquiry alert and equifax credit report lock 
identity restoration to help restore your identity should you become a victim of identity theft  and a dedicate identity restoration specialist to work on your behalf 
up to    of identity theft insurance coverage for certain out of pocket expense result from identity theft  condition apply  
 
monitor your account 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your credit report account statement and explanation of benefit form for suspicious activity and to detect error  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  transunion  experian  and equifax  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call      once you receive your credit report  review it for discrepancy and identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report bureau  
 
you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any of the three credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  you have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without your express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a credit freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  e g   state driver license or identification card   and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
ae v  
should you wish to place a fraud alert or credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
transunion

content of data breach notification letter   e  th street suite  santa ana  ca  toll free number      october      customer name  customer address  customer city state zip  dear customer  
 
notice of data breach 
 
we be write to notify you of a recent incident involve some of your personal information  this letter provide detail about the incident  measure take to date  and resource available to help protect your information  
 
what happen 
 
team alvarez insurance service  team alvarez  be recently the victim of a ransomware attack begin on august     on august     upon discovery of the incident  team alvarez initiate a review of the incident and engage legal counsel  a a result of the attack  several of team alvarez server be encrypt and some of your personal information contain on insurance enrollment form may have be access by an unauthorized individual  
 
information affect 
 
the information that be potentially access include your first and last name  address  phone number  medicare beneficiary id  social security number  bank rout number  credit card number  and date of birth  
 
what we be do 
 
a part of our ongoing commitment to the privacy of information in our care  team alvarez have contact law enforcement and engage outside privacy counsel  in addition  we be in the process of build new company server and review access control across the organization  team alvarez have also notify relevant insurance carrier about the incident  and you may receive notification letter from some carrier directly  a an add precaution  we arrange to have equifax provide credit monitor service for twelve    month at no cost to you  instruction for enrollment be enclose  your personal activation code be  insert  digit code 
 
what you can do  fraud prevention tip 
 
we do not have reason to believe your personal credit bureau to request fraud alert  credit freeze  also know a security freeze   and opt out from pre screen credit offer  we also suggest that you monitor your financial account and if you see any unauthorized activity  you should promptly contact your financial institution  if there be any unauthorized activity  we suggest that you submit a complaint with the federal trade commission by call     or online at www ftccomplaintassistant gov  even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  check your credit report periodically can help you spot a problem and address it quickly  
 
for more information 
 
if you have additional question  please call our assistance line at     between   a m  and   p m  pst  monday through friday  exclude major holiday  you may also contact u by email at monitoringteamalvarez net  we sincerely regret any inconvenience this incident may cause you  protect your information be very important to u  and we remain commit to safeguard the information in our care  
 
sincerely  
 
team alvarez the incident involve a ransomware attack which indicate that an external or malware be involve in hack into team alvarez insurance service server and access personal information

you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any of the three credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  you have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without your express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a credit freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  e g   state driver license or identification card   and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  if you be a victim of identity theft

what happen

you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report at no cost or charge  which will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit report without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a security freeze to take control over who may access the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or to lift a security freeze on your credit report  should you wish to place a security freeze  or to obtain a free copy of your credit report  please contact the major consumer report agency

what happen  
on july     we identify a disruption within our network and learn that an unknown third party have access our computer network  upon identify the issue  we promptly initiate an internal investigation and hire a lead computer forensics firm to examine our network and to confirm the security of our computer system  through the investigation  we confirm the unknown third party no longer have access to our network  however  we identify that they be able to access and acquire certain file on our network for the time period between july  and july   although we be not aware of any instance of fraud or identity theft result from the incident  we conduct an internal review to determine the content of the document accessible to the unknown third party  
 
what information be involve  
on september     we determine that the impact information include your name  address  social security number  and financial account number  
 
what we be do  
in addition to restore the affect system and conduct an investigation into how the incident occur  we have take step to reduce the risk of this type of incident occur in the future  include implement additional technical control  additionally  although we have no evidence of information be use for the purpose of fraud or identity theft  we be offer you a complimentary one year membership to experian identityworkssm credit b  this product help detect possible misuse of your personal information provide in this letter  
 
what you can do

other important information

what happen

what information be involve

what we be do

  nature of the incident 
 
on july     sg become aware of a ransomware incident that impact all of it system and create a substantial disruption of sg operation  with the assistance of a specialize cybersecurity firm  sg begin work to resume business activity and conduct a forensic investigation to attempt to determine the full nature and scope of this incident  while in the process of investigate  sg experience another ransomware incident on september     carry out by a different threat actor  in both instance  sg terminate the unauthorizedaccess and promptly commence an investigation to determine the scope of the incident  in order to resume business and to mitigate any further issue  sg wipe it system  the result of do so be that many digital artifact be lose and unavailable for analysis  a forensics investigation be conduct  
 
due to lack of artifact to analyze  the investigation be inconclusive a to whether the threat group access or exfiltrated any data store on sg system  sg work to determine what type of data be store on it system and who this data belong to  sg review the record for all of it program to determine anyone whose sensitive information could have be store on any of it system  it be determine that data be store for sg client  employee  vendor  donor  and volunteer  give the significant notice population  sg have work to obtain name and address in order to provide direct write notice for a many potentially impact individual a possible  the investigation conclude on november     out of an abundance of caution  sg notify all individual potentially impact by the incident  
 
the type of information potentially impact vary by the individual relationship with sg  for each subset of the population  they have receive individualize letter to explain what information may have be in scope  for sg client  the information potentially impact include name  address  phone number  email  date of birth  whether or not it client have health insurance  health insurance number  and for client who provide the information to sg  health history or condition  for sg employee  the information potentially impact include name  phone number  address  date of birth  social security number  driver license and or state issue identification card number  passport number  military identification number  medical information  health insurance information  health insurance policy number  digitize or electronic signature  financial aid information  and financial account number  for sg volunteer  the information potentially impact include name  address  phone number  email  date of birth  and driver license number  for sg donor  the information potentially impact include name  address  phone number  email  date of birth  and donation history  for sg vendor  the information potentially impact include name  phone number  address  social security number  or tax identification number  a of this write  sg have not receive any report of relate identity theft since follow the above reference event

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc

fraud alert

security freeze  
 
under u s  law  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  
 
you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state  contact information for the ftc be  federal trade commission   pennsylvania ave  nw  washington  dc   www consumer ftc gov and www ftc gov idtheft       resident of new york  maryland  north carolina  and rhode island can obtain more information from their attorney general use the contact information below

we at cirrus asset management  inc   cirrus  take the privacy and security of your personal information very seriously  we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident that involve some of your information  we want to provide you with information about the incident  let you know about the service we be provide to you  and assure you that we be take significant measure to protect your information  
 
what happen

what we be do

what information be involve 
the impact file contain some of your personal information  specifically your full name and social security number  
 
what you can do 
we have no evidence that any of your information have be or will be misuse  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident  to protect you from potential misuse of your information  we be offer a complimentary one year membership of equifax credit watch gold  for more information on identity theft prevention and equifax credit watch gold  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  please see the additional information provide in this letter  
 
this letter also provide other precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your financial account statement and credit report for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
for more information

credit and security freeze  
 
you may have the right to place a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  so that no new credit can be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a credit freeze can be place without any charge and be design to prevent potential credit grantors from access your credit report without your consent  if you place a credit freeze  potential creditor and other third party will not be able to get access to your credit report unless you temporarily lift the freeze  therefore  use a credit freeze may delay your ability to obtain credit  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a credit freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  since the instruction for how to establish a credit freeze differ from state to state  please contact the letter state that ghilotti bros  inc  discover unusual activity on it network which prompt an internal investigation and engage a third party forensic security firm to investigate the issue  the investigation determine that an unauthorized third party be able to temporarily accessthe system and file

lewis brisbois bisgaard   smith llp  lewis brisbois  represent tennis warehouse  llc  tennis warehouse  regard a data security incident reference below  the purpose of this letter be to notify you of the incident pursuant to iowa code c   
 
nature of the security incident  on october     tennis warehouse become aware of a potential data security incident  we immediately begin an internal investigation and engage an independent computer forensics firm to determine whether any personal information be affect in the incident  on november     the investigation determine that payment card information be obtain without authorization on october     on november     the affect person be identify after a thorough search of digital evidence  
 
type of information and number of iowa resident affect  a reference above  the incident involve payment card information  on december     tennis warehouse begin notify   potentially affect payment card holder who be resident of iowa via first class u s  mail or email  a sample copy of the notification letter be include with this correspondence  
 
measure take in response to incident  upon become aware of the incident  tennis warehouse take the measure reference above  we also report the incident to the payment card brand in an attempt to prevent fraudulent activity on the affect account  we also report the incident to law enforcement and have work closely with the digital forensics firm to enhance the security of our site to facilitate safe and secure transaction  
 
contact information  tennis warehouse remain dedicate to protect personal information  please contact sean hoar at    or via email at sean hoarlewisbrisbois com or laura funk at    or via email at laura funklewisbrisbois com

content of data breach 
 
index fund advisor incorporate  ifa  be write to inform you of a recent event that may affect the security of some of your information  while  to date  we have no indication that your information have be misuse  we be make you aware of the event so you may take step to better protect your information  should you feel it appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on or about august     ifas internal it department detect possible unauthorizedaccess to certain ifa system  the it department immediately begin an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the activity and enlist a third party forensic investigation firm to assist with the investigation  the investigation determine that an unauthorized actor potentially access certain file within ifas system on august     a subsequent review identify on november     that these file may contain personal information  
 
dear sample a  sample  
 
what information be involve  
 
our review determine the follow information relate to you may have be accessible within the file at issue  extra  we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of any information and be provide you this notification out of an abundance of caution  
 
what we be do  
 
the confidentiality  privacy  and security of information in our care be one of our highest priority  upon learn of the potential unauthorizedaccess  we immediately commence an investigation to confirm the nature and scope of the event and take step to secure our system  while we have security measure in place to protect information in our care  we be implement additional safeguard to further protect the security of information in our system  
 
a an add precaution  we be also provide you with  month of complimentary access to credit monitor and identity restoration service through experian  a well a guidance on how to better protect your information  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  although we be cover the cost of these service  due to privacy restriction  you will need to complete the activation process yourself use the enrollment instruction below  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your account statement and monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  you can find out more about how to better protect against the potential misuse of information in the enclose step you can take to protect personal information  there  you will also find more information about the credit monitor service we be offer and how to enroll  
 
for more information  
 
we understand you may have question about this incident that be not address in this letter  to ensure your question be answer in a timely manner  please call       monday through friday from  be to  pm central  or saturday and sunday from  be to  pm central  exclude major u s  holiday   you may also write to u directly at   von karman ave    irvine  ca   unite state  
 
sincerely  
 
mark hebner 
president

please note that identity restoration be available to you for  month from the date of this letter and do not require any action on your part at this time  the term and condition for this offer be locate at www experianidworks com restoration

what information be involve  the information potentially affect include your name  in combination with your credit card information enter on our website  
 
what we be do  upon learn of this incident  we immediately take step to confirm the security of our website  with the assistance of third party forensic specialist  we further perform a thorough review of our website to ensure any unauthorized code be remove  a well a to implement technical measure to prevent a similar incident from occur in the future  additionally  we be notify potentially impact individual and offer complimentary identity monitor service for  month

take advantage of your identity monitor service 
you have be provide with access to the follow service from kroll  
 
single bureau credit monitor 
you will receive alert when there be change to your credit data   for instance  when a new line of credit be apply for in your name  if you do not recognize the activity  you will have the option to call a kroll fraud specialist  who will be able to help you determine if it be an indicator of identity theft

identity theft restoration

you can sign up for the identity monitor service anytime between now and activation deadline  due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  activate this service will not affect your credit score  you must be over age  with a credit file to activate these service  
 
monitor your account 
under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  transunion  experian  and equifax  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call      once you receive your credit report  review it for discrepancy and identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report bureau  
 
you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any of the three credit report bureau list below

what happen  
 
on july     hfg detect unusual activity within it digital environment  upon discover this activity  we take immediate and active step to secure our environment and launch an internal investigation  hfg also engage cybersecurity expert to secure the environment and conduct an investigation to determine whether any personal information be involve in the incident  hfg then work diligently to identify the current address information require to effectuate notification and to notify you of this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
the potentially affect information may have include your name    variable text    
 
what we be do  
 
a soon a hfg discover this incident  hfg take the step reference above  hfg also implement additional safeguard to further increase the security of it network system to minimize the likelihood of a similar event occur in the future  in addition  hfg report this matter to the federal bureau of investigation and will provide whatever assistance be necessary to hold the perpetrator s  of this incident responsible  further  out of an abundance of caution  hfg be offer you complimentary identity protection service through idx  a data incident and recovery service expert  these service include  month of credit and identity monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage identity theft recovery service  with this protection  idx will help you resolve issue if your identity be compromise  please note the deadline to enroll be march     
 
what you can do  
 
although hfg be not aware of any misuse of information a a result of the incident  hfg encourage you to follow the recommendation on the follow page to help protect your personal information  be include with this letter  
 
to enroll  please call      or visit   enrollment code    code

sincerely  
 
felicia bower 
svp director of compliance and service  crcm  cmcp

step you can take to protect your personal information 
 
review your account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity  a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report closely  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  your state attorney general  and or the federal trade commission  ftc   
 
copy of credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month by visit  call toll free      or by complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can print this form at www annualcreditreport com cra requestformfinal pdf  you also can contact one of the follow three national credit report agency  
 
equifax

atlanta  ga

allen  tx  
    
www experian com 
 
transunion 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
    
www transunion com 
 
fraud alert  you may want to consider place a fraud alert on your credit report  an initial fraud alert be free and will stay on your credit file for at least one year  the alert inform creditor of possible fraudulent activity within your report and request that the creditor contact you prior to establish any account in your name  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact any of the three credit report agency identify above  additional information be available at   
 
security freeze  you have the right to put a security freeze on your credit file for up to one year at no cost  this will prevent new credit from be open in your name without the use of a pin number that be issue to you when you initiate the freeze  a security freeze be design to prevent potential creditor from access your credit report without your consent  a a result  use a security freeze may interfere with or delay your ability to obtain credit  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file with each credit report agency  in order to place a security freeze  you may be require to provide the consumer report agency with information that identify you include your full name  social security number  date of birth  current and previous address  a copy of your state issue identification card  and a recent utility bill  bank statement or insurance statement  
 
additional free resource  you can obtain information from the consumer report agency  the ftc  or from your respective state attorney general about fraud alert  security freeze  and step you can take toward prevent identity theft  you may report suspect identity theft to local law enforcement  include to the ftc or to the attorney general in your state

content of data breach notification letter  dear mytopo patron and friend  
 
we be write to inform you about a data security incident that may have involve your personal information  
 
what information be involve  
 
we believe the attacker may have access personal information maintain in your profile on mytopo com  this information include name  email address  bill or ship address  and mytopo login password  the attacker do not access any financial or credit card information since we do not store those detail on mytopo com server  the breach be isolate to mytopo com and do not impact any other site or relate service  include terrain navigator pro  
 
when do this happen  
 
the event be identify on november   and the service be take offline within an hour of discovery  current investigation indicate data may have be compromise a early a november   
 
what we be do  
 
our team have be work since the attack be detect to determine the extent of any compromise information and to identify and mitigate any connect security issue  our service will resume a soon a we have take all appropriate step to secure the mytopo com server  
 
what you can do  
 
we be notify you so you can take immediate action to protect your personal information  if you use a common password between mytopo com and other website  please change your password on those website immediately  once the mytopo system be restore and secure  you will be prompt to create a new password on the mytopo site  a a best practice  we recommend that you remain vigilant and promptly report to u and to the proper law enforcement authority any suspicious activity or suspect identity theft  
 
we sincerely apologize for this incident and regret any inconvenience it may cause you  we deeply value your relationship with mytopo  should you have further question  please contact supportmytopo com  
 
sincerely  
 
paige darden and the mytopo team the mytopo com website be attack and personal information maintain in mytopo com profile  include name  email address  bill or ship address  and mytopo login password

what happen

on december     we determine that file contain certain current and former employee information be present in the potentially impact network location  to date  the investigation have not reveal any evidence of actual or attempt misuse of your information a a result of this incident  
 
what information be involve

what we be do

what you can do  
 
a previously state  to date  we have no evidence of actual or attempt misuse of your information a a result of this incident  however  in an abundance of caution  we be provide you access to  month of credit monitor and identity protection service through cyberscout at no cost to you  instruction about how to enroll in these service and additional resource available to you be include in the enclose step you can take to help protect your information

monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your credit report account statement for suspicious activity and to detect error  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  transunion  experian  and equifax  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call      once you receive your credit report  review it for discrepancy and identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report bureau  
 
you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any of the three credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  you have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without your express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a credit freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  e g   state driver license or identification card   and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft  if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a fraud alert or credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below

content of data breach notification letter  dear   name    
 
we be write to inform you of an incident that involve some of your information  the city of sebastopol recognize the importance of protect the information we maintain  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take in response  and some additional step you may consider take in response  
 
what happen  
 
we recently complete an investigation that involve unauthorizedaccess to an employee email account  upon discovery of the incident  we immediately take step to secure the account and launch an investigation  a cybersecurity firm be engage to assist with the investigation and determine that an unauthorized party be able to access the employee email account between april     and may     the investigation be not able to determine which email or attachment  if any  be view by the unauthorized party  therefore  we conduct a comprehensive review of the content of the email account to determine the specific individual whose information be contain within the email and attachment  we analyze the result and determine that an email or attachment in the account include some of your information  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information that may have be access include your name  social security number  driver license number  financial account information  and or health information  
 
what we be do  
 
to help prevent something like this from happen in the future  we have implement additional measure to enhance our exist security protocol  a a precaution  we be offer you a complimentary one year membership in experians identityworkssm credit b  this product provide you with identity detection and resolution of identity theft  identityworks credit b be completely free to you  and enroll in this program will not hurt your credit score  for more information on identityworks credit b  include instruction on how to activate your complimentary one year membership  a well a some additional step you can take in response  please see the additional information provide with this letter  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report for any unauthorized activity  
 
for more information  
 
we regret this incident occur and apologize for any inconvenience  if you have any question  please call    monday through friday from  be to  pm eastern time

additional step you can take  
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity over the next  to  month  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
 
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
 
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the unauthorizedaccess to an employee email account by an external constitute a hack data breach

content of data breach notification letter  notice of cyber incident 
 
anderson mcpharlin   conners llp  amc  experience a cybersecurity incident on june     that may have result in the disclosure of certain individual personal information  this notice be intend to alert those individual of the incident and step they can take to protect themselves  
 
what happen  
 
on june     amc experience a network intrusion that result in the encryption of information store on it computer system  upon discovery of the incident  amc immediately terminate access to it environment and take step to secure it system before bring them back online  
 
amc also engage a specialize cybersecurity firm to conduct a forensics investigation of the incident to determine the nature and scope of the attack and the potential compromise of sensitive information store on amcs system  the investigation conclude on august     and determine that an unauthorized party have access to data store on amcs information system  
 
thereafter  amc conduct an internal investigation in an attempt to identify those individual whose personally identifiable information  pii  may have be compromise a a result of the incident  however  due to the number of affect file potentially contain pii and lack of complete contact information for all individual  amc be provide substitute notice of the incident pursuant to applicable law  
 
what information be impact  
 
while amc do not have any evidence of misuse of pii  amc be nonetheless notify individual of the incident out of an abundance of caution and for purpose of full transparency  base on the investigation  the unauthorized party may have have access to one or more of the follow data element  name  address  date of birth  social security number  driver license number  financial account information  and or limit health information  please note that not every data element be present for every individual  
 
what step have we take to protect your information  
 
follow the incident  amc have continue to strengthen it security posture by add the follow security control  strengthen password complexity requirement  update intrusion detection and intrusion prevention policy  and update security awareness and training for our employee  
 
additionally  we have also obtain complimentary credit monitor and identity theft protection for all potentially affect individual  we encourage you to take advantage of the complimentary credit monitor service and identity theft protection  
 
what step can you take to protect your information  
 
if you believe that amc may have have your pii in connection with any case handle by amc in which you be a party  please call     to obtain a code to register for complimentary credit monitor and identity theft protection service  please note that you may be require to provide the case information  
 
amc encourage individual to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud  to review account statement  and explanation of benefit form  and to monitor free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  
 
additional step you can take to protect yourself be outline below  
 
credit report  you may obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  to order your free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com  or call toll free at      you can also order your annual free credit report by mail a complete annual credit report request form  available at  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga     
 
fraud alert  you can place fraud alert with the three credit bureau by phone and online with equifax   transunion   or experian   a fraud alert tell creditor to follow certain procedure  include contact you  before they open any new account or change your exist account  for that reason  place a fraud alert can protect you  but also may delay you when you seek to obtain credit  a of september     initial fraud alert last for one year  victim of identity theft can also get an extend fraud alert for seven year  the phone number for all three credit bureau be at the bottom of this page  
 
monitor  you should always remain vigilant and monitor your account for suspicious or unusual activity  
 
security freeze  you also have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze be intend to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  to place a security freeze on your credit report  you need to make a request to each consumer report agency  you may make that request by certify mail  overnight mail  regular stamp mail  or by follow the instruction find at the website list below  
 
the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse or a minor under the age of   this information must be provide for him her a well      full name  with middle initial and any suffix     social security number     date of birth     current address and any previous address for the past five year  and    any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  a of september     it be free to place  lift  or remove a security freeze  you may also place a security freeze for child under the age of   you may obtain a free security freeze by contact any one or more of the follow national consumer report agency

dear   first name     last name    
 
hoya optical lab of america  inc  provide prescription lens to eyecare provider  include yours name of ecp where instruct  on behalf of your eyecare provider name of ecp where instruct we be contact you about a recent ransomware attack that be further describe below  this incident compromise the security of your name and prescription information  although we do not believe this information could be misuse to commit identity theft or fraud  we be notify you of this incident and provide you with guidance and service to help you protect yourself against these risk  
 
what happen 
 
on april     we discover that file on some of our server and workstation in the u s  have be encrypt in an apparent ransomware attack  our team work diligently to minimize the impact on our server and operation  and to restore functionality  we report the incident to law enforcement  we engage an outside law firm and forensics expert to investigate the scope and impact of the incident  include investigate whether any data be take by the attacker  and to identify any such data and the affect individual  our investigation into this incident include a programmatic and manual review of the data  
 
what information be involve 
 
our investigation recently conclude that the attacker acquire your name and your eyecare provider  in some case  the data may have also include your eyewear prescription information  in provide service to your employer  we do not collect other personal information such a your social security number  driver license number  financial account information  or address  and therefore none of this information be compromise in this incident  
 
what we be do 
 
although we do not believe that your name  identity of your eyecare provider and or your eyewear prescription information could be misuse for identity theft or fraud  hoya have notify your eyecare provider  and be notify you of this incident on behalf of your eyecare provider  we be also review and enhance our system security  governance practice and ongoing monitor to help prevent a recurrence of an incident like this in the future  
 
what you can do 
 
we recommend that you remain vigilant and review your account statement and credit report regularly  and report any concern transaction to your financial service provider  we also provide the enclose guidance  which you may use to protect yourself  even though we do not believe this incident expose you to a risk of identity theft or fraud  
 
for more information 
 
please call insert vendor toll free number or go to vendor website for assistance or for any additional question you may have  
 
sincerely  
 
eduardo martin 
president  north america at hoya vision care

there be a number of step you should consider to guard against identity theft

xanitos  inc   xanitos  be write to inform you of a recent event that may have impact the privacy of some of your information  although we have no knowledge of any actual misuse of your information  we be provide you with information about the event  our response to it  and resource available to you to help protect your information  should you feel it appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
xanitos recently discover suspicious activity relate to certain employee email account  we immediately take step to secure the email account and launch an investigation which include work with a third party forensic investigator to determine the nature and scope of the activity  xanitos investigation determine that there be unauthorizedaccess to the affect email account from may    to july     a a result  the unauthorized actor may have have access to certain email and attachment within the account  in an abundance of caution  a programmatic and manual review of the content of the email account be complete to determine whether sensitive information be present in the email at the time of the incident  this process be complete on december     through this process  we determine that certain personal information be accessible  although not necessarily actually access or view by unauthorized individual  within the account at the time of this incident  
 
what information be involve  
 
the information that may have be impact by this incident include your   data element    and name  at this time  we have no indication that any of your information be subject to actual or attempt misuse a a result of this incident  
 
what we be do  
 
xanitos take this incident and security of your information seriously  upon learn of this incident  we move quickly to investigate and respond with the assistance of third party cyber security specialist  this investigation and response include confirm the security of our system  review the content of relevant data for sensitive information  and notify impact individual associate with that sensitive information  a part of our ongoing commitment to the privacy of personal workforce training be be conduct to reduce the likelihood of a similar future event  we will also notify applicable regulatory authority  a require by law  a an add precaution  we be also offer   cm length   of complimentary access to credit monitor and identity theft restoration service through equifax  individual who wish to receive these service must enroll by follow the attach enrollment instruction  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review account statement and monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error over the next  to  month  you can review the enclose step you can take to help protect your information to learn helpful tip on step you can take to protect against possible misuse should you feel it appropriate to do so

barlow respiratory hospital  barlow  be commit to protect the security and privacy of our patient information  we be write to notify you about an incident that may have involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take in response  and additional step you can take to protect your information  
 
on november     we determine that your information may have be involve in an incident that disrupt the operation of our it system  the incident be first identify on august     and in response  we immediately take step to secure our system  launch an investigation with the assistance of a third party forensic investigator  and notify law enforcement  the investigation determine that an unauthorized party gain access to our system from august    to september     the investigation also determine that the unauthorized party remove some file from our system that contain information pertain to barlow patient  in order to determine what data be involve  we conduct a review of those file  the file may have include your name  contact information  date of birth  social security number  driver license number  government issue identification number  medical record number  treatment information  diagnosis information  date s  of service  provider name s   financial information and or health insurance information

the idx credit monitor and identity theft protection service include   month of triple bureau credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage identity theft recovery service

additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      
 
contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  
 
contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau

content of data breach involve personal medical information 
 
at broward health  protect the personal information have be misuse  we be write to make you aware of the security incident so that you may take any necessary precaution and to offer identity monitor service at no cost to you to further protect your information  
 
what happen  
 
on october     an intruder who gain unauthorizedaccess to the broward health network may have access some of your personal medical information have be confirm  the doj request that broward health briefly delay this notification to ensure that the notification do not compromise the ongoing law enforcement investigation  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information be exfiltrated  or remove  from broward health system  however  there be no evidence the information be actually misuse by the intruder  
 
what we be do 
 
broward health take the protection of your personal minimum security requirement for device that be not manage by broward health information technology that access our network  which will become effective in january   
 
to help protect your identity  we be offer a complimentary two year membership of experians identityworkssm  this product provide you with superior identity detection and resolution of identity theft  the attachment to this letter provide detail instruction on how you can activate your membership to begin monitor your personal information  
 
what you can do 
 
although we have no evidence that your information have be misuse  we want to make you aware of resource you may access to help safeguard your personal information have be use to commit fraud  we recommend that you consider step to protect yourself from medical identity theft  medical identity theft occur when someone use an individual name  and sometimes other identify information  without the individual knowledge to obtain medical service or product  or to fraudulently bill for medical service that have not be provide  we suggest that you regularly review the explanation of benefit statement that you receive from your health plan  if you see any service that you do not receive  contact the health plan at the number on the statement  
 
we also recommend that you monitor your financial account and if you see any unauthorized activity  promptly contact your financial institution  you may also obtain a free copy of your credit report online at www annualcreditreport com  by call toll free      or by mail an annual credit report request form  available at www annualcreditreport com  to  annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga     you may also obtain a free copy of your credit report by contact any one or more of the follow national consumer report agency  equifax     www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga  experian     www experian com p o  box  allen  tx  transunion     www transunion com p o  box  chester  pa  you may also choose to contact the three national credit report agency list above for information about place a fraud alert and or a security freeze on your credit report to further detect any possible misuse of your personal information about fraud alert and security freeze  and about how to monitor and protect your credit and finance  
 
for more information 
 
we understand that this incident may pose an inconvenience to you  and we sincerely regret that this situation have occur  broward health be commit to protect the privacy and security of your personal medical information  and we want to assure you that we have implement appropriate measure to safeguard that information  we value the trust you have place in u  and we thank you for trust broward health with your healthcare

what happen  
 
on september     we discover that an intruder have gain unauthorizedaccess to our computer system by exploit vulnerability in our network  the intruder then deploy ransomware to encrypt several of our system  we immediately launch a forensic investigation with the help of lead outside cybersecurity expert and take step to secure our system  we be confident that we have fully secure our network environment  
 
base on our review of the affect system  we have determine that some of your personal information may have be compromise and potentially expose to third party  although we be unaware of any actual or attempt misuse of your information  we be provide you with this notification out of an abundance of caution  
 
what information be involve  
 
the personal information may have be involve  include your name  address  date of birth  email address  telephone number  social security number  and for some employee  drug alcohol test result  
 
what be we do  
 
we move quickly to respond to this incident  we conduct a thorough forensic investigation with the assistance of lead outside cybersecurity expert  we immediately terminate the attacker access to our network and take step to ensure the security of our network and system  we have upgrade our security control company wide and implement additional measure and enhance security tool to further protect information in our system  additionally  we have install lead information security technology that provide around the clock monitor of our system and network to detect threat and automatically block suspicious activity in real time  
 
we be also provide you with complimentary credit monitor service with a one year membership in experians identityworkssm  this product provide you with identity detection and resolution of identity theft  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information  please follow the step below

recommend step to help protect your information 
 
  website and enrollment  go to  and follow the instruction for enrollment use your enrollment code provide at the top of the letter  please note the deadline to enroll be april

  telephone  contact idx at     to gain additional information about this event and speak with knowledgeable representative about the appropriate step to take to protect your credit identity  
 
  review your credit report  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor credit report  under federal law  you also be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report company  to obtain a free annual credit report  go to www annualcreditreport com or call      you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report by one of the three credit bureau every four month  
 
if you discover any suspicious item and have enroll in idx identity protection  notify them immediately by call or by log into the idx website and file a request for help  
 
if you file a request for help or report suspicious activity  you will be contact by a member of our id care team who will help you determine the cause of the suspicious item  in the unlikely event that you fall victim to identity theft a a consequence of this incident  you will be assign an id care specialist who will work on your behalf to identify  stop and reverse the damage quickly  
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity over the next  to  month  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
how do i lift a freeze  a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your the breach involve suspicious activity involve employee email account  and an unauthorized individual access the employee account between may    and august     an investigation by a cybersecurity firm be conduct to assist and it be determine on december     that some personal information be contain in the account

content of data breach 
 
january    
 
what happen  
 
on or about november     one of our employee receive an email that appear to be from a voicemail service  that email be from a criminal  however  and when the employee click on the link  he be redirect to a website that purport to store his voicemail  the employee enter their email and password  which the criminal use to access some information  generally relate to our internal financial process  we discover the intrusion on november     we immediately begin an investigation and containment measure  include password reset  during the course of our investigation  we determine that limit client information be in some email access by the criminal  while we have no evidence that the criminal have misuse this information  or even be seek the name of our client  we have decide to notify you so that you can take the step to protect yourself  if you so desire  
 
what information be involve  
 
the vast majority of record be limit to first name and last name  while in most case this be not sufficient information to trigger notification  give the sensitive nature of our work  we decide to notify you out of an abundance of caution  some record do include covid vaccination status  no payment card information  social security number  or treatment record be implicate  
 
what we be do  
 
when we discover the intrusion  we take immediate step to halt the criminal access  we have no evidence of continue access at this time  in addition  we have retain outside expert to help u understand the full scope of any criminal activity and to validate our containment measure  we have enhance our security to help prevent this type of incident in the future  although no security be perfect  we be currently develop plan to enhance our security further  
 
what you can do  
 
at this time  we have no evidence that any client information implicate by this incident have be use for fraudulent purpose  however  it be always a good idea to review statement that you receive from financial institution to ensure the accuracy of all charge  in addition  client may contact their treatment center to sign up for credit monitor service or additional information

atlanta  ga    
 
security freeze  
 
security freeze  also know a credit freeze  restrict access to your credit file  make it harder for identity thief to open new account in your name  you can freeze and unfreeze your credit file for free  you also can get a free freeze for your child who be under   and if you be someone guardian  conservator  or have a valid power of attorney  you can get a free freeze for that person  too  
 
how will these freeze work  contact all three of the nationwide credit report agency equifax  experian  and transunion  if you request a freeze online or by phone  the agency must place the freeze within one business day  if you request a lift of the freeze  the agency must lift it within one hour  if you make your request by mail  the agency must place or lift the freeze within three business day after it get your request  you also can lift the freeze temporarily without a fee  
 
dont confuse freeze with lock  they work in a similar way  but lock may have monthly fee  if you want a free freeze guarantee by federal law  then opt for a freeze  not a lock  the follow information must be include when request a security freeze  note that if you be request a credit report for your spouse  this information must be provide for him her a well   
 
   full name  with middle initial and any suffix  
   social security number  
   date of birth  
   current address and any previous address for the past five year  and 
   any applicable incident report or complaint with a law enforcement agency or the registry of motor vehicle  
 
the request must also include a copy of a government issue identification card and a copy of a recent utility bill or bank or insurance statement  it be essential that each copy be legible  display your name and current mail address  and the date of issue  
 
you may further educate yourself regard identity theft  fraud alert  credit freeze  and the step you can take to protect your personal to access some financial information  limit client information be also access  include first and last name  and covid vaccination status
