notice of data breach 
 
we be write to inform you of a recent data security incident involve an online life insurance quote platform of american family life insurance company  aflic   you may have be affect by an unauthorized attempt to obtain your personal data  
 
what happen 
 
we believe unauthorized party may have use an automate bot process to enter certain personal information  such a your name and address  from unknown source into the aflic online quote platform  by do so  they may have access your driver license number a part of the platform pre fill function  we be notify you because you may have be affect by this incident  if you do not request an online insurance quote use the aflic quote platform between december     and december     the unauthorized party may have request a quote in your name and may have obtain your driver license number  if  however  you do request an online quote from the american family life insurance quote platform between december     and december     you be not impact by this incident  
 
what information be involve 
 
to the extent you be affect by this incident  unauthorized party may have obtain your driver license number  we have reason to believe this data could be use to fraudulently apply for unemployment benefit in your name  please carefully review any write communication you receive from your state unemployment agency  especially if you have not apply for unemployment benefit  if you suspect that your data have be use to fraudulently apply for unemployment benefit  you should contact the relevant state unemployment agency immediately  
 
what we be do 
 
we identify the unauthorized activity and immediately take action to address it  we block the activity and work to notify potentially affect consumer  if you do not previously have a relationship with aflic  we will delete your information once our investigation be complete and we have meet our legal and regulatory obligation  we take our responsibility to safeguard personal information seriously and we have enhance our security control to help prevent this type of incident from reoccurring  
 
to further help protect you  we be offer you single bureau credit monitor  service free of charge  these service from sontiq  through identity force  a transunion company  an independent outside firm  will provide you with alert for  month from the date of enrollment whenever change occur to your transunion credit file  the alert be send to you the same day that the change or update take place with the credit bureau  to enroll in these service  please log on to  and follow the online instruction  representative be not able to process enrollment  they can only provide guidance  when prompt  please provide the follow unique code to receive service  important   you must register your account and activate your monitor service within  day from the date of this letter  otherwise  your ability to access the service will expire  
 
there be no delay in provide you this notification a a result of a law enforcement investigation  
 
what you can do 
 
it be recommend that you remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by review account statement and monitor your credit report for unauthorized activity  if you wish to monitor your own credit report for unauthorized activity  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report agency  transunion  equifax  and experian  to order your annual free credit report please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at       additional information on identity theft protection be also provide in the enclose page entitle  information about identity theft protection

what happen

base on the result of this investigation  we have determine that information  include your name  address  social security number  and limit medical history  be potentially access by an unknown party that be not authorize to handle or view such information  at this time  care community do not have any evidence to indicate that any of your personal information have be or will be misuse a a result of this incident  nevertheless  care community decide to notify you of this incident out of an abundance of caution  
 
what we be do

monitor your account 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you may need to provide some or all of the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below

additional step you can take

if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  
 
if your health insurance or medical information be involve  it be advisable to review the bill statement you receive from your health insurer or healthcare provider  if you see charge for service you do not receive  please contact the insurer or provider immediately  
 
if your username and password to an online account be involve  it be advisable to change your password to the account a well a any other account that use the same or a similar password  
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  to place a freeze on your credit report  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
a freeze remain in place until you ask the credit bureau to temporarily lift it or remove it altogether  if the request be make online or by phone  a credit bureau must lift a freeze within one hour  if the request be make by mail  then the bureau must lift the freeze no later than three business day after get your request  
 
if you opt for a temporary lift because you be apply for credit or a job  and you can find out which credit bureau the business will contact for your file  you can save some time by lift the freeze only at that particular credit bureau  otherwise  you need to make the request with all three credit bureau  the breach involve unauthorizedaccess to employee email account suggest that this be a hack incident  
insufficient information there be not enough information provide about the breach to determine it type

  register  complete the form with your contact information and click continue  if you already have a myequifax account  click the sign in here link under the let get start header  once you have successfully sign in  you will skip to the checkout page in step   
 
  create account  enter your email address  create a password  and accept the term of use  
 
  verify identity  to enroll in your product  we will ask you to complete our identity verification process  
 
  checkout  upon successful verification of your identity  you will see the checkout page  
click sign me up to finish enroll  the confirmation page show your complete enrollment  click view my product to access the product feature  
 
key feature 
 
  credit monitor with email notification of key change to your equifax credit report  
  daily access to your equifax credit report  
  webscan notification when your personal information  such a social security number  credit debit card or bank account number be find on fraudulent internet trade site  
  automatic fraud alert  which encourage potential lender to take extra step to verify your identity before extend credit  plus block inquiry alert and equifax credit report lock  
  identity restoration to help restore your identity should you become a victim of identity theft  and a dedicate identity restoration specialist to work on your behalf  
  up to    of identity theft insurance coverage for certain out of pocket expense result from identity theft  condition apply   
 
monitor your account 
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your credit report account statement and explanation of benefit form for suspicious activity and to detect error  under u s  law  you be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  transunion  experian  and equifax  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call      once you receive your credit report  review it for discrepancy and identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report bureau  
 
you have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any of the three credit report bureau list below  a an alternative to a fraud alert  you have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without your express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a credit freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   iii  etc

step to protect the security of your personal information 
 
by take the follow step  you can help reduce the risk that your personal information may be misuse  
 
  enroll in identityworkssm  you must personally activate identity monitor for it to be effective  the notice letter contain instruction and information on how to activate your identityworkssm membership  experians identityworkssm product will provide the follow  
 
  experian credit report at signup  see what information be associate with your credit file  daily credit report be available for online member only  
  credit monitor  actively monitor your credit file at experian for indicator of fraud  
  identity restoration  identity restoration specialist be immediately available to help you address credit and non credit relate fraud  
  experian identityworkssm extendcare  you will receive the same high level of identity restoration support even after your identityworkssm membership expire  
   million identity theft insurance  provide coverage for certain cost and unauthorized electronic fund transfer  please direct question about the identityworkssm product to experian  a credit card be not require for enrollment in identityworkssm  enrollment in identityworkssm will not affect your credit score  the term and condition for this offer be locate at www experianidworks com restoration  
 
  review your credit report  you can receive free credit report by place a fraud alert  under federal law  you also be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three national credit bureau  to obtain a free annual credit report  go to www annualcreditreport com or call      you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report from one of the three credit bureau every four month  error in this information may be sign of possible identity theft  you should notify the consumer report agency of any inaccuracy in your report  whether due to error or fraud  a soon a possible so the information can be investigate and  if find to be in error  correct  
 
  review your account statement  you should carefully review for suspicious activity the statement that you receive from credit card company  bank  utility  and other service  
 
  remain vigilant and respond to suspicious activity  if you receive an e mail or mail alert from experian  contact an identityworkssm identity resolution agent toll free at     or visit www experianidworks com restoration for additional information  if you notice suspicious activity on an account statement  for example a purchase you do not make or an account you do not open  report it to your payment card company or merchant  you can use the number on the card to report fraudulent activity to the payment card company  you should also consider report such activity to nuna  your local police department  your state attorney general  and the federal trade commission  
 
  you have the right to place a security freeze on your credit report  a security freeze will prohibit a consumer report agency from release information in your credit file without your express authorization  the security freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  please understand that place a security freeze on your credit file may delay  interfere with  or prevent the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make for a new loan  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  a security freeze do not apply to a personal or an infect malware  the compromise of payment card information further suggest that this be a hack incident

what happen

what information be involve  
our investigation determine that the follow type of your information be present on calithos system at the time of the incident describe above  name and social security number  driver license or state issue identification number  passport number  military identification number  financial account number and health insurance information  
 
what we be do  
we have strict security measure in place to protect information in our care  upon learn of this incident  we quickly take step to confirm the security of our system and investigate the incident  we work quickly to secure our system and implement additional network and endpoint monitor  we notify the fbi of this incident and be notify regulator  a necessary  
 
although we be unaware of any misuse of your information a a result of this incident  a an additional precaution  calitho be offer you access to  month of complimentary credit monitor service through idx  detail of this offer and instruction on how to activate these service be enclose with this letter

consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  
 
pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth

pulsetv be write to inform you of a recent data security incident that involve some of the information we use to process order  include information potentially relate to you  we take this matter very seriously and be provide this notice to you a a precautionary measure to explain step that you can take to protect your information  
 
on march     visa inform u that our website  www pulsetv com  be a common point of purchase for some unauthorized credit card transaction and that the website may have a possible compromise  we conduct malware scan  check our security setting  and cooperate with visa request for information  we do not find any ongoing compromise involve customer credit card  nor be we aware of any customer complaint regard credit card use on our website prior to hear from visa  
 
the next time we hear from visa be in july   we provide additional information at that time and do not have any follow up from visa or any other card brand  a few month later  law enforcement contact u regard additional payment card compromise that appear to have originate from our website  we then start work with legal counsel with expertise in cybersecurity  legal counsel also hire nationally recognize cybersecurity expert to assist with the investigation  
 
on november     our investigator learn that the website have be identify a a common point of purchase for a number of unauthorized credit card transaction for mastercard  base upon communication with the card brand  it be believe that only customer who purchase product on the website with a credit card between november     and august     may have be affect  the investigation be unable to verify that the website be the cause of the unauthorized transaction  however  in an abundance of caution  pulsetv be notify customer  include you  who purchase product on our website during that time period so that they can take step to protect and secure their credit card information  
 
the affect information may have include your name  address  email address  payment card number  expiration date  and card security code  cvv  provide during checkout  
 
we be continuously work to identify and mitigate threat and evaluate our it security protocol to make sure that sensitive data be protect  in addition  to further improve our website security and help prevent similar occurrence in the future  we have take  or will be take  the follow step  
 
  add two factor authentication requirement for all internal device  
  utilize end point detection and response tool to provide greater network visibility and threat mitigation  and 
  migrate to a different payment system  
 
we be also work with the payment card network to keep them inform and cooperate with the ongoing investigation of the incident by law enforcement  finally  we be provide notice of this incident to appropriate state regulator  consistent with our compliance obligation and responsibility  
 
we recommend that you remain vigilant for incident of fraud and identity theft by regularly review your account statement and monitor free credit report for any unauthorized activity  if you believe your payment card information may have be compromise  we strongly encourage you to contact your payment card company and or financial institution and request that the card be cancel

midland university  midland  be write to inform you of an event that may impact the security of some of your information  while we have receive no indication of actual misuse of your information a a result of this event  this notice provide information about the event  our response  and resource available to you to help protect your information from possible misuse  should you feel it appropriate to do so  
 
what happen  
 
on january     midland identify that it network have be impact by a malware attack that encrypt certain file  we immediately launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the event  we quickly work to  
 
   secure our system  
   restore access to the information so we could continue to operate without disruption  and 
   investigate what happen and whether the event result in any unauthorizedaccess to  or theft of  information by the unknown actor  
 
through our investigation  we determine that the unknown actor gain access to certain file on january     and download a subset of those file  we then work with third party specialist to perform a comprehensive review of the affect file to determine what information be impact and to whom the information relate  upon completion of the review  we then conduct a time intensive manual review of our record to determine the identity and contact information for potentially affect individual  on or around december     we confirm address information for affect individual to provide notification  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation determine that the impact information may have include your name and   breach element    
 
what we be do  
 
the confidentiality  privacy  and security of information in our care be among our highest priority  and we take this incident very seriously  we review our security policy and procedure to reduce the risk of similar future event  although we do not have any indication of identity theft or fraud a a result of this event  we be offer complimentary credit monitor and identity restoration service through equifax for   cm length   month a an add precaution  we also report this event to federal law enforcement and notify appropriate state regulator  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud and to review your account statement and free credit report for suspicious activity and to detect error  additional information and resource be include in the enclose step you can take to protect personal information  you may also enroll in the complementary credit monitor service available to you  enrollment instruction be enclose with this letter  
 
for more information  
 
if you have additional question  please call our dedicate assistance line at     monday through friday  exclude u s  holiday   during the hour of   a m  to   p m   central time  you may also write to midland at  north clarkson  fremont  ne   
 
step you can take to protect personal information  
 
enroll in credit monitor  
 
go to www equifax com activate  enter your unique activation code of   activ ation code    with an enrollment deadline of   enrollment deadline    then click submit and follow these  step  
 
  register  complete the form with your contact information and click continue  if you already have a myequifax account  click the sign in here link under the let get start header  once you have successfully sign in  you will skip to the checkout page in step   
 
  create account  enter your email address  create a password  and accept the term of use  
 
  verify identity  to enroll in your product  we will ask you to complete our identity verification process  
 
  checkout  upon successful verification of your identity  you will see the checkout page  click sign me up to finish enroll  youre do  the confirmation page show your complete enrollment  click view my product to access the product feature  
 
monitor your account  
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free       you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a one year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft  
 
should you wish to place a credit freeze  please contact the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
equifax experian transunion

base on our investigation to date  some of your personal information that may have be access  
 
what we be do 
 
a discuss above  upon learn of the attack  we immediately sever all network connection activity and contain the incident  we also enhance our cybersecurity by add additional monitor and detection tool a safeguard against ransomware and other cyber threat

fraud alert  there be two type of fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraudan initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for at least one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft and you have the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  you can place a fraud alert on your credit report by contact any of the three national credit report agency

we be write to inform you of a security event that may have impact your information  although there be no evidence of any attempt or actual misuse of your information  we be provide you with information about this event  our response  and the step you may take to further protect your information against identity theft and fraud  should you feel it necessary to do so  
 
on june     luttrell staff become aware that certain file on it computer system be encrypt with malware by an unknown actor  luttrell staff promptly take step to secure the impact system and it network and launch an investigation to determine the nature and scope of the event  the investigation determine that an unauthorized actor gain access to certain luttrell staff system between june     and june     a a result  the unauthorized actor may have have access to certain file within these system and certain current and former employee and associate information may have be access or acquire by the unauthorized actor  
 
although the investigation be able to determine that certain luttrell staff system be access  it be unable to confirm what specific information be actually access  therefore  luttrell staff begin a comprehensive review of the impact file out of an abundance of caution to determine what information be present at the time of the incident  we be notify you now because on december     this review determine that certain information relate to you may have be impact  this information include your name  date of birth  social security number  government issue identification number  financial account information  credit or debit card information  biometric information  and medical and health insurance information  
 
the privacy and security of your information be among our highest priority and we take this incident very seriously  luttrell staff be review it security policy and procedure  a well a work with cybersecurity specialist  to reduce the risk of this happen in the future and implement additional measure and security tool to further protect information in our system  luttrell staff be also work to provide additional training to employee regard data privacy and security  while we do not have any indication that fraud or identity theft have occur a a result of this incident  we be offer twelve    month of complementary identity monitor through kroll a an add precaution  we also report this incident to federal law enforcement and be notify state regulator  a require  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant against incident of identity theft and fraud by review your account statement and monitor your free credit report for suspicious activity  additional information and resource be include in the enclose step you can take to help protect your information  you may also activate the complementary identity monitor available to you at no cost  activation instruction be enclose in this letter  
 
if you have additional question  please call our dedicate assistance line at     monday through friday from   a m  to   p m  central time  exclude major u s  holiday  you may also write to luttrell staff at  tidewater court  kingsport  tn   
 
we sincerely regret any inconvenience the computer system of luttrell staff group be access by an unauthorized actor between june     and june     due to encryption with malware by an unknown actor  current and former employee and associate information may have be access or acquire by the unauthorized actor  include sensitive information such a name  date of birth  social security number  financial account information  credit or debit card information  biometric information  and medical and health insurance information

notice of data breach 
 
dear   name    
 
we be write to inform you of an incident that potentially involve some of your information  this notice explain the incident  measure we have take  and provide additional step you may consider take in response  
 
what happen  
 
on october     we observe some suspicious activity involve an employee email account  we immediately take step to secure our email environment  begin an investigation  and a cybersecurity firm be engage to assist  our investigation determine that an unauthorized individual access the employee account between october     and october     the investigation be unable to determine whether any email or attachment be view by the unauthorized party  therefore  in an abundance of caution  we conduct a review of the content of the email account to identify any individual whose personal information may have be contain within the email and attachment  after a thorough review  it be determine on december     that some of your information be contain in the account  
 
what information be involve  
 
an email or attachment in the account include your name and one or more of the follow  social security number  driver license number  passport number  a financial account number  and or medical information  
 
what we be do  
 
we have take step to help prevent a similar incident in the future  include the implementation of additional security safeguard and control in our network infrastructure  in an abundance of caution  romeo power  inc  be offer you a complimentary one year membership in identity theft protection service through idx  idx identity protection service include   month of credit and cyberscan monitor  a    insurance reimbursement policy  and fully manage identity theft recovery service  
 
what you can do  
 
we encourage you to remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report for any unauthorized activity  for more information and instruction on enroll in free identity protection service  include some additional step you can take to help protect your information  please see the additional material provide with this letter

kyle ellis

romeo power  inc  
 
recommend step to help protect your information 
 
  website and enrollment  go to  and follow the instruction for enrollment use your enrollment code provide at the top of the letter  please note the deadline to enroll be may     
 
  activate the credit monitor provide a part of your idx identity protection membership  the monitor include in the membership must be activate to be effective  note  you must have establish credit and access to a computer and the internet to use this service  if you need assistance  idx will be able to assist you  
 
  telephone  contact idx at     to gain additional information about this event and speak with knowledgeable representative about the appropriate step to take to protect your credit identity  
 
  review your credit report  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review account statement and monitor credit report  under federal law  you also be entitle every  month to one free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report company  to obtain a free annual credit report  go to www annualcreditreport com or call      you may wish to stagger your request so that you receive a free report by one of the three credit bureau every four month  
 
if you discover any suspicious item and have enroll in idx identity protection  notify them immediately by call or by log into the idx website and file a request for help  
 
if you file a request for help or report suspicious activity  you will be contact by a member of our id care team who will help you determine the cause of the suspicious item  in the unlikely event that you fall victim to identity theft a a consequence of this incident  you will be assign an id care specialist who will work on your behalf to identify  stop and reverse the damage quickly  
 
additional step you can take 
 
we remind you it be always advisable to be vigilant for incident of fraud or identity theft by review your account statement and free credit report for any unauthorized activity over the next  to  month  you may obtain a copy of your credit report  free of charge  once every  month from each of the three nationwide credit report company  to order your annual free credit report  please visit www annualcreditreport com or call toll free at      contact information for the three nationwide credit report company be a follow  
 
equifax  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com      
experian  po box   allen  tx   www experian com      
transunion  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com      
 
if you believe you be the victim of identity theft or have reason to believe your personal information have be misuse  you should immediately contact the federal trade commission and or the attorney general office in your state  you can obtain information from these source about step an individual can take to avoid identity theft a well a information about fraud alert and security freeze  you should also contact your local law enforcement authority and file a police report  obtain a copy of the police report in case you be ask to provide copy to creditor to correct your record  contact information for the federal trade commission be a follow  
 
federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue nw  washington  dc     idtheft      www ftc gov idtheft 
 
fraud alert and credit or security freeze  
 
fraud alert  there be two type of general fraud alert you can place on your credit report to put your creditor on notice that you may be a victim of fraud   an initial alert and an extend alert  you may ask that an initial fraud alert be place on your credit report if you suspect you have be  or be about to be  a victim of identity theft  an initial fraud alert stay on your credit report for one year  you may have an extend alert place on your credit report if you have already be a victim of identity theft with the appropriate documentary proof  an extend fraud alert stay on your credit report for seven year  
 
to place a fraud alert on your credit report  contact one of the nationwide credit bureau  a fraud alert be free  the credit bureau you contact must tell the other two  and all three will place an alert on their version of your report  
 
for those in the military who want to protect their credit while deploy  an active duty military fraud alert last for one year and can be renew for the length of your deployment  the credit bureau will also take you off their market list for pre screen credit card offer for two year  unless you ask them not to  
 
credit or security freeze  you have the right to put a credit freeze  also know a a security freeze  on your credit file  free of charge  which make it more difficult for identity thief to open new account in your name  thats because most creditor need to see your credit report before they approve a new account  if they cant see your report  they may not extend the credit  
 
how do i place a freeze on my credit report  there be no fee to place or lift a security freeze  unlike a fraud alert  you must separately place a security freeze on your credit file at each credit report company  for information and instruction to place a security freeze  contact each of the credit report agency at the address below  
 
experian security freeze  po box   allen  tx   www experian com 
transunion security freeze  po box   chester  pa   www transunion com 
equifax security freeze  po box   atlanta  ga   www equifax com 
 
youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal information  
 
after receive your freeze request  each credit bureau will provide you with a unique pin  personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it the suspicious activity involve the unauthorized individual gain access to an employee email account  indicate that the breach be due to hack  
insufficient information insufficient information available to determine type of breach  
content of data breach notification letter  notification from pellissippi state community college 
 
february    
 
dear first name last name  
 
pellissippi state community college  pscc  be inform individual of a recent data security incident that may have result in the unauthorizedaccess to  or acquisition of  some personal study  tncis  program  
 
what happen  
 
pscc be the victim of a ransomware cyberattack overnight on december      we have confirm unauthorizedaccess to one system  but it be possible that others may have be access  while pscc be also a victim  we apologize for any stress and concern this have cause  
 
what information be involve  
 
our investigation confirm that the attacker have access to our active directory database  which include first and last name  pscc username  pscc email address  office location and phone number  job title and department  if an employee   p number  a unique number assign to each student and employee use only at pscc and not use to sign document   general user id number  a long random string of number use only by pscc in it banner system   and pscc account password  hash   this be the only database to which access be confirm  it be possible  however  that other personal data in our system could have be access  
 
what we be do 
 
since the incident  we have notify local law enforcement  include the tennessee bureau of investigation  and appropriate state and federal authority  scan every computer  and enhance security measure  
 
what you can do 
 
while we do not know if your data be view  we generally recommend you remain vigilant  monitor and review your financial and account statement  and report any unusual activity  more specifically  we recommend you  
 
  reset password for any account that use the same password a be in our system  and use different password for different account   
  notify your financial institution if you detect suspicious activity on your account  
  report incident of fraudulent activity or suspect identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  the federal trade commission  and or your state attorney general  
  monitor your free credit report  
  consider place a freeze on your credit file and or a fraud alert on your credit report  
  file a police report if you experience identity fraud  
  take advantage of the federal trade commission information at  identitytheft gov and identity theft  ftc consumer information  and 
  review the attach state specific and other important information  
 
a a safeguard  we have arrange for you to enroll  at no cost to you  in an online credit monitor service  mytrueidentity  for  month provide by transunion interactive  a subsidiary of transunion  one of the three nationwide credit report company  
 
to enroll in this service  go directly to the mytrueidentity website at www mytrueidentity com and in the space reference a enter activation code  enter the follow  letter activation code xxxxxxxxx and follow the three step to receive your credit monitor service online within minute  if you do not have access to the internet and wish to enroll in a similar offline  paper base  credit monitor service  via u s  mail delivery  please call the transunion fraud response service toll free hotline at      when prompt  enter the follow  digit telephone passcode        and follow the step to enroll in the offline credit monitor service  add an initial fraud alert to your credit file  or to speak to a transunion representative if you believe you may be a victim of identity theft  you can sign up for the online or offline credit monitor service anytime between now and may     due to privacy law  we cannot register you directly  please note that credit monitor service might not be available for individual who do not have a credit file with transunion  or an address in the unite state  or it territory  and a valid social security number  or be under the age of   enroll in this service will not affect your credit score  
 
once you be enroll  you will be able to obtain one year of unlimited access to your transunion credit report and credit score  the daily credit monitor service will notify you if there be any critical change to your credit file at transunion  include fraud alert  new inquiry  new account  new public record  late payment  change of address  and more  the subscription also include access to identity restoration service that provide assistance in the event your identity be compromise to help you restore your identity and up to    in identity theft insurance with no deductible   policy limitation and exclusion may apply   
 
if you have question about your online credit monitor benefit  need help with your enrollment  or need help access your credit report  or pass identity verification  please contact the mytrueidentity customer service team toll free at       monday friday  be pm  saturday sunday  be pm eastern time  
 
if you be receive this notice for a current or former student who be under the age of   the credit monitor code list above be only for adult  if you be receive this notice for a minor  the parent or guardian can contact the call center list below to receive a the breach result from a ransomware cyberattack on pellissippi state community college system

what you can do  
 
under u s  law  a consumer be entitle to one free credit report annually from each of the three major credit report bureau  equifax  experian  and transunion  to order your free credit report  visit www annualcreditreport com or call  toll free        you may also directly contact the three major credit report bureau list below to request a free copy of your credit report  
 
consumer have the right to place an initial or extend fraud alert on a credit file at no cost  an initial fraud alert be a  year alert that be place on a consumer credit file  upon see a fraud alert display on a consumer credit file  a business be require to take step to verify the consumer identity before extend new credit  if you be a victim of identity theft  you be entitle to an extend fraud alert  which be a fraud alert last seven year  should you wish to place a fraud alert  please contact any one of the three major credit report bureau list below  
 
a an alternative to a fraud alert  consumer have the right to place a credit freeze on a credit report  which will prohibit a credit bureau from release information in the credit report without the consumer express authorization  the credit freeze be design to prevent credit  loan  and service from be approve in your name without your consent  however  you should be aware that use a credit freeze to take control over who get access to the personal and financial information in your credit report may delay  interfere with  or prohibit the timely approval of any subsequent request or application you make regard a new loan  credit  mortgage  or any other account involve the extension of credit  pursuant to federal law  you cannot be charge to place or lift a credit freeze on your credit report  to request a security freeze  you will need to provide the follow information  
 
  full name  include middle initial a well a jr   sr   ii  iii  etc    
  social security number  
  date of birth  
  address for the prior two to five year  
  proof of current address  such a a current utility bill or telephone bill  
  a legible photocopy of a government issue identification card  state driver license or id card  military identification  etc    and 
  a copy of either the police report  investigative report  or complaint to a law enforcement agency concern identity theft if you be a victim of identity theft

content of data breach notification letter  dear recipient  
 
the privacy and security of the personal information  
 
what happen  
on november     the city of hesperia detect a sophisticate cybersecurity incident that impact it network  
 
what we be do  
upon learn of this issue  we immediately conduct an internal investigation to assess the nature and scope of the potential compromise  we also notify law enforcement  our investigation conclude on january     and confirm that data access and acquire by the unauthorized party may have contain some of your personal information  
 
what information be involve  
specifically  the data contain some of your personal information  which may have include your full name along with your information not provide  give the potential unauthorizedaccess and acquisition of this information  and the value we place on our relationship with you  we want to notify you about this incident  
 
what you can do  
we have no evidence that any of the information have be misuse  nevertheless  out of an abundance of caution  we want to make you aware of the incident  this letter provide precautionary measure you can take to protect your personally  you should always remain vigilant in review your financial account statement and credit report for fraudulent or irregular activity on a regular basis  
 
for more information  
please accept our apology that this incident occur  we remain fully commit to maintain the privacy of personal information  
 
if you have any further question regard this incident  please call our toll free response line at number  this response line be available time zone  
 
sincerely  
city of hesperia 
 
other important information 
 
  place a fraud alert on your credit file  
we recommend that you place an initial  year fraud alert on your credit file  at no charge  a fraud alert tell creditor to contact you personally before they open any new account  to place a fraud alert  call any one of the three major credit bureau at the number list below  a soon a one credit bureau confirm your fraud alert  they will notify the others  
 
equifax 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga

p o  box  
allen  tx  
  
     
 
transunion llc 
p o  box  
fullerton  pa   
  
     
 
  place a security freeze on your credit file  
if you be very concern about become a victim of fraud or identity theft  you may request a security freeze be place on your credit file  at no charge  a security freeze prohibit  with certain specific exception  the consumer report agency from release your credit report or any information from it without your express authorization  you may place a security freeze on your credit report by send a request in write or by mail  to all three nationwide credit report company  to find out more about how to place a security freeze  you can use the follow contact information  
 
equifax security freeze 
p o  box  
atlanta  ga  
  
     
 
experian security freeze 
p o  box  
allen  tx  
  
     
 
transunion security freeze 
p o  box  
chester  pa  
  
     
 
in order to place the security freeze  youll need to supply your name  address  date of birth  social security number  and other personal identification number  or password  keep the pin or password in a safe place  you will need it if you choose to lift the freeze  
 
  obtain a free credit report  
under federal law  you be entitle to one free credit report every  month from each of the above three major nationwide credit report company  call     or request your free credit report online at www annualcreditreport com  once you receive your credit report  review them for discrepancy  identify any account you do not open or inquiry from creditor that you do not authorize  verify all information be correct  if you have question or notice incorrect information  contact the credit report company  
 
  additional helpful resource  
even if you do not find any suspicious activity on your initial credit report  the federal trade commission  ftc  recommend that you check your credit report periodically  check your credit report periodically can help you spot problem and address them quickly  
 
if you find suspicious activity on your credit report or have reason to believe your information be be misuse  call your local law enforcement agency and file a police report  be sure to obtain a copy of the police report  a many creditor will want the information it contain to absolve you of the fraudulent debt  you may also file a complaint with the ftc by contact them on the web at www ftc gov idtheft  by phone at   idtheft        or by mail at federal trade commission  consumer response center   pennsylvania avenue  nw  washington  dc   your complaint will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  where it will be accessible to law enforcement for their investigation  in addition  you may obtain information from the ftc about fraud alert and security freeze  
 
if this notice letter state that your financial account information and or credit or debit card information be impact  we recommend that you contact your financial institution to inquire about step to take to protect your account  include whether you should close your account or obtain a new account number  
 
if your personal information have be use to file a false tax return  to open an account or to attempt to open an account in your name or to commit fraud or other crime against you  you may file a police report in the city in which you currently reside  
 
north carolina resident  you may obtain information about prevent identity theft from the north carolina attorney general office  office of the attorney general of north carolina  consumer protection division   mail service center  raleigh  nc    www ncdoj gov   telephone

content of data breach 
 
at faneuil  we value the trust that individual place in u with their information  and we understand the importance of protect information that we maintain  for these reason  we be write to inform you of a data security incident that involve your personal information  this notice explain the incident  measure that we have take in response  and step that you may consider take a well  
 
what happen  
 
we learn on august     that we be the target of a ransomware attack  in response  we immediately isolate all impact system to disrupt the attack and prevent further access by the attacker  and  work with independent cybersecurity expert  we launch a forensic investigation into the cause and impact of the incident  a we also seek to rebuild system and recover from the attack  in the course of our investigation  we learn that  prior to launch the attack  the attacker access and copy certain company record  include record of past and present faneuil employee  because we value protect individual information  we engage with the ransomware group and ultimately pay them  and we receive confirmation from the attacker that they destroy all copy information  in addition  during our investigation and response to the incident  we engage a digital risk protection firm to perform internet and dark web monitor for indication of faneuil data  at this time  we have no reason to believe that any of the data go beyond the attacker  or be misuse or make publicly available  
 
to help protect your information  we be offer a  month membership in experian identityworks  direction for how to enroll in this service be provide below  
 
what information be involve  
 
the employment record access by the ransomware attacker include name  address at the time of employment  social security number  phone number  and email address  
 
what we be do 
 
when we learn of this incident  we immediately isolate all system to disrupt the attack and prevent further access by the attacker  and we engage independent cybersecurity expert to investigate the cause and impact of the incident  we also engage an independent data risk protection firm to facilitate communication with the attacker  to protect individual personal security measure will prevent similar attack in the future  
 
what you can do 
 
for more information about what you can do to protect your information  please review the attachment to this letter   step you can take to further protect your information   in addition  we be provide a complimentary  month membership in experian identityworks service  to help protect your information  to activate your membership and start monitor your personal information  please follow the step below  
 
ensure that you enroll by  may     your code will not work after this date   
visit the experian identityworks website to enroll    
provide your activation code  
 
if you have any question about the service  need assistance with identity restoration  or would like an alternative to enroll in experian identityworks online  please contact experians customer care team at      by may     be prepare to provide engagement number b a proof of eligibility for the identity restoration service by experian  additional detail about this service be also provide in the attachment  
 
for more information 
 
for further information and assistance  please call      between   be and   pm est  monday through friday  and between   be and   pm est  saturday and sunday  or you may also contact u via our website at  please do not hesitate to contact u with any question or concern  
 
sincerely  
 
anna van buren

step you can take to further protect your information 
 
review account statement and notify law enforcement of suspicious activity 
 
a a precautionary measure  we recommend that you remain vigilant by review your account statement and credit report  if you detect any suspicious activity on an account  you should promptly notify the financial institution or company with which the account be maintain  you also should promptly report any fraudulent activity or any suspect incidence of identity theft to proper law enforcement authority  include your state attorney general and the federal trade commission  ftc   to file a complaint with the ftc  go to identitytheft gov or call   id theft       complaint file with the ftc will be add to the ftcs identity theft data clearinghouse  which be a database make available to law enforcement agency  
 
obtain and monitor your credit report 
 
we also recommend that you obtain a free copy of your credit report from each of the three major credit report agency once every  month  which you can do by visit  call toll free     or complete an annual credit report request form and mail it to annual credit report request service  p o  box   atlanta  ga   you can access the request form at  or you can elect to purchase a copy of your credit report by contact one of the three national credit report agency  contact information for the three national credit report agency for the purpose of request a copy of your credit report or for general inquiry be provide below  
 
equifax      www equifax com p o  box  atlanta  ga

olympia hotel management  manager of the brunswick hotel   tavern locate at  noble street  
brunswick  maine  recently discover malware on the hotel computer system that may have 
result in unauthorizedaccess to name and payment card information  a a recent guest of the hotel  
we be write to provide you with information about this incident  to share the step that we be take 
in response  and to provide you with important information about the step you can take to reduce the 
risk of unauthorized use of your personal information  we regret any inconvenience this incident may 
have cause  
what happen  
base on our investigation to date  it appear that one of the front desk computer at the hotel be 
infect with sophisticate malware design to capture and permit remote access to name and 
payment card information while avoid detection by anti virus software  on august     our 
security consultant determine that the malware may have be active on that front desk system 
between november    and july     a a result  your information may have be expose  
although we do not have conclusive evidence that your information be actually access remotely  we 
have not be able to rule that out and encourage you to take advantage of the credit monitor and

the jewish community federation  the federation  discover that it become the target of a phishing email campaign 
that compromise several federation email account credential  we be write to provide you with information on the 
incident  step we be take in response  and step you may take to better protect against the possibility of identity theft 
and fraud  should you feel it be appropriate  
what happen  we learn of suspicious activity relate to certain employee email account  we then launch an 
investigation to determine the full nature and scope of this incident  through a detail and exhaustive investigation  
we confirm that an unknown actor s  gain access to certain federation employee email account a the result 
of a phishing attack  the employee email credential be change  and the email account have be secure  a 
lead forensic investigation firm be immediately retain to assist with our investigation into what happen and what 
information contain within the email account may have be affect  the investigation determine that an unknown 
individual have access certain federation employee email account a early a september     
since the investigation be unable to determine if any email be view  we review the content of the relevant email account through a manual and programmatic process to determine whether personal information may have be 
present in the email account at the time of the incident  on april     it be confirm that personal information 
be contain in the account  we conduct a review  confirm the identity of the individual  impact data 
element and relevant address information  which be complete on july     
what information be involve  our investigation determine that your personal information be present in an affect 
email account at the time of the incident  this personal information include your   clientdef breach detail     please 
note that while our investigation do not reveal evidence that your information be actually view by the unauthorized 
actor  we be provide you this notice to ensure you be aware of this incident  
what we be do  information privacy and security be among our highest priority  the federation have strict 
security measure in place to protect information in our care  upon learn of this incident  we quickly take step to 
confirm the security of our system  we reset password for all relevant federation account and system  be review 
our policy and procedure relate to data security and be conduct additional employee training  
in an abundance of caution  we be notify potentially affect individual  include you  so that you may take further step to best protect your personal information  should you feel it be appropriate to do so  we have arrange to have kroll 
provide identity monitor service for  month at no cost to you a an add precaution  we be also report the 
event to relevant state regulator  
what you can do  you may review the information contain in the attach step you can take to protect your 
information  you may also activate to receive the identity monitor service we be make available to you  the 
federation will cover the cost of this service  because the activation process do not allow u to activate on your behalf  
you will need to activate yourself by follow the instruction outline in this letter  
 
for more information  we recognize that you may have question not address in this letter  if you have additional 
question  please call our dedicate assistance line at      toll free   monday through friday    a m  to

francisco  ca
